loans.name: Oumy Ndaw

texts.fr: Madame Oumy est âgée  de 47 ans. Elle habite au Sénégal. elle est célibataire et s’active dans la vente de tissus, greffages, parfums, encens et divers autres produits. Elle a une expérience de 10 ans dans son activité. Elle est membre du guichet de l’U-IMCEC de la localité ou elle habite depuis septembre 2004. Elle a déjà remboursé deux prêts  antérieurs au sein de l’institution. Elle sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs prévu pour le paiement d’une commande de greffages qu’elle avait réceptionné et a l’achat de produits divers destinés a la vente. Son objectif est d’augmenter ses bénéfices pour mieux prendre en charge ses besoins sociaux.
texts.en: Oumy is 47. She lives in Senegal. She is single and sells fabrics, hair weaves, perfume, incense, and various products. She has been working in this field for 10 years. She has been a member of her local U-IMCEC branch since September 2004. She has already paid 2 loans back to this institution. She is applying for a 300 000 frs loan which she intends to use to pay for an order of hair weaves she has received, and to buy other products she will resell. Her goal is to increase her profits so she can attend to her social needs.

loans.use: to pay for an order of hair weaves and buy other products she will resell.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis, de 36 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y empeñoso, así como alegre y amable. Está casado con Lurdes, quien es ama de casa. Juntos habitan en su casa propia a lado de sus hijos de 15, 8 y  1 año de edad. La actividad que realiza Luis es la agricultura, para eso cuenta con un terreno de 15 hectáreas de las cuales se posesionó cuando llego hace 15 años a esa zona desde su tierra natal de Huanuco, contando en la actualidad con 4 hectáreas de yucas en producción que los vende a los mercados de la capital y otra parte en los mercados de la ciudad de Pucallpa, contando con el apoyo de  hasta 6 peones en las labores de cosecha y mantenimiento de los sembríos, dándoles un pago diario de 20 nuevos soles cada uno. Le gusta su trabajo de campo, además que le genera ingresos económicos para pagar los gastos de su hogar así como la educación de sus hijos. Al contrario no le gusta cuando la producción se malogra debido a las plagas, ocasionándole pérdidas económicas. Por otro lado tiene planes de ampliar su negocio y sembrar además cítrico e incursionar en un nuevo proyecto de sembrío de palma aceitera, producto que está en auge.  Este será el préstamo número 8 con la institución MFP, agradece la oportunidad brindada de contar un apoyo financiero para alcanzar sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la ampliación y sembrío de más hectáreas de yuca, contratando 3 peones más para dichas labores.
texts.en: Luis, 36, is a hardworking and dedicated man, who is also cheerful and friendly.  He is married to Lurdes, who is a housewife.  They live together in their own home, along with their children aged 15, 8 and 1.  Luis is a farmer, and he has a 15 hectare plot of land  that he took ownership of when he arrived in this area 15 years ago from his hometown of Huanuco.  He is currently cultivating 4 hectares of yucca crops, some of which he sells in the markets in the capital and the other part in the markets of the city of Pucallpa.  To grow and harvest the crops, he depends of the labor of 6 workers, each one of whom he pays 20 Peruvian soles daily.  He enjoys his work in the countryside, and it also generates income to pay for his household as well as the education of his children.  On the negative side, what he doesn't like about the work is when the crops are destroyed by pests, causing him economic losses.  However, he has plans to expand his business and plant even more citrus, and venture into a new area by cultivating palm oil, a product for which there is increasing demand.  This will be loan number 8 with the MFP institution, and he appreciates the opportunity that he is being provided by having this financial support to reach for his goals.  With the sum of 2,000 Peruvian soles that he requests, he will invest in expanding his yucca cultivations to cover more hectares, and he will hire 3 more laborers to do this work.

loans.use: to hire 3 workers

loans.name: Tweyombeke Rwentahi Group

texts.en: Moses is 35 years old and is a member of the above mentioned group. He owns a retail shop and has been running it for 11 years. He faces the challenge of price fluctuations and his personal goal is to build a permanent home. His business goal is to expand his business to new markets. Moses needs a loan to buy soda,soap and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy soda and other general merchandise.

loans.name: Nancy Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Nancy desde muy joven le ha gustado las manualidades de toda clase como decoración para el hogar, accesorios, lencería para bebe, entre otras, iniciando su trabajo para su propia casa y posteriormente por encargos. Con el ánimo de iniciar a producir sus productos de nuevo para almacenes, necesita de la compra una maquina familiar e insumos puesto que no tiene los recursos necesarios para tal fin debido a dos cirugías que le realizaron y estuvo un año en  la cama sin poder trabajar. La señora Nancy sueña con ver crecer su negocio, generar empleos directos y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Since she was very young Señora Nancy has liked to do handicrafts of every class such as decorations for the home, accessories and baby clothes, among other things.  She begain working in her own house and subsequently took on assignments.  With the will to begin making her products again for stores, she needs to purchase raw materials and supplies since she does not have the necessary resources to do so due to having two surgeries and spending a year in bed without being able to work.  Señora Nancy dreams of seeing her business grow, to generate direct jobs and to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

.

loans.use: to buy craft supplies such as fabric and thread.

loans.name: Kweterana Kyamasuka Group

texts.en: Ahamed is 56 years old and married with 5 children. He is a member of Kweterana Kyamasuka, a group of hardworking people. He has no other dependents and he lives in his own house. His family goal is to educate his children. He raises cattle and he has been doing this for over 20 years. He started with one cow now he has over twenty five cows. He likes his business and he faces no difficulties in it. Ahamed needs a loan to buy cows for raising.

loans.use: to buy cows to raise.

loans.name: Hipolita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  ”VILLA RAYANNIYOC”;  El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el poblado de Ccorao en Rayanniyoc;  en la provincia de Pisac y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Hipolita;  La socia tiene 44 años de edad, La socia es casada, la socia tiene 2 hijos de 24, 4 años de edad; la socia se dedica  a la agricultura y ganadería,  también la socia cría animales menores y entre ellos cuyes, gallinas, chanchos, vacas, toros, la socia también compra y vende tarwi, quinua; La socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el crédito en su vivienda, ella está terminando de construir su casa y requiere comprar 8 calaminas para el techo, la socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de 8 calaminas.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Hipolita is a member of the communal bank "Villa Rayanniyoc."  This bank is located in the town of Ccorao in Rayanniyoc, which is in Pisac province in the department of Cusco.

Hipolita is 44 years old, married, and has 2 children aged 24 and 4.  She works in farming and livestock; she raises animals including guinea pigs, hens, pigs, cows, and bulls.  She also works buying and selling tarwi seeds and quinoa. At this time, she wants a loan to invest in her house.  She is finishing up construction on her house, and needs to buy 8 sheets of corrugated metal roofing material for her roof.  

Hipolita is grateful for this loan, and promises to make her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy 8 sheets of corrugated metal roofing material for the roof of her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, beans and ground nuts for sale.

loans.name: Nicomedes

texts.es: Nicomedes, de 40 años de edad, es un hombre de buenas ideas y modales, además de alegre y amable. Convive con María quien es ama de casa. Juntos habitan en su casa propia en compañía de su hijo de 15 años de edad. La actividad que realiza Nicomedes es la agricultura, tiene un terreno de 30 hectáreas que compró hace 8 años donde siembra plátanos pero principalmente yuca, tiene una extensión de 3 hectáreas listas para ser cosechas y otras recién sembradas. Para ello cuenta con 02 peones para las labores de cultivo y cosecha del producto a los que paga un jornal de 20 nuevos soles diarios a cada uno. Le gusta su vida y trabajo, además que gracias a ella puede suplir la necesidad económica y así tener un ingreso para solventar los gastos de su familia a la que quiere mucho y son la motivación de seguir trabajando. Por ahora desea continuar en su actividad y ampliar con la siembra de palma aceitera, ya que ha visto que está comenzando a tener bastante demanda como cultivo alternativo. Este será el préstamo número 11 con MFP, se siente agradecido por el crédito concedido para continuar con su negocio, y desea seguir contando con ese apoyo, por eso se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en los créditos anteriores. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la siembra de más extensiones de yuca, planeado incrementar su producción por la demanda que tiene este producto, para ello comprará semillas de yuca.
texts.en: Nicomedes, who is 40 years old, is a well-mannered man who has good ideas.  He is also happy and friendly.  He lives with María, who is a homemaker.  They live in their own home together with their 15 year old son.  Nicomedes's business is agriculture.  He has 30 hectares of land that he purchased 8 years ago on which he plants banana trees and, primarily, yucca.  He has an expanse of 3 hectares ready to be harvested and others that have recently been planted.  He has 2 farm workers who help with the planting and the harvesting.  He pays them a daily wage of 20 PEN each.  Nicomedes likes his life and his work.  Thanks to his work, he is able to meet the financial needs of his business and also have an income to take care of his family's household expenses.  He loves his family very much; they are his motivation to continue working.  For now, Nicomedes wants to continue with his business and expand by planting palm oil trees.  He has seen that palm oil trees are starting to have quite a demand as an alternative crop.  This will be Nicomedes's 11th loan with MFP.  He feels grateful for the loan he has received to help him continue with his business, and he hopes to be able to continue counting on this support.  He promises to comply with his repayment plan, as he has done with his previous loans.  With the total he has requested of 1000 PEN ($375 USD), Nicomedes will invest in planting more expanses of yucca to meet the increased demand for that product.  To do that, he will purchase yucca seeds.

loans.use: to purchase yucca seeds.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
La señora Silvia es viuda, y una de sus hijas y su familia viven con ella, solicita un préstamo para realizar mejoras a su vivienda, que le esta haciendo falta acabados del exterior hay que enjarres y pintura especial para el exterior.
Doña Silvia ya ha tenido dos créditos con KIVA los cuales han pagado puntualmente, con el ingreso que obtiene de su trabajo cuidando a niños desde hace ya más de tres años. 
La señora Silvia desea mejor el patrimonio que le dejo su esposo, es por eso que espera contar con su cooperación en este otro crédito ya que también es para mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
Silvia is a widow, and one of her daughters lives with her along with her family.  She is requesting a loan to make some improvements to her house, which needs some finishing work on the exterior including plastering and special exterior paint.  Silvia has already taken 2 loans through Kiva which she has paid back on time with the income she earns caring for children, work that she has been doing for more than 3 years.

Silvia wants to improve the property that her husband left her.  For this reason she hopes to rely on your cooperation with this new loan that she will use to make improvements to her house.

loans.use: to do finishing work on the exterior of her house, such as plastering and painting

loans.name: El Señor Es Mi Rey Group

texts.es: El Banco El Señor es mi Rey, está formado por emprendedores que día a día luchan por salir adelante con sus negocios. Este banco tiene 11 integrantes en el cual sus negocios son diferentes pero con sueños de crecer y invertir en sus negocios. La presidente del grupo que es Vilma de la Cruz los está siempre motivando para que todos juntos salgan adelante, apoyándose unos a otro. Heydi Johana  es parte de este grupo de emprendedores en el cual su actividad económica es la venta de cerdo,  enchiladas y tacos en su comunidad, ya tiene clientes fijos y eventuales que la visita, el financiamiento que está solicitando es para invertir en el negocio en la compra de cerdos y materia prima para la elaboración de las enchiladas y tacos. Al igual que el reto del grupo el financiamiento lo están solicitando para invertir en sus negocios en esta temporada que muy buena.
texts.en:
The ‘El Señor es mi Rey’ bank is made up of entrepreneurs who are struggling on a day-to-day basis to get ahead with their businesses.  The bank has 11 members; each of them has a different type of business, but they have a shared desire to grow and invest in their respective businesses.  The president of the group is Vilma de la Cruz, who is always motivating them to get ahead together and to help each other.  

Heydi Johana is part of this group of entrepreneurs.  Her economic activity is selling pork, enchiladas, and tacos in her community.  She already has regular customers as well as occasional customers that she visits.  She is asking for the loan so she can purchase pork and ingredients for making enchiladas and tacos.  As with the rest of the group, her main challenge is financing; the other members are also asking for loans to invest in their businesses, since this time of year is very good for business.

loans.use: to purchase pork and ingredients for making enchiladas and tacos.

loans.name: Damacio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORTY YUNGAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Damacio; el tiene 47 años de edad y es casado y tiene 4 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de agricultura, el tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra maíz, papa y lechuga, el socio estos productos lo vende en las distintas ferias que existe en el distrito de Anta y también el socio trabaja en el municipio en el area de construccion,por medio de este trabajo y este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño del socio es mejorar el negocio de agricultura. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar semillas y fertilizantes para las tierras de cultivo.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORTY YUNGAQUI communal bank, located in the Anta district, Anta province, Cusco department.

Mr. Damacio is 47, married, and has 4 children.  He is a farmer and has a field where he plants corn, potatoes and lettuce.  He sells these products in different markets in the Anta district and he also works for the town in construction.  With this work and his farming business he gets his children ahead.  His dream is to improve the farming business.  He is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for his fields.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for his fields

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase seeds for growing lemons.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy grocery merchandise for sale.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en: Martha is 30 years old single with no children. She is a teacher by profession and it is a job she loves doing. Her family goal is to be able to pay school fees in the future for her children and also upgrade her own studies. Her business goal is to buy land and grow crops. Martha needs a loan to pay her school fees.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El señor Juan necesita el préstamo para comprar artículos eléctricos para  repararlo y así tener variedad de mercancía para ofrecer a sus clientes. 
Don Juan se dedica a la reparación y venta de artículos eléctricos desde hace mas de 15 años, cuenta con un local fijo, para realizar su actividad y además los fines de semana vende en diferentes partes de la ciudad,  con lo que solventa los gasto de su casa y gastos personales.
El señor Juan ha tenido cuatro créditos con KIVA los cuales ha pagado puntual y espera contar con su cooperación en este préstamo.
texts.en:
Juan needs the loan to buy electrical goods for repair, and so have a variety of merchandise to sell his customers.

Juan has been repairing and selling electrical goods for more than 15 years. 

He has a permanent shop where he carries on his business, and in addition, on the weekends he sells in different parts of the city. This how he covers his household and personal expenses.

Juan has had four loans with Kiva, which he paid off on time, and he hopes to have your cooperation in this loan.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for his business.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORTY YUNGAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Concepcion; ella tiene 28 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de chanchos, la socia los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias que existe en el distrito de Anta, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda tener una tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar chanchos al por mayor y alimentos para los chanchos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the "Señor de Ccoyllorty Yungaqui" communal bank, located in the district of Anta, which is part of Anta province, Cusco department.

The borrower is Concepción. She is 28, lives with her partner, and has three children. She alternates her daily activities with her business of buying and selling pigs. The borrower raises and fattens them, and then sells them in the various markets that exist in the district of Anta. Through this business, she is raising her children.  

Her dream is to have a shop where she can have her grocery store. The borrower is applying for the loan in order to buy pigs at wholesale, and feed for them. She is happy about the loan, and promises to make her instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy pigs at wholesale, and feed for them.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is 31 years old and married with 2 children. He faces the challenge of price fluctuation which affect his business profits. His personal goal is to educate his children and his business goal is to move his business to a more permanent location. Robert needs a loan to buy chicken feed.

loans.use: to buy poultry feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Loyda

texts.es: Loyda, de 39 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser amable y alegre, esta separada de su pareja hace 2 años, siendo ella padre y madre para sus hijos de 20, 17, 14 y 11 años de edad a los que quiere mucho.Juntos habitan en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Loyda es la agricultura principalmente el cultivo de yuca siendo la zona propicia para éste producto, contando con un terreno de 20 hectárea que compró con su ex pareja hace 13 años. Actualmente cuenta con una producción de 5 hectáreas de yuca llegando a vender su producto en los mercados de la capital  y en otras ciudades teniendo bastante aceptación y demanda. Pero su trabajo no lo huebiera terminado rápido sino fuera por el apoyo de 2 peones que contrata, pagando un jornal de 20 nuevos soles diarios. Le gusta su vida de campo pues desde muy niña ha vivido en ese ambiente y se siente acostumbrada y cómoda. Comenta que  eligió ésta actividad pues no tuvo la oportunidad de culminar sus estudios, y viendo los buenos resultados tiene planes de continuar y mantenerlo. Este será el préstamo número 2 con la institución MFP, se siente contenta con la ayuda financiera que viene recibiendo para avanzar con su actividad. Además de estar a gusto con su banco comunal pues el conoce a la mayoría sus integrantes y tiene buenas relaciones con todos ellos. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá el cultivo de terreno para prepararlo para el sembró de más hectáreas de yuca, para ello contratará peones.
texts.en:
Loyda is 39 years old. She is a hard working tenacious woman, as well as being friendly and happy. She has been separated from her partner for 2 years. She is both father and mother of her children who are 20, 17, 14 and 11 years old and who she loves vey much. They live in her own home. Loyda works primarily in the cultivation of cassava since this region is conducive to this crop. She has a 20 hectare plot of land that she bought with her former partner 13 years ago.

Currently she has a production of 5 hectares of cassava planted and she is selling her crop in the markets of the capital city and in other cities having sufficient acceptance and demand. But she would not finish her work rapidly without the help of 2 laborers that she hires, paying a wage of 20 soles a day. She likes her farming life since from from the time of being a young child she has lived in this environment and she is accustomed and comfortable in it. 

She says she choose this field because she did not have the opportunity to finish her studies, and seeing the good results she has she plans on continuing and maintaining it. 

This will be her 2nd loan with MFP and she feels happy with the financial help that she has received to move forward with her work. Also, she feels happy with the communal bank because she knows almost everyone and has good relationships with them. With the money she is asking for she will use 1000 soles to invest cultivating her land in order to prepare for the planting of more hectares of cassava and do this she would contract laborers.

loans.use: to pay laborers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Doris

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORTY YUNGAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Doris; ella tiene 32 años de edad y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de pollos y pescados, ella vende en el mercado  y también la socia es propietaria de un terreno de cultivo donde siembra maíz, papa y habas y luego o vende en las ferias del distrito de Anta, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los pollos y pescados. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pollos y pescados y también para comprar semillas para su terreno de cultivo.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the “Señor de Ccoyllorty Yungaqui" communal bank, located in the district of Anta, which is part of Anta province, and Cusco department. The borrower is Doris. She is 32, married and has one child. 

She alternates her daily activities with her business of buying and selling chicken and fish. She sells in the market, and also owns a plot of agricultural land where she grows corn, potatoes, and lima beans, which she then sells in the markets in Anta district. 

Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell chicken and fish.  The borrower is applying for the loan to buy chicken and fish, and also to buy seeds for her plot of agricultural land. 

She is happy about the loan, and promises to make her instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy chicken and fish, and also to buy seeds for her plot of agricultural land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy seeds for growing lemons.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds for growing lemons and firewood for making bread

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy vegetables and lemon seeds for sowing.

loans.name: Aminata

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est  une femme mariée, mère de quatre enfants.Elle pratique l'élevage traditionnelle depuis son bas age.Elle vend également du lait dans la ville voisine de son village.Pour améliorer d'avantage ses revenus et participer à la prise en charge des besoins de la famille et en particulier de ses deux filles, elle pratique l'embouche ovine.Elle achète des moutons qu'elle engraisse et revend au bout de 7 mois.C'est pour faire une nouvelle opération qu'elle sollicite ainsi un prêt de 400 000f afin d'acheter 15 moutons. Son ambition est de faire plus tard l'embouche bovine.
texts.en: This borrower is a married mother of four children. She has been engaged in traditional animal-rearing since she was young. She also sells milk in the village next to her own. To further improve her income and participate in providing for her family, in particular her two daughters, she raises sheep. She buys sheep, rears them, and re-sells them seven months later. In order to start a new cycle, she is seeking a loan of 400,000 F to buy 15 sheep. Her ambition is to raise cattle at some point in the future.

loans.use: To buy 15 sheep.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy straw mats for her store.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: La socia continua con su negocio de compra y venta de verduras y también en esta epoca la socia se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores, la socia desea en esta ocasión invertir el prestamo en la compra de cuyes en un numero aproximado de 50 y también invertir en la compra de 50 gallinas, la socia cría estos animales los engorda y algunas veces logra reproducirlos y los vende al doble o 3 veces mas el precio inicial. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de cuyes 50 y de 50 gallinas.
texts.en: Luisa keeps on running her activity, breeding small animals. In this occasion she is requesting a loan to invest it in the purchase of around 50 “cuyes” (“cuy” is Quechua for Guinea pig), as well as in the purchase of 50 hens. She breeds these animals, she fattens them and sometimes she successfully makes them mate, and she sells them at a price twice or 3 times higher than their basic price. She is requesting a loan to invest it in the purchase of 50 cuyes and 50 hens.

loans.use: To buy 50 cuyes and 50 hens.

loans.name: Rafaela Emperatriz

texts.es:
La señora Rafaela  Emperatriz  se dedica a la venta de  antojitos como es quesadillas, tacos  dorados ,tacos blanditos y las sabrosas empanadas.
También se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace tres meses.
Ella pidió el préstamo para comparar mas ingredientes como es : cebolla,jitomate,aguacates,verduras ,carne ,maíz para la masa y elaboración de tortillas.

Le da las gracias a fundación por el apoyo que le ha dado para seguir triunfando en la vida.
texts.en:
Rafaela Emperatriz engages in selling snacks such as cheesecakes, fried tacos, soft-shell tacos and tasty meat pies.
Three months ago she also started a clothes selling activity.
She has requested a loan to buy more ingredients such as onions, tomatoes, avocados, vegetables, meat and maize - for the dough- to prepare tortillas.

She thanks the foundation for the support provided in keeping on succeeding in life.

loans.use: To buy onions, tomatoes, avocados, vegetables, meat and maize to prepare her snacks.

loans.name: Venanccio

texts.es:
El Sr. Venancio es de la ciudad de Carapeguá, tiene 38 años de edad,  está acompañado con la Sra. Mirian hace más de 10 años, tienen 2 hijos juntos ambos en edad escolar.
Como proviene de una familia de campo y con ganas de salir adelante Venancio decidió ir a trabajar como ayudante de albañil en Argentina un tiempo, después logró juntar un poco de dinero y con ese ahorro decidió volver al país  para empezar a comprar productos (hamacas, frazadas, fajas y sábanas) y llevarlos a vender por la capital del país Asunción  donde ya tiene una buena clientela formada. Gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo  pudo comprarse una motocicleta la cual lo utiliza para realizar sus ventas y mantener su clientela.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hamacas, frazadas, fajas y sábanas puesto que tiene muchos pedidos de estos productos y quiere cumplir con ellos.
texts.en:
Venanccio comes from the town of Carapeguá, he is 38 years old, he has been living with his partner Mirian for more than 10 years, and they have 2 children of school age.
Coming from an rural family and desiring to get ahead in life, Venanccio decided to go to Argentina to work as a contractor’s assistant for a while; he then succeeded in saving some money and he decided to come back to his country and to use his savings to start a retail activity, buying products (hammocks, blankets, belts and sheets) and then selling them in Asunción, the state capital, where he now has established customers. Thanks to his efforts and his work he has been able to buy a motorcycle that he uses to sell his products and to keep his customers.
He is requesting a loan to buy hammocks, blankets, belts and sheets because he has received many requests fort these products and he wants to satisfy them all.

loans.use: To buy hammocks, blankets, belts and sheets.

loans.name: Carlos Alejandro

texts.es:
El señor Carlos Alejandro es padre de familia y solita un préstamo para poder construir una barda alrededor de sus casa. Y así tendrá mayor seguridad ya que por la calle donde viven es muy transitada y como tiene una niña pequeña, podrán dejarla salir a jugar con la confianza que no le pasara un accidente. 
Don Alejandro Trabaja desde hace dos años en un centro comercial, su esposa la señora Alma Rosa para apoyarlo en los gastos economía de su hogar, trabaja en una tienda departamental como vendedora. 
Desea la seguridad y protección de su familia y el patrimonio este en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Carlos Alejandro is a father and he is requesting a loan to be able to build a wall around his house. That way he will have better security as the street where they live has a lot of traffic. Since he has a small daughter, they will be able to allow her to go out to play with confidence that will not be in an accident. 

Alejandro has worked in a shopping center for two years. His wife, Alma Rosa, works in a department store as a salesperson to help out with expenses.

He wants security and protection for his family and wants his assets to be in a better condition.

loans.use: to build a wall around his house and install a gate in the front.

loans.name: Juana Antonia

texts.es:
La señora Juana  Antonia   se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos desde hace dos años, ellas nos cuenta que lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es  cocinar ya que tiene un buen sazón.
Tiene la cantidad de tres hijos quienes la ayudan a comprar  lo que necesita  para  preparar la comida.
Ella pidió el préstamo para comprar :chile,cebolla,acite,ajo jitomate, pechuga  de pollo y verdura.
Le da las gracias a dios por todo y por la ayuda de fundación.
texts.en:
Juana Antonia has sold Mexican snacks for some 2 years now. She says that what she likes most about her business is to cook, since her dishes have such good flavor.

Juana Antonia has 3 children who help her buy what she needs to prepare the food. She is requesting a loan to buy chiles, onions, cooking oil, garlic, jitomates, chicken breast, and vegetables.

Juana Antonia gives thanks to God for everything as well as for the aid of the Foundation.

loans.use: buy food supplies for preparing meals to sell.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora Maria se dedica a la venta de carne desde hace cinco años  es una trabajadora ,humilde llena de sueños por cumplir.
Tiene la cantidad de un hijo quien la  ayuda  en lo que pueda  ya que también se dedica a la venta de carne enchilada y de chorizo.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de chile y mas carne para la elaboración de mas chorizo.
Le da las gracias a fundación por el apoyo que le  ha dado para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Maria has made a living selling meat for five years. She is a humble hard worker, full of dreams to fulfill. 

She has one child who helps her with what he can as he too makes his living selling chilied meats and chorizo [pork sausage]. 

She requested the loan to be able to buy chilis and more meat to make more chorizo. She thanks the foundation for the support it has given her to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make chorizo.

loans.name: Claudia Bernarda

texts.es:
La señora Claudia Bernarda se dedica a la venta de joyas desde hace tres años  ellas nos cuenta que lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es  salir a vender a los pueblos vecinos  ya que ya tienes sus clientas y también vende en  su casa.
Ella pidió el préstamo para comprar mas joyas para la venta vende su mercancía en pagos semanales.
Le da las gracias fundación por ser reali0dad sus sueños  de seguir con su negocio.
texts.en:
Claudia Bernarda has been engaged in selling jewels for three years. She has told us that what she likes the most about her activity is going to neighboring villages to sell to the customers she has there; she also sells her products in her house.
She has requested a loan to buy more jewels to sell; she receives weekly payments for the products she sells.
She thanks the foundation for helping her fulfilling her dreams and keeping on running her activity.

loans.use: To buy jewels to sell.

loans.name: Etelbina Antonia

texts.es:
La señora Etelbina  Antonia  es una señora amable, trabajadora  y humilde desde pequeña empezó a trabajar  para ayudar a  su familia.
Ella cuenta con una tienda de abarrotes desde hace cinco años , le va gracias  a dios por el apoyo que le ha dado fundación y así continuar con su tienda.
Pidió el préstamo para la compra  de mas mercancía de abarrotes como es : aceite,leche,manteca,pan,galletas,refrescos y detergente.
Le da las gracias a fundación por el apoyo que le ha dado para salir adelante para salir adelante y cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Etelbina Antonia is a nice, humble and hardworking woman who has started working when  she was very young to help her family.
She has been running a general store for five years, and she "gives thanks to God" for the support she has received from the foundation that has allowed her to keep on running her shop.
She has requested a loan to buy more general products such as oil, milk, butter, bread, biscuits, drinks and detergents.
She thanks the foundation for the support provided in getting ahead and fulfilling her dreams.

loans.use: To buy oil, milk, butter, bread, biscuits, drinks and detergents.

loans.name: Enedina

texts.es:
La señora Enedina se dedica  ala venta de antojitos mexicanos como es : tacos dorados, enchiladas  rechinas de pollo, tacos  blanditos de cecina .
Ella pidió el préstamo para comprar mas  ingredientes como es: carne de res,aceite , pechuga de pollo y chile seco, jitomate , cebolla y tortillas.
Le da las gracias a fundación por todo el apoyo que le ha dado para salir adelante y triunfar en un futuro.
texts.en:
Enedina engages in selling Mexican snacks such as fried tacos, chicken enchiladas and soft-shelled tacos with smoked meat.
She has requested a loan to buy more ingredients such as beef, oil, chicken breasts, dried chili, tomatoes, onions and tortillas.
She thanks the foundation for the support she has been provided to get ahead and to be successful in the future.

loans.use: To buy  beef, oil, chicken breasts, dried chili, tomatoes, onions and tortillas to prepare her snacks.

loans.name: Ruth Manuela

texts.es:
La señora Ruth Manuela    ella se dedica a la venta de zapatos desde hace tres años ella nos cuenta que gracias a su negocio le ha podido dar una mejor vida a su familia.
Tiene la cantidad de dos hijos , es soltera y con muchas ganas de triunfar y hacer mas grande su negocio.
Ella pidió el préstamo para comprar mas calzado en ocasiones los vende en pago y a contado.
Le da gracias a fundación por el apoyo que le ha dado para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Ruth Manuela has been engaged in selling shoes for three years. She has told us that thanks to her activity she has been able to provide her family with a better standard of living.
She has two children, she is single and she strongly wants to succeed in life and to expand her activity.
She has requested a loan to buy more shoes; she gets paid in cash and sometimes in installments.
She thanks the foundation for the support she has been given in getting ahead.

loans.use: To buy shoes to sell.

loans.name: Bok Jom Group

texts.fr: Le groupe " BOK JAM" est constitué de six femmes habitantes du même quartier.Elles sont toutes mariées et ont des enfants.Elles ont formé leur groupe pour s'appuyer mutuellement dans leurs activités de vente de denrées alimentaires.Elles achètent en gros des sacs de légumes, de produits céréaliers et se les partagent en fonction de la participation de chaque femme.Elles parviennent à générer des bénéfices modestes qui leur permettent de subvenir à leurs besoins et de participer à la prise en charge des dépenses alimentaires et sanitaires de leurs enfants. Le chef de groupe (qui porte des lunettes) est mère de sept enfants dont les trois vont à l'école.Elle a installé une table devant son domicile sur laquelle elle propose à ses clientes des légumes, du mil, de l'arachide et d'autres condiments qui entrent dans la préparation des repas quotidiens. Elle prend en charge avec ses bénéfices, les frais de scolarité de ses enfants et participe chaque jour à la dépense alimentaire. Le groupe, pour améliorer ses revenus , sollicite auprès de l'UIMCEC un pret de 600000f pour acheter des sacs de légumes, de mil, d'arachide et d'autres condiments divers.
texts.en:
The Bok Jam group is made up of six women living in the same neighborhood. They are all married and have children. They formed their group to mutually help each other in their businesses selling food. They buy bags of vegetables and cereal products wholesale and share them with each other based on the participation of each woman. They manage to generate modest profits which allow them to meet their needs and to participate in taking care of the food and health expenses of their children. 

The leader of the group (who is wearing glasses) is mother to seven children of whom three go to school. She setup a table in front of her home from which she sells vegetables, mil [African cereal], ground nuts and other spices that are used in the preparation of daily meals to her customers. With her profits she takes care of her children's school fees and contributes every day to food expenses. 

The group, in order to improve their income, is requesting from the UIMCEC a loan of 600,000f to buy bags of vegetables, mil [African cereal], ground nuts and various other spices.

loans.use: to buy bags of vegetables, mil [African cereal], ground nuts and various other spices.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy second hand clothes such as hats and purses, bundles of shoes and mixed clothing, for subsequent sale.

loans.name: Bordadoras De Tete Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama las bordadoras de tete  sus integrantes decidieron ponerle así porque todas  se dedican con su localidad y sus artesanías, ellas se dedican  bordar y elaborar servilletas, manteles y huipiles.
Una de las  integrantes del grupo es la señora Estela quien se  dedica a la venta y elaboración de servilletas, manteles y huipiles.
Doña Estela nos cuenta que ya lleva diez años dedicándose a la elaboración de manteles  y servilletas.
Lo que más le gusta de su negocio es tejer, y didugarle las flores  a su manta para  sus manteles se vean más luminosas y llamen la atención de sus clientes.
Esta felizmente casada con el señor Fidencio quien está orgulloso de ella ya que es una mujer artesana y trabajadora que se gana el pan de cada día con su creatividad  y esfuerzo.
Tiene la cantidad de  tres hijos  Edgar de ocho años de edad, Jennifer de cinco años de edad y Herminio de tres años de edad quien ayuda a su mama cortándole los hilos y pasándole los palos de madera para apretar la manta.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más hilos de colores y manta blanca y de colores.
Las integrantes del grupo son:
María- quien se dedica a la elaboración de servilletas y manteles.
Socorro- quien se dedica a la venta de servilletas y manteles.
Lucia- quien se dedica a la venta de servilletas de manteles y servilletas.
Estela- quien se dedica a la venta de servilletas y manteles.
Justina- quien se dedica a la venta de manteles y servilletas y huipiles.
Eladia- quien se dedica a la venta de servilletas y manteles y huipiles.
Felicitas- quien se dedica a la venta de servilletas, manteles y huipiles.
Margarita- quien  se dedica a la venta de manteles y huipiles.
Catalina- quien se dedica a la venta de manteles y servilletas.
Adelina- quien se dedica a la venta de servilletas y manteles.

Le dan las gracias a fundación por ayudar a las personas que elaboran su propia mercancía  con su creatividad y artículos mexicanos.

loans.use: to buy thread and cloth to make table cloths and huipiles [traditional indigenous blouses].

loans.name: Birame

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié, père de trois enfants dont les deux vont à l'école.Il exerce l'activité d'élevage traditionnelle depuis près de 30ans mais du fait de la rareté du pâturage causée par la faiblesse de la pluviométrie, il s'est tourné vers l'élevage intensif notamment l'embouche bovine. Il achète des bœufs dans les marchés hebdomadaires, les engraisse durant 6 mois pour les revendre dans les grandes villes.Cette activité lui permet de prendre en charge les besoins des membres de sa famille ainsi que ses propres besoins.Pour renforcer ses revenus, il sollicite un pret de 250 000f afin d'acheter 2 bœufs.Son ambition est d'élargir ses capacités d'achat.
texts.en:
The borrower is a married man, father to three children of whom two go to school. He has been practicing the business of traditional breeding for almost 30 years but due to the rarity of pasture caused by lack of recorded rainfall, he reoriented himself toward intensive breeding notably cattle feeding.

He buys his cows in the weekly markets, fattens them during six months to resell them in the large cities. This business allows him to take care of the needs of the members of his family as well as his own. To strengthen his income, he is requesting a loan of 250,000f in order to buy two cows. His goal is to expand his purchasing capacity.

loans.use: to buy two cows.

loans.name: Azurita Group

texts.es:
Azurita es un grupo compuesto por 7 mujeres que viven en el municipio de
García, al oeste de la ciudad de Monterrey.  Ellas escogieron el nombre de Azurita porque además de ser una piedra preciosa, la consideran ser de la suerte. La mayoría de las mujeres de este grupo son comerciantes y venden diferentes productos como ropa, blancos y productos de belleza.

Una de las mujeres que integran este grupo es Concepción Alejandra.
Concepción es una mujer muy responsable de 22 años de edad, está casada  y tiene 2 hijos, de 1 y 5 años a los cuales quiere con toda su alma y por quienes lucha día con día para sacarlos adelante. Concepción se despierta cada mañana para salir a vender sus productos casa por casa. Ella vende distintos cosméticos, maquillaje y productos para el cuidado de la piel. Con este crédito, Concepción, espera poder ofrecer a sus clientes una variedad más amplia de productos y de esa manera ella poder apoyar a su esposo con los gastos en en hogar y con los estudio de su hijo.
texts.en:
The Azurita (Azurite) communal bank is comprised of seven women who live in the Garcia municipality west of the city of Monterrey.  They chose this name because in addition to being a precious stone, it is considered to be lucky.  Most of the woman in this group are merchants and sell different products like clothes, bed linens, and beauty products.

Concepción Alejandra is one of the women in this group.  Concepción is 22 years old.  She is married and has two children, ages one and five.  She loves them with all of her soul, and she struggles day to day to get them ahead.  Concepción gets up every morning in order to go sell her products door to door.  She sells different cosmetics, make-up, and products to take care of the skin.

With this loan Concepción hopes to be able to offer her customers a greater variety of products.  This way she will be able to help her husband with the household expenses and her son’s educational expenses.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of cosmetics.

loans.name: Coly

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié, père de cinq enfants.Il exerce l'activité d'embouche ovine.Il achète des moutons dans les marchés hebdomadaires de sa région, les engraisse durant 7 mois puis les revend à un bon prix.Son activité lui procure des revenus assez consistants qui lui permettent de subvenir à ses besoins et de satisfaire ceux de toute sa famille.Pour renforcer son activité, il sollicite un pret de 500000f pour acheter 20 moutons dont 05 moutons de race.Son ambition est de s'engager plus tard dans l'embouche bovine.
texts.en:
The borrower is a married man, father to five children. He is in the business of sheep feeding. He buys his sheep in the weekly markets of his region, fattens them during seven months then resells them for a good price. His business brings in fairly consistent income which allows him to meet his needs and to satisfy those of his whole family. 

To strengthen his business, he is requesting a loan of 500,000f to buy 20 sheep including 5 purebred sheep. His goal is to later get involved in cattle feeding.

loans.use: to buy 20 sheep including 5 purebred sheep.

loans.name: Libertad Group

texts.es: La señora Alma Rosa tiene 25 años de edad ella estudio hasta la secundaria, ella vende ropa interior de dama, perfumes y cosméticos por catalogo, ella solicito su préstamo para compra ropa interior de dama pantaletas, brasier, fajas, para surtir sus pedidos,ella esta contenta con este prestamo que va a recibir porque lo va a invertir en ropa interior para surtir sus pedidos, ella inicio su negocio hace 4 años, su mama la invito  a trabajar en este negocio, ella sale a ofrecer sus productos con su vecinos,amigos y familiares, su negocio es importante porque le gusta vender y tiene su propio negocio, a ella le gusta convivir con las personas, ella se siente orgullosa de su negocio le ha ayudado ha mejorar la economía para darle lo mejor a su hija. Ella es casada, su esposo trabaja en el campo y hace carnitas  tienen una hija que está estudiando la primaria, sus sueños y esperanzas son tener su casa propia y que su hija siga estudiando. Las integrantes del grupo le dan las gracias a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad por sus préstamos y que nos sigan ayudando a crecer o emprender un negocio.
texts.en:
Alma Rosa is 25 years old. She studied up until middle school. She sells women's underwear, perfumes and cosmetics through a catalog. 

She is requesting this loan to purchase women's underwear to supply her orders: panties, bras, and girdles. She is happy with this loans, which she will receive because she is going to invest in underwear to supply her orders.

She began her business four years ago. Her mother invited her to work in the business. She goes out to offer her products to her neighbors, friends and family members. Her business is important because she likes to do sales and she has her own business. She likes to be around people. She is proud of her business. It has helped her improve her finances in order to give the best to her daughter. 

She is married. Her husband works in the field and makes carnitas [slow cooked shredded pork]. They has a daughter thay is studying in elementary school. Her hope and dreams are to have her own house and that her daughter continues to study. 

The members of the group give their thanks to Kiva and Frundación Realidad for their loans and they hope that they continue to help them grow or open a business.

loans.use: to buy bras, panties, slips and girdles to supply their orders.

loans.name: Regina Group

texts.es:
Regina es el nombre de un grupo que esta integrado por nueve mujeres alegres y muy trabajadoras cada una de ellas tiene una actividad económica la cual desarrollan para ayudar a sus esposos a sacar adelante a sus familias y así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. Este grupo esta ubicado en una región Cañera y su clima es cálido ya que esta comunidad se desarrollo a las faldas de los cerros.

La señora Bety es uno de los miembros de este grupo, ella tiene la edad de 49 años, estudio una carrera comercial y es madre soltera de tres hijos pero actualmente solo depende de ella el mas pequeño de nombre Jose Carlos de 13 años de edad que estudia la secundaria. Doña Bety platica que ella siempre ha tenido que trabajar para sacar adelante a sus hijos y darles estudios, ella inicio vendiendo artículos para el hogar (trastes, ollas, basos, platos y toperes) con sus amigos y vecinos de la comunidad pero conforme fueron pasando los años sus hijos crecieron y los gastos aumentaron y tenia que buscar la manera de obtener mas ingresos asi que como ella cocina muy rico decidió iniciar a vender antojitos mexicanos y comidas corridas desde su hogar y algunas veces hace entregas a domicilio,ella dijo  "ya tengo 6 años de vender articulos del hogar y 3 de vender comida y Gracias a Dios tengo mis clientes y hay vamos poco a poco buscando la manera de salir adelante".
Doña bety necesita este credito para invertirlo en la compra de chiles, tomates, cebolla, carne, crema, queso, aroz, frijol, variedad de frutas y verduras para realizar sus comidas y en la compra de artículos del hogar. 
Ella espera que con esta inversion su negocio continue progresando ya que sus planes a futuro son poner un pequeño restaurante.

los miembros de este grupo agradecen ala fundacion el apoyo que les esta dando por medio de este credito para que su negocio y calidad de vida mejoren.

los demás integrantes del grupo son:

Cristina venta de ropa 
Dulce maria reposteria 
Beatriz venta de joyeria 
Alma delia venta de joyeria 
Margarita venta de Perfumeria
Maria elena venta de pan  
Erika venta de fruta y verduras 
Esmeraldaventa de cosmeticos
texts.en:
The name of this group of 9 cheerful and hardworking women is "Regina."   Each woman has an economic activity that they are developing in order to help their spouses and get ahead with their families, providing them with a better quality of life.  This group is located in a sugar-cane producing region with a warm climate, as this community has developed in the foothills

Bety is one of the  members of this group.  She is 49 years old, and has a business degree.  She is the single mother of 3 children, but now only one of them is dependent upon her - the youngest, 13, who is named Jose Carlos and is in middle school.  

Bety says that she has always had to work in order to provide for her children and give them an education.  She started out selling items for the home (dishes, pots,  glasses, plates and containers) to her friends and neighbors in the community, but as the years went by her children grew and their expenses increased and she had to find a way to increase her income.  So, as she was a very good cook, she decided to start selling Mexican snacks and fast food from her home, and at times she also delivers them to people's homes.  She said "I've already been selling household items for 6 years and selling food for 3, and thanks to God I have my customers, and so gradually we are seeking a way to get ahead."  Bety needs this loan to invest in the purchase of chilies, tomatoes, onions, meat, cream, cheese, rice, beans, and a variety of fruits and vegetables to make her food, and also to buy some household products.  She hopes that with this investment her business will continue to make progress, since she plans in the future to establish a small restaurant. 

The members of this group are grateful to the Fundacion for the support that they are getting in the form of these loans for their businesses so that their quality of life can improve.  The other members of the group are:

Cristina, who sells clothing
Dulce Maria, who makes pastries
Beatriz, who sells jewelry 
Alma Delia, who sells jewelry
Margarita, who sells perfume
Maria Elena, who sells bread
Erika, who sells fruits and vegetables
Esmeralda, who sells cosmetics

loans.use: to buy chilies, tomatoes, onions, meat, cream, cheese, rice, beans, and a variety of fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié , père de deux enfants .Il pratique l'élevage intensif notamment l'embouche ovine.Il achète des moutons à bas prix dans les marchés hebdomadaires de sa localité, les engraisse avec un bon suivi vétérinaire avant de les revendre au bout de 6 mois sur les marchés de sa ville.Cette activité lui permet d'entretenir sa famille en leur satisfaisant l'essentiel de leurs besoins alimentaires, sanitaires, vestimentaires...Pour augmenter son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un prêt de 200 000f afin d'acheter 10 moutons. Son ambition est de renforcer son activité.
texts.en:
This borrower is a married man and the father of two children. He is in the business of raising livestock intensively, particularly the fattening of sheep. He buys sheep at low prices at the weekly markets in his town and then fattens them while providing good veterinary care before he resells them at the end of six months at city markets. This business enables him to care for his family by meeting their basic needs in terms of food, health care, clothing.... 

To increase his business capital, he is requesting a loan of 200,000 francs to buy ten sheep. His ambition is to bolster his business.

loans.use: to buy ten sheep

loans.name: Kuña Mbarete Group

texts.es:
Este Comité se formo gracias a una de las miembros quien se motivo por querer ayudar a cada una de ellas ya que todas tienen ganas de salir adelante por todo el esfuerzo que están realizando. El comité cuenta con 17 integrantes en donde todas tienen una pequeña actividad a la cual se dedican.
Una de las miembros es la señora Dionicia, quien nos comenta que con mucho sacrificio está saliendo adelante y con la ayuda de su negocio. Ella se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo, como ser remeras, camisas, pantalones y demás. Uno de sus sueños es poder seguir creciendo y de esa forma poder seguir ayudando con los gastos de la casa y la manutención de la familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de verano, con los cuales podrá abastecerse y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Agradece la oportunidad que se le está dando, ya que le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
This Committee formed thanks to one of the members who was motivated by the desire to help each one of them, since all want to do well in the work that they do.  The committee includes 17 members.  All have a small activity to which they are dedicated.  

One of the membres is Señora Dionicia, who tells us that with a lot of sacrifice and the aid of her business, she is doing well.  She is dedicated to the sale of clothing of all types, such as sweatshirts, shirts, pants and other things.  One of her dreams is to be able to continue growing and in that way to be able to continue helping with the household expenses and the maintenance of the family.  She requests the loan to purchase summer clothing, with which she will be able to be supplied and comply with the demand of her clients.  She is thankful for the opportunity that she is being given, since it will be of great aid to her.

loans.use: to buy summer clothes for later sale.

loans.name: Daba

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme mariée, mère de trois enfants.Pour améliorer les revenus de la famille, elle s'active dans un commerce de tissus et de produits de mercerie.Elle achète en gros des tissus dans la capitale et les revend à crédit à ses clients qui paient au bout de deux mois. Elle parvient à subvenir à certains de ses besoins et à participer aux besoins alimentaires et sanitaires des enfants.Pour renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite auprès de UIMCEC un pret de 200 000f pour acheter 10 rouleaux de tissus. Son ambition est d'acheter une cantine au marché central de sa ville.
texts.en:
The borrower is a married woman, mother to three children. 

To improve the family's income, she sells fabric and notions. She buys fabric wholesale in the capital city and resells it for credit to her customers who pay after two months. She manages to meet some of her needs and to contribute to the food and health needs of her children. 

To strengthen her business, she is requesting a loan of 200,000f from UIMCEC to buy 10 rolls of fabric. Her goal is to buy a canteen at the central market of her town.

loans.use: to buy 10 rolls of fabric.

loans.name: La Rosa Group

texts.es:
La Rosa es denominado el grupo formado por 10 mujeres de la ciudad de Caaguazú, ellas son todas amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad. Ellas forman parte del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de las fundación paraguaya. El objetivo de ellas es mejorar las condiciones de vida de todas y cada una de ellas, desean darle a su familia todo aquello a lo que ellas no pudieron acceder.
Monica es una de estas mujeres, ella se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de verduras. Ella comenta que gracias a la buena calidad de los productos que vende ya pudo formarse una buena clientela que siempre compran de ella. Una de sus metas es tener un propio local grande donde ofrecer sus productos.
Ella solicita el crédito para poder comprar tomates, cebollas, locotes, lechugas y demás tipos de verduras para poder estar abastecida para cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The "La Rosa" ["The Rose"] group is made up of ten women from the city of Caaguazú who are all friends and neighbors. They are part of the Entrepreneurial Women's Program of Fundación Paraguaya. The goal of these women is to improve each and every group member's quality of life. They want to give their families everything that they could not have themselves.

Monica is one of these women. She sells all types of vegetables. She comments that she has been able to develop a good clientele that always buys from her thanks to the good quality of her produce. One of Monica's goals is to have her own large location where she can offer her products. She is requesting this loan to buy tomatoes, onions, green peppers, lettuce, and other types of vegetables so that she can be well-stocked to meet her customers' demands.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, green peppers, lettuce, and other types of vegetables

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase chicken, beef, rice, beans, toilet paper and other products for her grocery store.

loans.name: Germaine

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme mariée qui vit avec son mari et leurs trois enfants.Elle exerce un commerce de produits alimentaires, sur une table installée devant son domicile.Elle s'approvisionne chaque soir dans une grande ville située à 15 km de son village et propose le lendemain matin aux femmes des légumes frais, du poisson et d'autres condiments. Son commerce lui permet de se prendre en charge et de participer à la satisfaction des besoins de sa famille. Elle sollicite un prêt de 150000f pour renforcer son fonds de commerce en achetant des légumes, du poisson et divers condiments. Son ambition est de s'installer au marché central.
texts.en:
The borrower is a married woman who lives with her husband and their three children. 

She runs a business selling food, on a table setup in front of her home. She gets her supplies every evening in a large town located 15km from her town and sells fresh vegetables, fish and other condiments to women the next morning. Her business allows her to take care of herself and to contribute to satisfying her family's needs. 

She is requesting a loan of 150,000f to strengthen her business by buying vegetables, fish and various condiments. Her goal is to setup her business at the central market.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fish and various condiments.

loans.name: San Blás Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres del presente comité son de la Cuidad de  Caacupé, Las Sras. del comité de San Blas, son personas muy trabajadoras, ellas están muy agradecidas con la fundación,   ya que les ha sido de suma ayuda todo el apoyo que han recibido.
La presidenta es la señora Marina, ella está casada y tiene hijos. Se dedica a la venta de comidas de todo tipo y a la vez también vende carne. Comenta Marina que ella trabaja todos días desde muy temprano para empezar a preparar los alimentos que vende y también para atender a los clientes que desde muy tempranas horas vienen a llevar cortes de carne. Uno de sus sueños es poder tener una gran tienda donde ofrecer más variedad de productos a sus clientes.
Ellas solicita el crédito para la compra de cortes de carne, con lo cual podrá surtirse y de esa forma tener más carne en stock y de esa forma estar preparada para las fiestas que es cuando más ventas tiene.
texts.en:
The women of this commnual bank are frrom the city of Caacupe. The ladies of the San Blas communal bank are very hardworking people. They are very grateful to the Fundacion for all the support they have received as it has been a great help to them.

Señora Marina is the president. She is married and has children. She sells all kinds of food as well as meat. Marina says that she works every day from early in the morning so as to prepare the food she sells and also see to customers who come at an early hour to buy cuts of meat. One of her dreams is to have a large store where she can offer her customers a larger variety of products.

She is asking for the loan to buy cuts of meat with which to stock up and so have more meat in stock to be ready for the holidays which is when she makes more sales.

loans.use: to buy meat for subsequent resale.

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORTY YUNGAQUI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maruja; ella tiene 37 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ganados, ella los hace engordar y luego los vende en las distintas ferias del distrito de Anta, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de compra y venta de ganados. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar un ganado.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of Señor de Ccoyllorty Yungaqui Communal Bank, located in the Anta District which is part of the province of Anta and the department of Cusco.

Maruja is 37 years old and has a live-in partner and four children. She alternates her daily activities with her business buying and selling livestock. She fattens them and later sells them at the various fairs in the Anta District. She works from 8am to 6pm and this business serves as a means for her to get her children ahead. Her dream is to expand her business buying and selling livestock. She is requesting this loan to purchase livestock.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Piribebuy Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres del presente comité son de la Cuidad de Caacupé.Las Sras. del comité Virgen del Rosario, son personas muy trabajadoras, luchadoras y muy emprendedoras. Ellas se unieron con el objetivo de mejorar el estilo de vida de sus hijos y familiares.
La señora Fidelina es la presidenta del grupo, ella está casada, y tiene hijos. Comenta que se dedica a la venta de ropas de todo tipo. Ella lleva ya un tiempo en esto por lo que ya tiene un poco de experiencia y gracias a eso es que ya se formó una buena clientela que siempre compran de ella. 
Ella solicita el crédito para comprar prendas, como ser remeras, camisas, pantalones, y demás tipos, con los cuales tendrá más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes, ya que se acerca la época de navidad y año nuevo que es cuando tiene más demandas.
texts.en:
The women from this communal bank are from the city of Caacupe. The ladiies of the Virgen del Rosario communal bank are very hardworking women, determined and enterprising. They came together with the goal of improving their children's and relatives lifestyle.

Señora Fidelina is the president of the group. She is married and has children. She says that she sells all kinds of clothes. She has been doing this work for quite a while and already has some experience. Thanks to this she has been able attract a good customer base who always buy from her.

She is asking for the loan to buy items such as T-shirts, shorts, pants and other items to have more variety to offer her customers as the holiday season is approaching and New Year is when she has the most demand.

loans.use: to buy clothes for subsequent resale.

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de leche,ella vende leche en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m y tambien la socia se dedica al negocio de venta y crianza de chanchos,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a los hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local para vender la leche y tambien ampliar el negocio de crianza de chanchos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar leche y tambien comprar chanchos

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Bernardina continues to dedicate herself to the milk business. She sells milk on an itinerant basis from 8:00 a.m. until 4:00 p.m. She is also engaged in selling and raising pigs. By means of these businesses she is helping her children progress.

Bernardina’s dream is to have a shop for selling milk and also to enlarge her business of raising pigs. She is applying for the loan in order to purchase milk and also to buy pigs. She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase milk and pigs.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras De Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Emprendedoras de Maria Auxiliadora es el grupo formado por 11 mujeres de la zona del chaco, estas mujeres se encuentran en el tercer ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación paraguaya. Estas mujeres tienen el deseo de salir adelante y mediante el trabajo en conjunto poder ayudarse las unas a las otras.
Norma se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, nos cuenta que le va muy bien en las ventas puesto que tiene muchas clientas que le solicitan sus productos. Gracias a este trabajo ella puede salir adelante y ayudar a su familia y también cubrir los gastos que día a día surgen en la casa. Una de sus metas es tener un local donde pueda vender sus productos.
ella solicita el crédito para la compra de cosméticos de todas las clases, para que de esa forma pueda cumplir con los pedidos que tiene.
texts.en:
Mujeres Emprendedoras de María Auxiliadora is a group made up of 11 women from the El Chaco area.  These women are in the third cycle of Fundación Paraguaya's program for women entrepreneurs.  These women want to get ahead and be able to help each other by working together. 

Norma works selling cosmetics.  She tells us that her sales are going very well for her because she has lots of customers who request products from her.  Thanks to this job she can get ahead and help her family and also cover the daily costs that come up in her house.  One of her goals is to have a place where she can sell her products. 

She is requesting the loan to buy all types of cosmetics so she can fill the orders she has.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Damas Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El comité Damas Trabajadoras nace mediante la gestión y el apoyo de un grupo de mujeres que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar. Las integrantes del comité fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas en lo personal como laboral, son un grupo de 21 señoras emprendedoras.
La Sra. Mirta es la presidenta del grupo, tiene 32 años, ella es una mujer muy emprendedora  y capaz de liderar un grupo numeroso como lo es este, durante todos estos ciclos ha demostrado ganas de superación.  Ella se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos, como ser de frazadas, sabanas, fundas y demás. Comenta que le va muy bien y que siempre tiene muy buenos pedidos por lo que le gustaría poder seguir con su negocio.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de sabanas, frazadas, y demás tipos de productos para poder cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The communal bank Damas Trabajadoras was created through the undertaking and the support of a group of women who were working in this place. The members of the bank focused their main objective as the growth of each them personally and in their work, as a group of 21 entrepreneurs.

Mirta is the president of the group. She is 32 years old. She is a very enterprising woman and capable of leading a large group like this one. Through all the loan cycles she has demonstrated the passion to excel. 

She sells all types of products, such as blankets, sheets, pillowcases, and other things. She says that she is doing well and that she always has many good orders and this is why she would like to be able to continue with her business.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy sheets, blankets, and other types of products in order to fulfill the requests of her clients.

loans.use: to buy sheets, blankets, and other products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy carrots, plantains, yucca, cabbage, sweet peppers, lemons and oranges.

loans.name: Ocomisto Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “OCOMISTO” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Lucia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: producción de leche, tienda de barrio, venta de objetos, venta de zapatos.

La señora Lucia,  indica que hace un año que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta zapatos viene trabajando hace años atrás, aprendiendo el mismo desde sus familiares.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra calzados) que adquirirá de La Paz y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación y el área de salud.
texts.en:
The Ocomisto communal bank will begin its first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Los Andes regional office.  It is made up of eight members and managed by a board of directors headed by Lucia.  The businesses that the bank members carry out are varied, among which we have milk production, a neighborhood store, sales of goods, and shoe sales.

Lucia indicates that she has been working with Pro Mujer for a year and that she joined the institution on the invitation of a facilitator.  Currently she has a business selling shoes that she has had for years, having learned it from family members.

The loan she will get now is to increase her capital buying footwear that she will acquire in La Paz and later sell on order.  This form of work allows her to generate resources to support her family, since she is married and has four children.

When you ask her what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the training and the health area.

loans.use: to buy footwear.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El Sr. Juan es de la ciudad de Carapeguá, tiene 46 años de edad y es soltero. Él  trabaja  como vendedor ambulante de productos de artesanía como ser hamacas, sabanas, frazadas, ya que una de sus hermanas trabaja en una empresa grande donde hay muchos empleados. Él  vende sus productos a los empleados y  cobra quincenalmente por los mismos. Tiene mucha aceptación entre los mismos debido a la facilidad de pago que proporciona a su clientela. Además se dedica también a la agricultura y la ganadería. 
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hamacas, frazadas, fajas y sábanas puesto que tiene muchos pedidos de estos productos, principalmente para fin de año. Agradece por la oportunidad que le están dando kiva y la fundación.
texts.en:
Juan is from the city of Carapeguá.  He is 46 years old and single.  He works as a street vendor selling handcrafted products such as hammocks, sheets, and blankets, since one of his sisters works in a large company that has lots of employees.  He sells his products to the employees and collects payment from them every two weeks.  He has a lot of success with them because of the ease of payment he provides his customers.  He also works in agriculture and livestock.

He is requesting the loan to buy hammocks, blankets, belts, and sheets because he has lots of orders for these products, principally for the end of the year.

He is grateful for the opportunity that Kiva and the foundation are giving him.

loans.use: to buy hammocks, blankets, belts, and sheets to sell.

loans.name: Raymundo

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. Raymundo; el tiene 62 años de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de loseria como platos,ollas entre otros utensilios,el socio ahora tambien tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra maiz,papa y habas,por medio de estos negocios el socio saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño del socio es ampliar el local para la venta de loseria y tambien mejorar el negocio de agricultura . El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar tazas,platos y adornos de loza al por mayor y tambien para comprar semillas y ferlizantes para las tieeras de cultivo.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member is Raymundo.  He is 62 years old and married with three children.  He continues working selling earthenware plates, pots, and other utensils.  Now he also has a plot of land where he grows corn, potatoes, and beans.  With these businesses he gets his children ahead.  His dream is to expand the space for selling earthenware and also to improve his agriculture business.

He is requesting the loan to buy earthenware cups, plates, and ornaments wholesale and also to buy seeds and fertilizer for his crops.

The member is grateful to those who are part of this dream by means of this and pledges to making his payments by the established deadline.

loans.use: to buy earthenware cups, plates, and decorations wholesale and to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Ciriaco

texts.es:
El Sr. Ciriaco tiene 46 años de edad, es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo. El trabajó desde muy joven como taxista, y nos comenta que con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio  logro  comprar  para su vehículo y la parada.
El Sr. Ciriaco cuenta con una gran clientela; y dice que con este trabajo logro mejorar su vivienda y darle la educación necesaria a sus hijos, ya que ellos son lo principal para el, y el motivo por el cual se esfuerza cada día más y más.
El necesita de este crédito para la compra cubiertas para taxi.  Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad que le dan, pues le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Ciriaco is 46 years old and from the city of San Lorenzo. He has worked since he was young as a taxi driver. He tells us that through strength and sacrifice he has managed to buy his vehicle and the stand.

Ciriaco has a large client base, and he says that this work allows him to improve his housing and pay for the necessary education for his children, as they are the priority for him and the reason that he struggles each day more and more.

He needs a loan in order to buy seat covers for his taxi. He thanks the foundation and Kiva for the opportunity given to him as it will be very helpful.

loans.use: to buy seat covers for use in the taxi

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Francisca; tiene 59 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 10 hijos; La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de platos,ollas,tazas y adornos de material de loza,la socia trabaja desde las 8.00 a.m hasata las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este negcoio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de loseria . La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar tazas,platos,ollas y adornos de loza para implementar su tienda.

 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member's name is Francisca. She is 59 years old, married and has 10 children. She still has her business selling china plates, bowls, cups, and decorations. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. and with this business she gets her children ahead. Her dream is to expand and improve her her china selling business. She is asking for this loan to buy china cups, plates, bowls, and decorations to stock her store. 

Francisca is grateful for the loan she has asked for and she is committed to making her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy china cups, plates, bowls, and decorations to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn and wheat.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
Este grupo surgió por contacto de una de las integrantes con la fundación,  el grupo se encuentra en el octavo ciclo, opera con la Fundación desde el año 2006.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. María quien tiene 2 hijos, está acompañada con el Señor Ramon, su marido trabaja en la Argentina  y ella se dedica a la vta de ropas.Cuenta que le va muy bien ya que siempre tiene muchos pedidos de las prendas que tiene, es por ello que solicita el crédito, para poder abastecerse y de esa forma poder cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
Todas las señoras del grupo al igual que Maria están muy agradecidas por la oportunidad que les da la fundación y kiva de acceder a la ayuda.
texts.en:
