Le wants to have a loan of 14,580,000 Vietnam dong to solve this problem.

loans.use: to pay for her son's tuition fees and other expenses.

loans.name: La

texts.en: La is taking the loan out for her daughter, Vui.  With the hope of being a curator for a museum, Vui entered Hanoi Cultural University.  Her course lasts 4 years, and it will be completed by June, 2013. During studying, she has difficulties in paying fees and managing daily expenses since she is living far from home. But now, La wants to have a loan of 4,374,000 Vietnam dong to buy Vui a new computer.

loans.use: to buy a computer for her daughter.

loans.name: Nesbit

texts.en: Nesbit is a single young man. He has no children yet. He describes himself as a quiet and jovial man. He provides bicycle services to students and the staff of a nearby school. He has been in this business for five years. His business challenge is the lack of a permanent place during sunny days. He will be using the loan of Kes 5,000 to buy another bicycle to increase the mode of transportation. Nesbit's goal is to own several motorbikes in the next five years.

loans.use: To buy another bicycle.

loans.name: Tarcela

texts.en:
Tarcela is a 52-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She and her husband run a fishing business in their town. Tarcela also manages a small sari-sari (variety) store business. She sells items like canned goods, eggs, shampoo and soap. She works hard to improve their income.

She has requested this loan to purchase fishing nets and other materials. Tarcela hopes to earn better and be able to sustain her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets and other materials.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en: Teresa is married and has eight children ranging from six to thirty years. She describes herself as an ambitious woman. For the last two years she has been running a grocery store, and sells oranges, cabbages, paw paw, bananas and mangoes. The business is located in a conducive and strategic place as customers can easily access it. Her business challenge is inadequate funds to add to the stock. She will be using the loan of Kes 20,000 to buy more cabbages, paw paw, bananas and mangoes. Teresa's goal and hope is to develop her business into wholesale.

loans.use: To buy more cabbages, paw paw, bananas and mangoes.

loans.name: Amina Suleiman

texts.en: Amina is 32 years old, married, and has six children ranging from eight months old to fifteen years. She describes herself as a focused and social woman. She has been selling doughnuts to residents for the last three years. Her business is located in a busy area. Amina's business challenge is inadequate funds. She will use the loan of Kes 20,000 to buy more wheat flour. In the next five years, she hopes to expand her retail store.

loans.use: To buy more wheat flour.

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en:
Alaa is a 24-year-old university student who lives with his parents and brothers and sisters. He is in his fourth year, and majored in computer science. He hopes to make something of himself one day.
In addition to being a student, Alaa also works for the electricity company in the mornings before going to his classes to help support himself and help his parents with expenses. He is requesting a loan to pay his fees for the remaining semesters so he can gain a full-time job or even start his own business and achieve his dream of making something of himself.

loans.use: to pay his fees for the remaining semesters.

loans.name: Alia

texts.en:
Alia is a 53-year-old married woman. She lives with her husband and four children, just outside of Amman.
Wanting to help her husband and participate in handling the household expenses, Alia started a small project sewing on buttons and repairing clothes for her family, friends and neighbors. Then she bought a sewing machine and started a small clothes repair shop just beside her house where she repairs clothes in addition to customizing outfits and such like. 
Alia is requesting a loan to buy another sewing machine to increase her productivity and increase her profits by serving more customers. In this way, she will be able to help her family to improve its lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy another sewing machine.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en: Eunice 50 years old, married, and has six children ranging from twenty-three to thirty-five years. She describes herself as an honest and efficient woman. She has been running a butcher shop for nine years. She has one employee. Her business is located in a busy and favorable market. Her business challenge is shortages of cows and goats. She will be using the loan of Kes 20,000 to buy a goat and sheep for slaughtering. Eunice hopes to own a van to aid in the delivery of meat to her customers in the next five years.

loans.use: To buy a goat and sheep for slaughtering.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is married and has two children, ages four and six. He describes himself as an honest man. He has been involved in providing taxi transportation services for the last ten years. His customers are residents within his town area. He faces a challenge of inadequate funds for improving his business. He will use the loan Kes 20,000 to buy taxi spare tires. Peter's hope and goal is to expand his business in the next five years.

loans.use: To buy taxi spare tires.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en: Lilian 26 years old, married, and has two children, ages three and six years. She describes herself as an honest and visionary woman. She sells clothes to residents in her home area. Her business involves movement from one place to another as she sells to customers, and this challenges her. She will be using the loan of Kes 20,000 to buy clothes to sell. Lilian's goal and hope is to run a boutique in the next five years.

loans.use: To buy more clothes for selling.

loans.name: Bunthon

texts.en:
Bunthon is a 37-year-old father of six dependent children: two daughters and four sons. Some of them are in school while the others work in the cassava field. He has been working as a policeman for 19 years, and he supplements his income to better support his family by planting cassava on his own farmland. He has been in the cassava business for five years. 

Bunthon has been with VisionFund since 2009. The loans from VisionFund have helped him plant cassava to full capacity, with earnings to supply his family's basic needs. Now he is requesting another loan. He will use this loan to buy construction materials, e.g., cement, sand, etc., to renovate his house. He hopes this loan will enable him to have a decent house to live in. He also hopes to make more cassava this loan cycle and set aside some money to buy a motorbike and keep his children in school.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for house renovation

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en: Caroline 22 years old, married to a teacher, and has two children, ages two and nine years. She describes herself as an honest woman. She has been selling milk for the last year to residents in her home area. Her business faces the challenges of the variation of purchase price from the customers and insufficient funds. She will use the loan of Kes10,000 to buy more litres of milk. Caroline's hope is to be selling one hundred litres a day. She also looks forward to offering her children the best education.

loans.use: To buy more litres of milk.

loans.name: Emelda

texts.en: Emelda 49 years old and the single mother of a twenty-four-year-old daughter. She is an honest and efficient woman. She runs a grocery store and sells fruits such as apples, bananas, mangoes and watermelons. She has been in this business for eleven years. She has three employees. Her business challenge is shortages of stock. She will be using the loan of Kes 20,000 to renovate her business premises. Emelda's hope and dream is to run a restaurant and to provide rental house services in the next five years.

loans.use: To renovate her business premises.

loans.name: Alassane

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune célibataire qui exerce dans la distribution de chaines de télévision par branchement sur câble.Son activité est très rentable du fait de la forte demande des ménages en branchement sur les chaines de télévision.Il emploie ainsi cinq jeunes qui l'assistent dans ses interventions à travers les 30 quartiers de sa ville.Il vit avec ses deux parents et ses frères et sœurs qu'il prend tous en charge tant sur le plan alimentaire, sanitaire que scolaire.Pour renforcer son équipement , il sollicite un prêt de 500 000f afin d'acheter 24 décodeurs, 1 amplificateur et 4 caisses de câble d'une longueur de 1 km 200.Son ambition est d'acheter une voiture pour faciliter ses nombreux déplacements et surtout d'ouvrir sa propre chaîne de télévision.
texts.en: The borrower is a young single man who installs cable for TV. Due to a high demand for cable, this activity is very profitable. He employs 5 young men who help him with these installations in the 30 neighborhood of the city. He lives with his parents, his brothers, and his sisters. He takes care of all of them by paying for their food, medical expenses, and school fees. To increase his stock, he is applying for a 500 000f loan so he can buy 24 decoders, 1 amplifier, and 4 rolls of cable, each 1.2 km long. His ambition is to buy a car to make his many trips easier, but above all, to launch his own television channel.

loans.use: buy 24 decoders, 1 amplifier, and 4 rolls of cable, each 1.2 km long

loans.name: Wako

texts.en: Wako 54 years old, married, and has seven children ranging from five to thirty years. He describes himself as an honest and faithful man. He has been running a general store for two years. He sells items such as flour, sugar and khat (a mild stimulant, legal in Kenya). His business challenge is inadequate stock. He will use the loan of Kes 10,000 to buy more sugar, flour, sweets and khat. Wako's hope and dream is to run another retail shop in the next five years.

loans.use: To add stock of products such as flour, sugar, sweets and khat.

loans.name: Soda

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme mariée qui exerce dans la friperie depuis trois ans.Elle achète dans la capitale une balle de friperie et revend les vêtements au détail à domicile.Son activité s'avère très rentable et lui procure des bénéfices consistants lui permettant de prendre en charge les frais scolaire et d'habillement de ses 6 enfants qui vont tous à l'école.Elle parvient aussi à participer à l'amélioration de l'alimentation de la famille, en soutien à son mari. Afin d'augmenter son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un prêt de 300000f de l'UIMCEC pour acheter 1 balle de vêtements. Son ambition est de construire sa propre maison.
texts.en: The borrower is a married woman who has been in the business of second-hand clothes for 3 years. She buys clothes in bales in the capital and resells them retail at her house. This activity is actually quite profitable; she makes some substantial profits which enable her to pay for the school fees and clothes of her 6 children, who all go to school. She also manages to ensure better feeding for her family by supporting her husband. In order to strengthen her business, she is applying for a 300000f loan from UIMCEC so she can buy 1 bale of clothes. Her goal is to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy 1 bale of clothes.

loans.name: Fama

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme mariée, mère de 5 enfants dont les 2 sont des élèves et les 3 autres des pêcheurs.Elle exerce le commerce de poissons frais, de poisson fumé et séché.Elle s'approvisionne dans sa ville et voyage pour vendre  son produits à travers les marchés hebdomadaires qui se tiennent dans plusieurs localités du pays.Cette activité quoique très dure, lui permet quand même de prendre en charge les dépenses d'entretien de sa famille et même de soutenir souvent son mari pêcheur pour les frais de pêche.Afin d'augmenter son fonds de commerce et améliorer ses revenus, elle sollicite un prêt de 300000f pour acheter 1000kg de poisson fumé. Son ambition est de construire un magasin de vente de produits alimentaires devant son domicile et se reposer ainsi des dures voyages.
texts.en: The borrower is a married woman and the mother of 5 children, 2 of whom go to school. The other 3 are fishermen. She sells fresh, smoked, and dried fish. She buys the fish in her city and travels around her region to sell it in various daily markets. This activity, although very hard, enables her to take care of her family financially and even, sometimes, to help her husband, a fisherman, pay for his fishing expenses. To strengthen her business and increase her income, she is applying for a 300000f loan to buy 1000kg (approximately 2200 lbs) of smoked fish. Her goal is to open a small food store in front of her house so she can finally rest after all this strenuous traveling.

loans.use: to buy 1000kg .of smoked fish

loans.name: Halima

texts.en: Halima is 60 years old, married, and has four children ranging in age from twenty-five to thirty years. She describes herself as a courageous, energetic and passionate woman. She has been selling clothes and perfumes for the last seven years. The business is in a strategic location. Her business faces a challenge of the increased price of goods. She will use the loan of Kes 20,000 to buy more clothes. Halima's hope and dream is to run a bigger clothes store in the next five years.

loans.use: To buy more clothes for selling.

loans.name: Khassim

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune célibataire , chauffeur de métier.Il s'active dans le commerce et la location de véhicules.Il achète des véhicules d'occasion, les retape et les revend à un bon prix.Il loue également aux touristes des voitures pour leurs circuits à travers le pays.Il accumule deux ans d'expérience dans cette activité qui lui rapporte des bénéfices consistants lui permettant de prendre en charge ses deux parents ainsi que ses frères et sœurs.Afin de renforcer ses revenus, il sollicite un pet de 300000f pour réparer un véhicule destiné à la vente en achetant des pignons, des portières neuves et des coussins. Son ambition est de créer une agence de voyage et de location de voitures.
texts.en: The lender is a young single man, a driver by profession. He works in the vehicle rental business. He buys second hand vehicles, renovates them and resells them for a good price. He also rents cars to tourists, for their journeys across the country. He now has two years experience in this business, giving him consistent profits which allow him to support his two parents, as well as his brothers and sisters. In order to increase his turnover, he is seeking a loan of 300,000f to repair a vehicle for resale - to buy parts, new doors and car seats. His ambition is to create a travel and care rental agency.

loans.use: to buy some car spare parts, new doors and seats

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en: Lucy is married and has six children ranging in age from twenty-three to thirty-five years. She describes herself as a decisive woman. She has been selling maize for the last twenty-four years. Her business is in a strategic location. Lucy faces the challenge of insufficient funds. She will use the loan of Kes 20,000 to purchase more bags of maize. In the future, Lucy hopes to expand her business and buy a piece of land for her family.

loans.use: To buy more bags of maize.

loans.name: Missa

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un artiste décorateur de métier.Devant les difficultés que rencontre ce secteur, il a ouvert une boutique de vente de produits céréaliers.Il est célibataire et vit avec ses deux parents et ses trois frères et 2 sœurs dont l'une est élève au lycée. Sa boutique lui rapporte des revenus qui lui permettent de prendre en charge correctement les dépenses d'entretien de s a famille.Pour augmenter ses bénéfices, il sollicite un pret de 200000f afin d'acheter du mil, de l'arachide, des haricots et de l'huile de palm.Son ambition est d'élargir son commerce.
texts.en: The lender is a painter and decorator by profession. Given the difficulties in this industry, he has opened a shop selling cereal products. He is single and lives with his two parents, and his three brothers and 2 sisters - one of whom is in high school. His shop generates income allowing him to support his family's basic living expenses. To increase his profits, he is requesting a loan of 200,000f in order to purchase millet, groundnut, beans and palm oil. He hopes to grow his business in the future.

loans.use: to buy millet, groundnut, beans and palm oil.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is a married man. He has 3 children with ages ranging from 27 years to 34 years. He describes himself as honest. He provides taxi transportation. He has been involved in this business for 7 years. His business is located in a highly populated area. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy taxi spare tires. His business goal is to expand his business and be the best provider of this service in the area within 5 years.

loans.use: To buy taxi spare tires.

loans.name: Ndeye Penda Ndiaye

texts.fr: Madame Ndeye  est âgée d’une trentaine d’années  et habite dans une des banlieues  du territoire sénégalais. Elle s’active dans le secteur du commerce et commercialise des produits cosmétiques. Elle gère une boutique qui est localisée dans sa zone d’habitation. Elle a choisi son activité par nécessité. Elle est membre de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC  depuis 2005. Elle a déjà remboursé un crédit antérieur. Elle sollicite un crédit de  150 000 frs prévu pour honorer ses engagements vis-à-vis de ses fournisseurs en produits cosmétiques. Son objectif est de développer son activité de commerce, d’accroitre ses bénéfices ce qui lui permettra de mieux se prendre en charge et soutenir ses parents
texts.en:
Madam Ndeye is around 30 years old and lives in one of the suburbs of the senegalese territory. She is active in business and commercializes cosmetics. She manages a shop that is located in the region where she lives. She chose her business out of necessity. 

She has been a member of one of the branches of the UIMCEC since 2005. She has already repaid one previous loan. She is requesting a loan of 150,000f to honor her commitments with her cosmetics suppliers. Her objective is to develop her business, and to grow her profits which will allow her to better take care of herself and support her parents.

loans.use: to pay for an order of cosmetics from her suppliers.

loans.name: Khady

texts.fr: Madame Khady vit  au Sénégal et est âgée  de 42 ans. Elle s’active dans le secteur du commerce et vend  tissus et  chaussures. Elle a choisi son activité par nécessité dans le but de se procurer des revenus. Elle n’a jamais contracté de prêt au sein de l’institution. Elle sollicite  un crédit de 100 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de nouveaux produits destinés a la vente.  Son objectif est d’augmenter ses bénéfices pour acquérir un  niveau  de vie meilleur.
texts.en:
Madam Khady lives in Sénégal and is 42 years old. She is active in business and sells fabric and shoes. She chose her business out of necessity with the goal of bringing in income. 

She has never requested a loan within this institution. She is requesting a 100,000f loan to buy new products to sell. Her objective is to increase her profits to achieve a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fabric and shoes to resell.

loans.name: Adama

texts.fr: Monsieur Adama est un menuisier qui vit dans une des banlieues  du Sénégal. Il évolue dans la menuiserie et fabrique des lits, armoires, coiffeuses et autres meubles qui sont destinés à la vente. Il a choisi son métier  par amour. C’est un ancien sociétaire du guichet de l’U-IMCEC de sa zone d’habitation. Il y a déjà remboursé 4 prêts antérieurs. Il sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de bois qui sera utilisé pour la fabrication de meubles en vue de  satisfaire une commande de son client. Ce financement pourra contribuer à l’accroissement de ses revenus et a l’amélioration des conditions de vie sociale de sa famille pour une période bien déterminée.
texts.en:
Adama is a carpenter who lives in one of the suburbs of Sénégal. He is advancing in carpentry and makes beds, cabinets, dressing tables and other furniture to sell. He chose his profession out of love. 

He is an old member of the UIMCEC branch where he lives. He has already repaid four previous loans. He is requesting a 100,000f loan to buy wood which will be used to make furniture in order to satisfy an order from his customer. This financing will contribute to the growth of his income and the improvement of the social living conditions of his family for a well determined period.

loans.use: to buy wood to make furniture and deliver an order.

loans.name: Amy

texts.fr: Amy    habite dans une banlieue au Sénégal  et est âgée  de 32 ans. Elle évolue dans le secteur du commerce. Elle s’adonne à la vente de tissus  et d’habits prêt a porter. Elle a choisi son activité par nécessité dans le but d’augmenter ses revenus. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC de la localité ou elle habite et a déjà remboursé un crédit  antérieur dans l’institution. Elle sollicite un prêt de 100 000 frs prévu pour honorer ses commandes de tissus vis a  vis de ses fournisseurs. Son objectif est de développer son activité de commerce en augmentant ses bénéfices pour  mieux se prendre en charge ,mais aussi soutenir son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes
texts.en:
Amy lives in a suburb of Sénégal and is 32 years old. She is advancing in her business. She devotes herself to the sale of fabric and ready to wear clothing. She chose her business out of necessity with the goal of increasing her income. 

She is a member of one of the branches of the UIMCEC in the region where she lives and has already repaid a previous loan with the institution. She is requesting a 100,000f loan to honor her fabric orders from her suppliers. Her goal is to develop her business by increasing her profits to better take care of herself, but also support her husband in managing daily expenses.

loans.use: to pay for her order of fabric to resell.

loans.name: Aliou

texts.fr: Monsieur Aliou vit dans une des localités de la banlieue sénégalaise. Il est âgé de 51 ans et évolue dans le secteur du commerce. Il fabrique des fourneaux qu’il fournit à des commerçants revendeurs. Il a choisi son métier par amour. Il est sociétaire dans l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC  ou il a déjà remboursé 2 prêts  antérieurs. Il sollicite un crédit de 150 000 frs prévu pour pré financer une commande passée par un de ses clients. Le crédit lui permettra d’accroitre ses revenus et de régler ses quelques besoins quotidiens et personnels.
texts.en:
Aliou lives in one of the sénégalese suburbs. He is 51 years old and is advancing in his business. He makes stoves which he supplies to resellers. He chose his profession out of love. 

He is a member of one of the branches of the UIMCEC where he has already repaid two previous loans. He is requesting a 150,000f loan to prefinance an order from one of his customers. This loan will allow him to grow his income and to take care of his few daily and personal needs.

loans.use: to prefinance an order of stoves.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric to sew and resell.

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en:
This is 36 year-old Aminata. She is married with 4 children aged 18, 10, 12 and 6 years. She has 4 additional dependents who live with her to attend school. 

In 2006, Aminata established her business, selling clothing and slippers, because she believed she could earn enough profit to help her husband provide a livelihood for their family. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she earns about SLL 1,200,000 every month. She would like a loan in the amount of SLL 3,000,000 to buy more clothing and slippers for her business. 

In the future, Aminata plans to grow her business into a very big shop and to buy a piece of land. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more clothing and slippers for her business.

loans.name: Fatoumata

texts.fr: Madame Fatoumata  est âgée  de 35 ans. Elle habite dans une banlieue du Sénégal. Elle évolue dans le secteur du commerce et pratique la vente de  tissus et d’accessoires de femmes. Elle a choisi son activité par nécessité. Elle est  membre du guichet de l’U-IMCEC de  sa zone d’habitation depuis 9 mois. Elle sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de produits  destinés a renouveler son stock. Son objectif est de développer son  activité, accroitre ses bénéfices pour mieux se prendre en charge et soutenir ses proches.
texts.en:
Madam Fatoumata is 35 years old. She lives in a suburb of Sénégal. She is advancing in business and sells fabric and women's accessories. She chose her business out of necessity.

She has been a member of the UIMCEC branch in the area where she lives for nine months. She is requesting a loan of 100,000f to buy products to renew her stock. Her goal is to develop her business, and grow her profits to better take care of herself and support those close to her.

loans.use: to buy fabric and women's accessories to resell.

loans.name: Diana Marbelly

texts.es:
Diana, 33 años de edad, originaria de León, de oficio comerciante se dedica a la venta de mariscos. Ella nos comparte su experiencia vivida con el primer préstamo Kiva ya que la ayudo a comprar un freezer para almacenar su producto ahora tiene capacidad de almacenar 300 libras de mariscos, esta muy agradecida por el apoyo recibido que la ayudado mucho a impulsar su negocio. 
Ella requiere un segundo crédito para compra al por de mariscos. Pues con esta inversión pretende satisfacer parte de la demanda de sus clientes además de seguir con sus planes de mejorar su local y reparar su hogar.
texts.en:
Diana is 33 years old and is a native of León.  She makes a living selling seafood.  She describes her experience with her first Kiva loan, which helped her to purchase a freezer for storing her products.  She now has the capacity to store 300 pounds of seafood.  She is very grateful for the support she received, which helped her a lot by giving a boost to her business.

Diana needs a second loan so that she can purchase seafood.  She hopes that she can satisfy some of her customers’ demand with this loan.  She also hopes to continue with her plans to improve her premises and to repair her home.

loans.use: to purchase seafood.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
This is 35 year-old Regina. She is married and has 3 children aged 18, 14, and 9 years. She has 2 additional dependents, who help her with her business. 

In 2006, Regina established her pub. She began her business because she wanted to be self-employed so that she could support her family. Working 7 days a week and 6 hours a day, she earns about SLL 1,600,000 every month. She would like a loan in the amount of SLL 5,000,000 to buy more drinks for her business. In the future, Regina plans to build a house and to educate her children to the university level. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more drinks for her business.

loans.name: Tamsir

texts.fr: Monsieur Tamsir est âgé de 49 ans. Il vit au Sénégal. Il évolue dans le secteur du commerce et gère une boutique de détaillant de produits alimentaires. Il a choisi son activité par nécessité dans le souci de se procurer  des revenus. Il est membre de ce guichet de l’U-IMCEC  depuis 10 ans. Il y a déjà remboursé 4 prêts antérieurs. Il sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de produits alimentaires destinés a renforcer son stock. Son objectif est de développer son activité de commerce, augmenter ses bénéfices pour mieux prendre en charge  ses besoins personnels et aussi soutenir ses parents.
texts.en:
Tamsir is 49 years old. He lives in Sénégal. He is advancing in his business and manages a retail shop selling food products. He chose his business out of necessity due to the worry of procuring an income.

He has been a member of this UIMCEC branch for 10 years. He has already repaid four previous loans. He is requesting a 300,000f loan to buy food products to strengthen his stock. His objective is to develop his business and increase his profits to better take care of his personal needs and also support his parents.

loans.use: to buy food products to resell.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María, de 60 años de edad, habitante de la ciudad de León, de oficio comerciante, madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos. Lleva 20 años de ser comerciante tiene una pulpería en su casa de habitación además de vender mercadería en general, puso este  negocio con capital propio y con ayuda de financiamientos que ha sido claves para su crecimiento. Anteriormente trabajo durante 15 años atendiendo una farmacia. 
Ella realizo el préstamo para compra de granos básicos, productos de limpieza, sopas, enlatados, aceite. La inversión en este tipo de inventario es de suma importancia pues son productos muy solicitados por sus clientes. Uno de sus planes es comprar un freezer pues desea vender pollo y carnes.
texts.en:
María, age 60, lives in the city of León. She is a merchant. She is a single mother with 3 children. For 20 years she has had a shop in her house selling general merchandise. She started this business with her own capital and with financial help that has been the key to its growth. Previously, she worked for 15 years in a pharmacy.

She wants the loan in order to purchase basic grains, cleaning products, soaps, canned goods, and cooking oil. The investment in this type of inventory is of great importance since they are products much sought after by her customers. One of her plans is to buy a freezer since she wants to sell chicken and meat.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, cleaning products, soaps, canned goods, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Eddy Andres

texts.es:
Eddy, de 38 años de edad nacido en La comunidad llamada Salinas Grande localizada en las afueras de León se dedica a las pesca, es padre de tres hijos  de 14 ,11 y 5 años de edad los cuales están estudiando. El inicio con su negocio por medio de su actividad diaria la pesca cuando logro comprar su lancha, aprendió a negociar y ver cuales eran los tipos de mariscos mas solicitados por sus clientes. Hoy en día el tiene un pequeño centro de acopio donde compra y vender pescado al  detalle. El vende sus productos en las comunidades cercanas. El es muy emprendedor pues una de sus expectativas es lograr exportar sus mariscos fuera del país.
El requiere el préstamo para compra de pescados para poder comercializar al por mayor. Uno de sus planes es lograr hacer contrato con una empresa de exportación de mariscos.
texts.en:
Eddy, age 38, was born in a community called Salinas Grande located in the outskirts of León. He is engaged in the fish business and is the father of three children, ages 14, 11, and 5. His children are in school.

Eddy began his business by means of his daily fishing work when he succeeded in buying his boat. He learned how to bargain and saw the types of seafood most in demand by his customers. Nowadays, he has a small storage center where he buys fish and sells it on a retail basis. He sells his products in nearby communities.

Eddy is very enterprising, and one of his ambitions is to succeed in exporting his seafood outside the country. He needs the loan in order to purchase seafood to be able to market wholesale. One of his plans is to succeed in making a contract with a seafood export firm.

loans.use: to purchase seafood.

loans.name: Diarry

texts.fr: Diarry est âgée  de 32 ans. C’est une jeune femme qui habite au Sénégal  et évolue  dans le secteur du commerce. Elle gère une boutique  et commercialise des produits cosmétiques. C’est une activité qu’elle a choisi par  amour. Elle sollicite un crédit  de 150 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de cosmétiques en vue de renforcer son stock. L’accroissement  de ses bénéfices lui permettra de mieux se prendre en charge et de soutenir sa famille.
texts.en:
Diarry is 32 years old. This is a young woman who lives in Sénégal and is advancing in business. She manages a shop and markets cosmetics. This is a business that she chose out of love.

She is requesting a 150,000f loan to buy cosmetics with the aim of strengthening her stock. The growth in her profits will allow her to better take care of herself and to support her family.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to resell.

loans.name: Khary

texts.fr: Khary vit au Sénégal. Elle gère une boutique dans un marché de la localité ou elle habite. Elle a choisi son activité par nécessité  dans le but de se procurer des revenus. Elle est membre  du guichet de l’U-IMCEC depuis 3 ans. Elle sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de produits à revendre. Elle souhaite développer d’avantage son activité de commerce, accroitre ses revenus pour mieux se prendre en charge et soutenir ses proches.
texts.en:
Khary lives in Sénégal. She manages a shop in a market of the region where she lives. She chose her business out of necessity with the goal of procuring an income.

She has been a member of the UIMCEC branch for three years. She is requesting a 200,000f loan to buy products to resell. She hopes to develop her business some more, and grow her income to better take care of herself and support those close to her.

loans.use: to buy food products to resell.

loans.name: Mane

texts.fr: Mané vit au Sénégal. Elle a 43 ans. Elle s’active dans le secteur du commerce et vend des accessoires de femmes. C’est une  activité qu’elle a choisi par amour. Elle est membre du guichet de l’U-IMCEC depuis 9 ans. Elle sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de nouveaux produits. Son objectif est d’accroitre ses gains financiers  en vue de mieux soutenir son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
Mané lives in Sénégal. She is 43 years old. She is active in business and sells women's accessories. This is a business that she chose out of love. 

She has been a member of the UIMCEC branch for 9 years. She is requesting a 200,000f loan to buy new products. Her objective is to grow her financial gains with the aim of better supporting her husband in the management of daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy new products to resell.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es:
Reyna, de 29 años de edad, es originaria de León, es ama de casa y a la vez comerciante se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, gallinas y tiene una pulpería. Tiene tres hijos de los cuales dos están estudiando y el menor no tiene edad para asistir  a la escuela. Comenzó con esta actividad cuando tenia 23 años , crio su primer cerdo después fue aumentando poco a poco sus animales posteriormente también compro gallinas para  criar y vender. Este ha sido su primer negocio el cual le ha permitido ser independiente de su esposo generando ingresos para contribuir su hogar y salir 	adelante 	con 	sus 	hijos.
Ella requiere el préstamo para compra de cerdos para vender. Este inversión le ayudara porque podrá mejorar la calidad de sus animales, podrá vender a buen precio y sacar adelante su negocio. A ella le gustaría tener una granja de cerdos y gallinas con buenas condiciones para la crianza y desarrollo .
texts.en:
Reyna, 29 years old, is originally from León.  She is a housewife who also works raising pigs and chickens and has a small store.  She has three children, two of whom are in school, and the youngest is not yet old enough to attend school.  

She started this work when she was 23 years old.  She raised her first pig and afterward began slowly adding more animals.  She also purchased chickens to raise and sell.  This has been her first business, which has allowed her to be independent from her husband and generate income to contribute to the household expenses and improve her children's lives.  

She is asking for this loan to purchase pigs to sell.  This investment would help her because she will be able to improve the quality of her animals, sell them at a good price, and improve her business.  In the future, she would like to have a pig and chicken farm with good conditions to raise and develop her animals.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Wilber Antonio

texts.es: Wilber Antonio de 26 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su compañera de vida de 20 años y su pequeña hija de 2 años. Él se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, responsable y emprendedor. Hace algunos años le surgió la idea de poner un pequeño taller de enderezado y pintura, el cual con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha mantenido activo y es el que le ha permitido llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Él es el único que trabaja en una actividad que genera ingresos, ya que su esposa se dedica a las actividades del hogar. Wilber Antonio tiene muchas ventajas con su negocio ya que es el único taller en la zona por lo que posee algunos clientes fijos y además la ubicación es muy estratégica ya que se encuentra frente a una gasolinera, lugar que es muy concurrido por muchas personas. Su sueño es ver florecer su negocio por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su taller con la fe puesta en Dios que poco a poco va lograr lo que tanto desea. El préstamo lo quiere para comprar pintura y herramientas que le permitan dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes con el fin de poder abarcar una mayor porción de mercado que le generen mayores  ingresos  y que permitan  mejorar su calidad  de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Wilber Antonio is 26 years old. He lives in his own house with his life-partner, who is 20, and his little 2 year old daughter. He is known for being a hard worker, responsible and enterprising. Some years ago he had the idea of starting a little paint and body shop, which with strength and effort he has kept active and it has permitted him to provide the daily bread for his home. He is the only one working to bring in income, as his wife takes care of the house. 

Wilber Antonio has many advantages in his business as his is the only workshop in the area that has regular customers and furthermore the location is very strategic as it is across from a gas station, a place that is very popular with many people.

His dream is to see his business flourish and this is why he has made the decision to ask for a loan through Integral to invest in his workshop with faith in God that little by little he is going to attain what he so much wants.

He will use the money from the loan to buy paint and tools so he can provide better service to his customers in order to embrace a greater marketshare that will generate higher earnings and improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy paint and tools

loans.name: Quenia Mercedes

texts.es: Quenia, de 39 años de edad, originaria de Leon,esta agradecida por la ayuda recibida atravez del prestamo kiva este es la primerra vez que trabaja con este tipo de prestamo que ha sido muy positivo para su negocio pues lo invirtio en compra de materia prima, como maiz, cal y leña sus ventas aumentaron. Ahora ella solicita un segndo credito para compra de materia prima para hacer tortillas, tambien cemento,arena y madera. Ya que quiere comenzar hacer reparaciones en su casa poco a poco asi mismo mejorar las condiciones de su negocio.
texts.en:
Quenia is 39 years old and is from Leon originally. 

She is grateful for the help she has received through a loan from Kiva. This is the first time that she has worked with this type of loan, and it has been very positive for her business. She used it to buy staples such as corn, lime and firewood. Her sales have increased. 

Now she is asking for a second loan in order to buy staples such as tortillas, also cement, sand and wood. She wants to begin to make repairs to her home little by little and likewise improve her business conditions.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make tortillas, and also to buy cement, sand, and wood

loans.name: Silvia Dinora

texts.es: Silvia Dinora  de 34  años de edad, vive en casa de su hermana desde hace 19 años junto con sus tres hijos dos de los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Silvia Dinora  lleva muchos años dedicándose al negocio. Gracias a su dedicación y disciplina ha logrado mantener activa una pequeña tienda dentro de su hogar de habitación. Ella  es una mujer ejemplar ya que ella sola ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos y sigue trabajando para darles lo mejor. El lugar de ubicación de su negocio es muy estratégico, se encuentra en una zona muy concurrida y de fácil acceso por el momento cuanta con muchos clientes,  pero ella es una mujer emprendedora y quiere surtir su tiendita para que sea más atractiva y los cliente la prefieran mas además quiere aprovechar esta temporada navideña ya que es cuando más se vende. Esto la ha hecho tomar la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar variedad de artículos de tienda como: golosinas, detergentes, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, aceite, papel, pan dulce y de mas artículos que logren a traer a mas clientes. Con esto espera cumplir su sueño de ver su tienda surtida y contar con muchos clientes que la prefieran por tener  todo lo necesario. Además  espera lograr mayores ganancias que le permitan acceder a una mejor oportunidad de  vida.
texts.en:
Silvia Dinora, age 34, has lived in her sister’s house for 19 years.  She lives with her three children; two of them go to school.  Silvia Dinora has devoted herself to the business for a lot of years.

Thanks to her dedication and discipline she has managed to actively maintain a small store in her home.  She is an exemplary woman because she alone has managed to get her children ahead.  She continues working in order to give them the best.

The location of her business is very strategic.  It is in a very busy zone with easy access, and she now has a lot of customers.  However, she is an enterprising woman.  She wants to stock her small store so that it will be more attractive, and so that the customers will prefer her store.  Also, she wants to take advantage of the Christmas season because that is when she sells the most.

This has made her decide to request this loan from Integral.  She will use the loan to buy a variety of products for her store.  She will buy things like sweets, detergents, sugar, rice, beans, oil, paper, sweet breads, and others that manage to bring more customers. 

By doing this she hopes to fulfill her dream of seeing her store stocked and having a lot of customers who prefer her because she has everything they need.  Also, she hopes to get greater income, which would allow her access to a better life opportunity.

loans.use: to buy sweets, detergents, sugar, rice, beans, oil, paper, and sweet breads, etc.

loans.name: María Milagros

texts.es:
María Milagros tiene es una madre de familia de 26 años de edad, que reside junto a su esposo y a sus 02 hijos en el Caserío Juan Velasco Alvarado del Distrito de Tambogrande. La comunidad se encuentra ubicada a unos 25 km del distrito y aun no cuenta con servicios básicos. La zona es una zona agrícola que se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

La actividad que desarrolla la es la crianza de animales ovinos y aves de corral, teniendo actualmente 15 ovejas y 10 pavos, los cuales cría y engorda en la parte posterior de su domicilio, al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en mercado local. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura contando con 1.0 ha de terreno agrícola en el cual tiene sembrado limón que cosecha semanalmente, de esta manera apoya a su esposa en todas las actividades que realiza, existiendo una buena relación familiar para seguir creciendo en su negocio

 María se encuentra solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles que desea utilizar en la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde del ganado ovino y aves de corral, esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo y así mejorar su calidad de vida.

María es una clienta nueva para  Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Maria Milagros is a 26 year old mother who lives with her husband and two children in the Juan Velasco Alvarado  settlement in the district of Tambogrande. The community is located about 25 km from the district proper and has no essential services. It is an agricultural area in the Piura region, more than four hours away from Chiclayo, capital city of the Lambayeque region.

Maria Milagros breeds sheep and poultry. She currently has 15 sheep and 10 turkeys, which she breeds in the rear area of her home. Once they reach an ideal size and weight, she sells them in the local market. Her husband is a farmer. He has a 1-hectare plot of land in which he grows lemons that he harvests weekly. This allows him to help his wife in all her activities. The family relations are good and contribute to make their businesses grow.

 Maria is requesting an 800 Peruvian nuevos soles loan from Edpyme Alternativa. She wants to use this money to buy balanced food to fatten up her sheep and poultry. This investment will allow her to grow and improve her quality of life.

Maria is a new Edpyme Alternativa customer.

loans.use: to buy balanced food to fatten up sheep and poultry.

loans.name: Benita

texts.es:
Benita tiene 48 años de edad, es separada y vive junto a un hijo ya mayor de edad. Ambos viven en el caserío Paccha del distrito de Chulucanas, una zona agrícola que se encuentra situada en la región Piura, a más de tre horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque. 

La actividad que desarrolla es el negocio de bodega en propio domicilio, en el cual atiende permanentemente y cuenta con clientela ya establecida. Ella atiende principalmente a sus clientes bajo la modalidad del crédito, ya que la mayoría de ellos son trabajadores de una empresa agrícola de la zona y se les paga quincenalmente.

Ella desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más mercadería que le permita seguir cubriendo la demanda de su negocio, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.

Benita es una clienta nueva para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Benita is 48 years old. She is separated and lives with her son who is an adult. They live in the village of Paccha in the district of Chulucanas, an agricultural area that is located in the Piura region, about 3-1/2 hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region. 

She has created the business of a general store in her home where she is constantly taking care of customers that she has already established. She generally allows them to use credit because most of them work in the field of agriculture and they get paid every other week. 

She wants to expand her store by buying more merchandise that will permit her to meet her business demand, and this is why she is asking for a loan of 1000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Benita is a new client for Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to expand her store

loans.name: José Manfredo

texts.es:
José es un joven padre de familia de 23 años de edad, vive junto a su conviviente y su menor hijo en el caserío Paccha del distrito de Chulucanas, una zona agrícola que se encuentra situada en la región Piura, a más de tre horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque. 

La actividad que desarrolla es la crianza de ganado ovino y porcino, los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local. Adicionalmente es albañil, trabajando en las obras del caserío y ganando por día de trabajo. Con estos ingresos el trata de solventar la economía de su familia.

José se encuentra solicitando 1000 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en la compra de alimento y medicinas para sus animales, de modo que pueda asegurar la estabilidad de su negocio.

José es un cliente nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
José is a young head of the family, 23 years old, who lives with his common-law wife and his young son in the village of Paccha in the district of Chulucanas, in an agricultural area located in the Piura region, about 3-1/2 hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.

His work is breeding sheep and pigs, which he successfully fattens to the ideal size and weight to sell them in the local market. In addition, he is a bricklayer, working on jobs in the village and being paid each day he works. With this income he tries to meet the family expenses.

José is asking for 1000 soles as he wants to invest in the purchase of feed and medicine for his animals, so that he can be certain of the stability of his business.

José is a new client for Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy feed and medicine for his animals

loans.name: María Ángela

texts.es: María Ángela de 31 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo y sus cinco hijos, tres de los cuales se encuentran estudiando. María Ángela se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora y dedicada a su trabajo. Hace 4 años decidió abrir una pupuseria en su hogar de residencia ya que los ingresos percibidos por su esposo no eran y no son suficientes para cubrir las necesidades del hogar. El negocio tiene buena ubicación ya que se encuentra en una de las calles principales de la colonia donde ella habita. Esto le ha ayudado para que muchas personas se acerquen a solicitar sus deliciosas pupusas. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y es por ella que cada mañana se levanta muy temprano para dedicarse a su negocio y poder ayudar un poco con la economía de su hogar que cada día es más difícil. Ella es muy emprendedora ya que no deja ir ninguna oportunidad de negocio, es por eso que en esta temporada navideña quiere aprovechar en dar una mayor oferta a sus clientes ya que siempre en estas fechas las ventas aumentan. Es por esta razón que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de la materia prima necesaria (queso, frijoles, maíz, arroz, chicharon, etc.) para poder dar un mejor  servicio a sus clientes, con el fin de aumentar sus ingresos que le permitan acceder a una mejor oportunidad de vida. Esta muy agradecida con esta institución ya que en el pasado confiaron en ella y le otorgaron un credito para invertir en su negocio y espera tener resultados favorables de este nuevo crédito ya que sin  la ayuda de INTEGRAL nada de esto fuera posible.
texts.en:
María Ángela is 31 years old. She lives in her own house with her family which includes her husband and 5 children, three of which are in school. María Ángela  is known for being a woman entrepreneur who is dedicated to her work. Four years ago she decided to open a pupuseria (a stand selling stuffed tortillas called pupusas) in her home as her husband’s income was not enough to cover the household expenses.

Her business has a good location as she is on one of the main streets of the neighborhood where she lives. This has helped her because many people stop by to ask for her delicious pupusas.

For her the most important thing is her family, and this is why each morning she gets up very early in order to start working in able to help a little with the household expenses, and each day is more difficult.

She is very enterprising and does not let any business opportunity escape, and this is why at the holiday season she wants to take advantage of offering more choices to her clients as during this time the sales always increase. It is for this reason that she has taken the decision of asking for a loan from Integral in order to invest in her business to buy the basic supplies that she needs, such as cheese, beans, rice, chicharon (pork cracklings), and others, in order to be able to give a better service to her customers, increasing her earnings which permit her to have a better opportunity to succeed. She is very thankful to the institution and in the past trusted in it for a loan in order to invest in her business and she is waiting for favorable results with this new loan because without the help of Integral none of this would be possible.

loans.use: to buy cheese, beans, corn, rice and chicharon (pork cracklings)

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria de 51 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su mamá, hermana y un sobrino. Victoria es una mujer llena de energía y sobre todo emprendedora.  Ha trabajado toda su vida para dar  a su familia una calidad de vida diferente. Ella se dedica a los negocios, desde hace 13 años logro instalar  una tienda en su hogar de residencia en la cual ofrece diversidad de productos de primera necesidad. Para Victoria lo más importante son los clientes  por  lo que siempre trata de dar el mejor servicio posible y es por esta razón que se ha ganado la confianza de muchas personas que cada vez la prefieren más. Ha tomado la decisión de abastecer su negocio con variedad de mercadería de tienda para siempre estar un paso delante de la competencia. Para esto ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar variedad de artículos tales como: huevos, frijoles, arroz, azúcar, sal, pan dulce, café, bebidas, golosinas, detergente, papel higiénico, y de más artículos que sean atractivos para los clientes.  De esta manera espera mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia que es lo más importante para ella.
texts.en:
Victoria is 51 years old, and lives in her own house with her family including her mother, sister and nephew. Victoria is a women full of energy and above all enterprising. She has worked all her life to give her family a special quality of life. She works hard in her business. Thirteen years ago she opened a store in her own home offering a variety of staple needs.

For Victoria the most important thing is her customers so she always tries to give the best possible service and it is for this reason that she has earned the confidence of many people who each time would like something more. She has taken the decision to supply her business with a variety of merchandise in order to always be a step ahead of the competition. This is why she is asking for a loan from Integral in order to be able to buy a variety of articles such as  eggs, beans, rice, sugar, salt, sweet bread, coffee, drinks, sweets, detergent, toilet paper and other items that are attractive to customers. In this way she hopes to increase the quality of life for her family which is the most important thing to her.

loans.use: to buy eggs, beans, rice, sugar, salt, sweet bread, coffee, drinks, sweets, detergent, and toilet papers among other items

loans.name: Dina Esperanza

texts.es: Dina Esperanza de cincuenta y uno años de edad vive con sus padres en casa propia. Ella posee un taller de costura en el lugar de su residencia en el cual confecciona prendas de vestir para toda  ocasión, pero en especial vestidos tradicionales, se ha hecho de mucha más clientela últimamente pues su trabajo es  excelente, además que utiliza material de muy buena calidad y vende a precios accesibles, en esta época navideña quiere aumentar su producción y obtener mejores ganancias en el negocio; Dina es una mujer muy entregada a su labor siempre está dispuesta a superarse y mantenerse adelante de la competencia, ella piensa que las personas no se pueden poner ningún límite, ya que no hay nada imposible para el que se esfuerza para lograr el triunfo, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor. Dina Esperanza tiene fe que así podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Dina Esperanza is 51 years old and lives with her parents in their own house. 

She owns a dressmaking workshop in their home in which she makes clothing for all occasions, but particularly traditional dress. She has recently got a lot of customers because her work is excellent and she uses good quality materials, her prices are also accessible. 

In this Christmas season, she wants to raise her production levels and obtain better earnings from the business. 

Dina is a woman who us very dedicated to her work and allows wants to overcome and stay ahead of her competition. She believes that people shouldn't limit themselves as nothing is impossible and with hard-work we can triumph. 

This is why she has asked INTEGRAL for a loan so that she can buy wholesale fabric. Dina Esperanza has faith that in this way she will be able to bring economic security to her home.

loans.use: to buy wholesale fabric.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bulk grains, eggs, bread, sweets and soaps

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen de sesenta y cuatro años de edad vive con su compañero de vida en casa propia. Ella posee una venta de tortillas y adicional a eso vende choco bananos, charamuscas y hielo, es muy conocida en el lugar y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles, además el servicio es excelente siempre recibe a sus clientes con una sonrisa en el rostro; Carmen es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, piensa que siempre hay que soñar y apuntar a lo más alto de lo que sabes que puedes lograr para así poder llegar al éxito, es por eso que está  dispuesta a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, bananos, chocolate entre otros. Carmen tiene la esperanza que con su esfuerzo logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carmen is sixty-four years old and lives with her life partner in her own house. 

She has a business selling tortillas and in addition to this she sells chocolate bananas, charamuscas [cold coconut juice], and ice. She is very well known in her area and has gained a lot of customers. Everything she sells is good quality and her prices are accessible. Her service is also excellent. She always greets her customers with a smile on her face.

Carmen is an entrepreneurial woman with a great desire to get ahead. She believes that you must always dream and aspire to the greatest thing that you think you can achieve to be able to have success. This is why she is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow her to purchase wholesale corn in addition to bananas and chocolate, among other things.

Carmen has the hope that with effort she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy whole sale corn and bananas and chocolate.

loans.name: Jeremías Misael

texts.es: Jeremías Misael de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive en casa propia. El posee un taller de costura en el lugar de su residencia donde confecciona diferentes tipos de prendas, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela gracias a la época navideña además porque el trabajo de Jeremías es excelente todo lo realiza con tela de muy buena calidad y lo vende precios realmente accesibles; él es un hombre muy dedicado a su trabajo siempre está activo con gran energía para salir adelante, piensa que el más grande secreto en su labor es la constancia , tiene grandes metas a futuro y una de ellas es hacer más productivo su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar una maquina semi-industrial  para seguir satisfaciendo la necesidad de los clientes. Jeremías Misael tiene la confianza que de esta forma podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Jeremias Misael, fifty-two, lives in his own house.  He has a sewing workshop where he lives and he makes different types of clothing.  Lately he has had many customers thanks to the Christmas season and also because all of Jeremias’ work is of good quality and fairly priced.  He is a very dedicated man in his work and he puts a lot of energy into it to get ahead.  He thinks that the big secret of his success at work is his perseverance.  He has big goals for the future and one of these is to make his business more productive.  That is why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL.  The financing will help him buy a semi-commercial sewing machine so that he can continue filling his customers’ needs.  Jeremias Misael is sure that in this way he can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a semi-commercial sewing machine

loans.name: María Alicia

texts.es: María Alicia de cuarenta y cinco años de edad vive con sus tres hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una pequeña venta de comida y una tienda donde venden  productos de primera necesidad últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues siempre tiene en su negocio lo que las personas necesitan, con productos de excelente calidad y a precios muy accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; María es una mujer dedicada al trabajo con grandes propósitos para el futuro, quiere estar adelante de su competencia y ver crecer su negocio, piensa que la mayor gloria de la persona no es nunca caer, sino el mantenerse siempre en el camino que lo llevara al éxito, con este pensamiento es que María se decidió a solicitarle a INTERGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, condimentos, productos instantáneos y material para sus comidas. María Alicia tiene la confianza que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María Alicia, who is forty-five years old, lives with her three children in her own home.  She has a small business selling food and a store where she sells basic needs products.  Lately she has had a lot of customers because her business always has what people need.  She sells products of excellent quality at affordable prices.  In addition, the service is unbeatable.  María is a woman who is dedicated to her work and has big plans for the future.  She wants to stay ahead of the competition and to see her business grow.  She thinks that the greatest glory in a person is not never falling but rather always staying on the path that leads to success.  With this in mind, María made the decision to request a loan from INTERGRAL that will enable her to purchase basic grains, sweets, seasonings, instant products and supplies for the food she makes.  María Alicia is confident that this is the way to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, sweets, seasonings and instant products.

loans.name: Nivin

texts.en:
Nivin is a 30-year-old mother of two from northern Israel.  She’s taken professional cosmetics courses and training. Nivin is determined to succeed and create a secure financial environment for her family. She has opened a cosmetics salon for waxing, sales of cosmetics supplies and cosmetics services from her home. Her central location, warm environment along with her skills, dedication and professionalism are creating a successful business activity, which has already significantly added to her family’s financial stability.

Nivin needed this loan to purchase cosmetic supplies, makeup accessories, an air conditioner and equipment for her salon room. One day, Nivin wants to open a spa & beauty center that offers cosmetics, waxing and beauty services along with reflexology and quality salon treatments.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetic supplies, makeup accessories, an air conditioner and equipment for her salon.

loans.name: Tahrir

texts.en:
Tahrir is from Israel’s Negev region. One of five siblings in her home, Tahrir decided after high school to gain training and experience as a childcare giver. Through her local municipality, Tahrir received training and certification to open an at-home day care for toddlers between the ages of three months and three years of age. Tahrir has opened a nursery in her home and is registered with the local municipality. This means they monitor the nursery school and guarantee her customers and monthly tuition payments. Tahrir has found a business she can develop and manage now and for the long term, expanding and growing in the years to come.

Tahrir needed this loan to purchase equipment for her daycare including educational toys, cots, cribs, table, chairs and supplies.

One day, Tahrir wants to open a large multi-classroom nursery outside of her home.

loans.use: To purchase educational toys, cots, cribs, table, chairs and supplies for her daycare.

loans.name: Rosela

texts.en:
Rosela is from Sapang Dalaga, Misamis Occidental. She is 44 years old, married, and has three school-aged children. 

Rosela owns and operates a food stall where she sells snack foods in the local community. She has been in her business for over six years and earns 5,000 PHP a month. 

In 2010, Rosela joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a loan of 30,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to supplement her family's income.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Jesel

texts.en:
Jesel is from Pobalacion Sapang Dalaga, Misamis Occidental. She is 36 years old. She is separated from her spouse and has five school-aged children. 

Jesel owns and operates a retail store, selling a variety of different products and home products in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for three years and earns approximately 10,000 PHP a month from it. 

In 2010, Jesel joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to do business. Jesel is requesting a loan of 40,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to supplement the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is from Magsaysay, Calamba, Misamis Occidental. She is 38 years old, is married, and has three school-aged children. 

Nora owns and operates a general store, selling daily-use products such as shampoo, soap and toothpaste in the local community. She has been in her business for 12 years and earns 5,000 PHP a month. 

In 2009, Nora joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a loan of 40,000 PHP which will be used to purchase new items to expand product offerings. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand product offerings

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida is a married woman who has three children. She is 58 years old and residing at Calamba, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. 

Leonida owns and operates a general store, selling a variety of different products to earn a living and she's been in this business for 3 years. Each month, she earns 5,000 PHP doing this type of business. 

She requested a loan of 51,400 to purchase additional products to sell. In 2011, Leonida joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Leonida wants to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Lina

texts.en: Lina is from Sapang Dalaga, Misamis Occidental. She is 33 years old. Lina is married and has three school-aged children. She owns and operates a retail store, selling a variety of different products and home products in the local community. Lina has been in her business for 3 years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month from it. In 2011, Lina joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to do business. Lina is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Yin

texts.en: Mrs. Yin, 47, is a rice farmer who has been living in Prey Chor district. She has nine children, most of whom are single and living together with her in a house. She has just finished collecting her rice fruit recently, and she found that it won’t be enough for the whole year. It’s really a good time now if she can buy rice from other villagers to store in her barn. So now she is taking out a loan from HKL and Kiva to buy a stock of rice to keep for daily food. This is her first loan that will secure her family out of hunger. She is very pleased and thankful to our lenders for their help.

loans.use: to buy a stock of rice to keep for daily food.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a widow and has two children. She is 52 years old and lives in the Philippines. 

Elizabeth operates a business providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. She has been doing this for four years. Every month she earns PHP 4,000 from this work. She has requested a loan of PHP 21,149.61 to repair her vehicle to provide better service.

In 2010, Elizabeth joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Elizabeth hopes to improve and expand her business and to earn twice as much income from her business.

loans.use: to repair her vehicle to provide better service

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en:
Anecita is a married woman who has three children. Anecita is 35 years old and resides in Tinago, Ozamis City, Philippines. 

Anecita owns & operates boarding house services to local community member to earn a living and she's been in this business for 3 years. Each month, she earns 5,000 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to invest in renovating her boarding house. 

In 2011, Anecita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Anecita wants to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to invest in renovating her boarding house

loans.name: Shabnum's Group

texts.en:
Shabnum has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her clothes selling business. With the loan investment, she will buy clothes in bulk quantity and of different variety. This will allow her to attract different clients and offer them a choice to buy a variety of clothes.
She is a very confident lady and quite sure that she will be able to make her business successful and make it more profitable after investing the loan funds.
Her husband is a property dealer and operates his business from a rented office.
Shabnum has given birth to a son and a daughter. Both of them are enrolled in a local school and getting their education.
She is an experienced business woman and knows the ups and downs of her business very well and also knows the latest trends and fashion in the clothing industry.
She is confident about her business success as a result of the loan investment.
Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book (called an Asasah Passbook) is Shabnum.

loans.use: To buy clothes for her clothes selling business

loans.name: Sei

texts.en: Mrs. Sei is 33 years old and a mother of 2 school-aged kids. She lives in Pouk district, Siem Reap province. As shown, Sei is selling petrol and soft drinks like sugar cane juice, types of cola, and pure drinking water in front of her house, which is located along the National Road 26A. Most of her customers are travelers who pass her house back and forth everyday. She really enjoys operating her business, from which she is able to generate income of $4.00 per day. Besides this business, Sei wants to be involved in a business selling small stones to make additional income. However, she can’t start it without any capital from lenders. Thus, she is taking her fifth loan from HKL and first loan from Kiva to purchase small stones for sale. She hopes that she’ll be able to attain a higher standard of living as her business grows and that she will be able to provide her two children great opportunities for further education with her generated income.

loans.use: to purchase small stones for sale.

loans.name: Net

texts.en:
Mr. Net, 54, is in the business of cultivating rice crops and fishing in the river for his livelihood. After fishing, his wife takes the caught fish to sell through the commune to generate income. This couple has tried to work very hard for the family and they typically earn an average of $3.50 per day. 

Net tells us that he doesn’t own any animals for his farming yet, and he wishes to have some to better the way he works. Also, they’ll help to keep his family from hiring other neighbors’ animals. So now, he decided to ask for some funds from HKL to buy buffaloes for his farming work. 

In the future, he hopes to improve his living conditions and provide his children a good education. He now lives with his wife and four single children in the Pouk district.

loans.use: to buy buffaloes for his farming work.

loans.name: Kobiljon

texts.ru: Кобилджон проживает в городе Худжанд. Ему 30 лет. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Кобилджон занимается переработкой хлопка. Этим видом деятельности занимается четыре года. Кредит берет для закупа сырья.
texts.en: Kobiljon resides in the city of Khujand. He is thirty years old, is married, and has one child. Kobiljon processes cotton, and has been involved in this type of business for four years. He is requesting a loan to purchase raw materials.

loans.use: to buy raw materials

loans.name: Gaybullojon

texts.ru: Гайбуллочон житель города Худжанд. Возраст, 20 лет. Холост. Живет вместе с родителями. Он уже пять лет, как занимается изготовлением мебели. Кредит берет для закупа досок и реек.
texts.en: Gaybullojon resides in the city of Khujand, He is 20 years old, single, and lives with his children. He has been in the furniture-making business for five years. He is requesting a loan to purchase furniture boards and laths.

loans.use: to purchase furniture boards and laths

loans.name: Alda

texts.en:
Alda is from Malibangcao, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 50 years old. Alda is married and has two school-aged children. 

To make a living, Alda owns and operates a business venture in the agriculture sector raising crops, planting and harvesting corn to sell. Alda has been in her business for seven years and earns approximately 10,000 PHP a month for these activities. 

In 2005, Alda joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Alda is requesting a new loan of 15,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is from Calabayan, Ozamiz City. She is 45 years old, married, and has four adult children. 

Evelyn plants, harvests and sells "saging" (bananas) for their living. She's been in her business for 16 years and earns 5,000 PHP a month. 

In 2008, Evelyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Evelyn is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family and to purchase their daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Ilhom

texts.ru: Илхом житель города Турсунзаде. Возраст, 36 лет. Женат. Имеет четверых детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам Илхом имеет средне - специальное образование, он строитель. На сегодняшний день Илхом занимается строительными работами по найму. Кроме того он занимается растениеводством. В основном он выращивает овощи для продажи. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений и семян пшеницы.
texts.en: Ilhom lives in the city of Tursun-zoda. He's thirty-six years old, married and has four children. His wife takes care of their household. Ilhom holds a technical degree in construction. He works for hire on various construction projects. Additionally, he grows vegetables for sale. He's asking for a loan in order to purchase mineral fertilizers and wheat seed.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and wheat seed.

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.ru: Гулнора замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Муж работает строителем. Чтобы помогать мужу для содержания семьи она начала заниматься торговлей 12 лет назад и имеет богатый опыт. Она продает игрушки на местном рынке. Раньше её мать занималась этим, и она помогала, а затем открыла свою точку. Этот бизнес является прибыльным, много потребителей. С прибылью она купила 4 голов мелкого рогатого скота и откармливает их дома. Она хотела бы получить займ в размере 4000 Сомони для покупки новых товаров, особенно Новогодних игрушек.
texts.en: Gulnora is a married, loving mother of four children. Her husband works in construction. To help her husband support their family, she went into the retail business 12 years ago and has extensive experience. She sells toys at the local market. In the past Gulnora helped her mother when she was involved in the same business, and then she opened up her own retail outlet. This business is profitable, and has a large clientele. With the profits, Gulnora bought 4 heads of small horned livestock and is raising them for future resale at home. She would like a loan of 4,000 Somoni to buy new merchandise, especially toys for New Year's.

loans.use: To buy new merchandise

loans.name: Azizmoh

texts.ru: Азизмох жительница Гиссарского района. Ей 37 лет. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Ее муж занимается выращиванием хлопка и овощей. Сама Азизмох более пяти лет занимается животноводством. Она берет кредит для проведения ремонта в коровнике. Еще она хочет закупить мелко - рогатый скот.
texts.en: Azizmoh lives in the Gissar region. She's thirty-seven years old, married and has four children. Her husband grows cotton and vegetables and Azizmoh has bred livestock for the past five years. She's asking for a loan in order repair her cowshed. She plans to purchase some small cattle.

loans.use: to expand her business.

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.en:
Eugenia is 39 years old. She is married and has six school-age children. Eugenia is from Dalapang, Ozamiz City.

To make a living, Eugenia raises crops. She plants and harvests root crops to sell. Eugenia has been in business for 10 years and earns 2,000 PHP a month.

In 2009, Eugenia joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living conditions and enable her to engage in business activities. Eugenia is requesting a loan of 6,970.26 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue to pay the tuition fees of her children and to supplement her family's income.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Regino

texts.en:
Regino is from Kinangay Sur, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. He is 48 years old. Regino is married and has six school-aged children. 

To make a living, he owns and operates a retail store, primarily selling a variety of home-use products to the local community. Regino has been in his business for 5 years and earns 15,000 PHP a month from these activities. 

In 2004, Regino joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities.
