Regino is requesting a new loan of 50,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Arturo

texts.en:
Arturo is from Gango, Ozamiz City. He is 45 years old. Arturo is married and has one school-aged child. 

To make a living, he owns and operates a business selling buko juice (young coconut water). He has been engaged in his business for 4 years and earns 15,000 PHP a month from these activities. 

In 2009, Arturo joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Arturo is requesting a new loan of 35,000 PHP which will be used to purchase the raw ingredients needed to make his product. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase the raw ingredients needed to make his product

loans.name: Nazorat

texts.ru: Назорат умная и целеустремленная  женщина.  Она замужем и на  воспитании имеет троих детей. Она учительница и преподает в средней школе. Назорат хочет улучшить свои  жилищные условия и хотела бы получить займ для завершения ремонта своего дома. Она планирует закупить стройматериалы. Она надеется на вашу доброту и милосердие, которая позволит ей улучшить свои бытовые условия жизни. Она заранее благодарна вам за вашу щедрость и помощь.
texts.en: Nazorat is a smart and goal-oriented woman.  She is married and is raising three children.  She is a teacher and works at a secondary school.  Nazorat wants to improve her living conditions and wants to obtain a loan to complete repairs of her house.  She plans to purchase building materials.  She relies on your kindness and mercy, which will let her improve her daily living conditions.  Nazorat is grateful to you in advance for your generosity and help.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Teodulo

texts.en:
Teodulo is married with 4 children. Teodulo is 55 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Teodulo owns a service-based business providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. He has been doing this for 10 years and every month he earns 5,000 PHP from this work. He has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to repair his existing vehicle for better service.

In 2010, Teodulo joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his business and living situation. In the future, Teodulo hopes to finish the education of his children and to gain double the income out of his business.

loans.use: to repair existing vehicle for better service

loans.name: Ly

texts.en:
Ly is a Tuk Tuk taxi driver, while his wife sells fish. They live in a village near Phnom Penh City and have eight children who attend school. 

Ly is asking for a loan of $1,000 to rebuild his house because it’s small. This makes difficult living conditions for his large family.

loans.use: To rebuild his family's house.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is married with 2 children. Teresita is 42 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Teresita is operating a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. She's been doing this for 4 years and every month she earns 10,000 PHP from this work. She has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to repair a transport vehicle used in the business.

In 2004, Teresita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Teresita hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in the business

location.town: Carmen Annex, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Leab

texts.en:
Leab is 34 years old and his wife, Sreang is 26 years old, have been married since 2008 and have one young daughter. They live in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Leab is farmer, he grow cauliflower on his farmland in the village where he lives.  His wife is a garment worker. He is asking for his first loan in the amount of $500 to purchase seed fertilizer and pesticide to maintain his farm.

Photo: Leab is at home, not at the farm.

loans.use: To purchase seed, fertilizer, and pesticide to maintain his farm.

loans.name: Sreyna

texts.en:
Sreyna, age 38, sells Khmer noodles in her village. Khmer noodles or "Num Banh Chok" are considered the national dish of Cambodia. The dish can be served with a green curry soup and banana flowers, bean sprouts, water lily stalks, and cucumber. Her husband, Thy, age 38, is a teacher. The couple has been married since 1995 and have three children who are in school. They live in a village near Phnom Penh City.

Sreyna wants to supplement her business by selling new products including dessert and "Toek Krolok." Toek Krolok is a Khmer word that means smoothie. 

She is asking for her first loan of $800 to buy supplies for her business such as a blender and some tables and chairs.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her business such as a blender, table, and chairs.

loans.name: Chansomaly

texts.en:
Chansomaly, 29, is a weaver. Her husband, Soknoeun, 35, is a chef. He cooks for a restaurant in Phnom Penh City. They live in a village near the Mekong River about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City and have four children, three sons and one daughter. Two attend school and the others are still young.  

Chansomaly is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,000. She will use $900 of the loan to pay for her house-building fees because she built a new house to stay in, but she lacks some money to pay for building fees.

She will also use the other $100 of the loan to buy weaving materials for her weaving business.

loans.use: to pay for her house-building fees and buy weaving materials for her weaving business.

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is from Dalapang, Ozamiz City. She is 38 years old, married and has one child. 

Aida owns and operates a business raising crops, primarily planting and harvesting corn for sale. She has been in her business for 8 years and earns 5,000 PHP a month. 

In 2007, Aida joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Aida is requesting a new loan of 8000 PHP, which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure

loans.name: Azra Bibi's Group

texts.en:
Azra bibi is 36 years old. She is a married woman who lives with her family -- a husband and six children who are 17, 15, 14, 12, 10 and 6 years old. 

Azra is very ambitious lady; she owns and operates a bangles sales business. She has contacts in different jewelry shops of the market. She also sells her bangles to her community clients and generates a good profit on it. Her collection of colorful bangles attracts many customers to her. Bangles are an ornament which every woman likes and loves to wear. 

Her husband is professionally a milkman. He has a buffalo at his home from which he gets milk to sell to different milk shops. He is also a very hardworking person.  

Azra has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her own business. With this loan, she will purchase more variety of bangles like steel, beaded and glittered bangles for selling. She is very hopeful that the added variety to her collection will help increase her sales and generate better profits. 

Note: In the photo, the lady raising her hand is Azra bibi.

loans.use: To buy bangles for reselling.

loans.name: Meri

texts.en: Meri lives in Sisian with her husband and three children. For three years, she has kept cattle and cultivated land. Now Meri would like to expand her farm and develop agriculture. With the requested loan, she plans to purchase livestock and forage. Expansion of the farm will allow Meri to get more income. Meri wants to see her children well educated and sustained in the future, so this loan will allow her to implement these goals.

loans.use: to pay for livestock and forage.

loans.name: Monika

texts.en:
Monika is engaged in agriculture. She keeps livestock and beehives. Monika lives with her husband, son and mother-in-law. They always help Monika to run the farm. 

Monika has applied for this loan to develop her farm. She plans to purchase five cows and 20 beehives. This will allow Monika to get additional income from agriculture, which will help her to renovate her old house and create more prosperous living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to pay for cows and beehives.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is from Maningcol, Ozamiz City. She is 52 years old. Esther is married and has three school-aged children. To make a living, she owns and operates a service-based business. Esther has been in her business for 5 years and earns about 10,000 PHP a month for these activities. 

In 2010, Esther joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Esther is requesting a loan of 35,000 PHP which will be used to repair a transport vehicle used in the business. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in the business.

loans.name: Afshan's Group

texts.en:
Afshan is 31 years old. She is a married woman who lives with her family -- a husband and four children who are 12, 9, 8 and 6 years old.  

Her husband is a factory worker on monthly wages. Besides her eldest son, the others are enrolled in a school and getting their education. 

Afshan herself is very talented lady and operates an embroidery business at her home. She makes beautiful embroidered designs on clothes and earns income for the family. She not only manages her household expenses on time but also gives required time to her business. 
 
She has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her embroidery business. With the loan, she will buy embroidery material such as beads, colored thread and sketches in larger quantities to enhance her business. 

She is hopeful that her business will grow further and return her good profits after the loan investment. 

Note: In the photo, the lady raising her hand is Afshan.

loans.use: To buy embroidery material for her embroidery business.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is from Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 36 years old. Lucy is married and has three children. To make a living, she is running a general store, selling a variety of food and home use products in the local community, such as candies, cigarettes, shampoo, soaps and many others. Lucy has been engaged in her business for 2 years and earns approximately 3,600 PHP a month for these activities.

Lucy is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items to expand her product offering. In 2006, Lucy joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offering.

loans.name: Ma Jelleza

texts.en:
Ma Jelleza is from the village of Cabatuan, Calabayan, Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental. She is 37 years old. Ma Jelleza is married and has 4 school-aged children. To make a living, she is operating a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members. She has been engaged in her business for 6 years and earns approximately 8,000 PHP a month from these activities. 

In 2007, Ma Jelleza joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a new loan of 22,000 PHP which will be used to repair a transport vehicle used in the business. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to pay her children's tuition fees and supplement the family's income.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in the business.

loans.name: Shiraz

texts.en:
Shiraz is engaged in the agricultural business. He lives with his wife and three children. Shiraz is the only breadwinner in the family, and he is doing his best to sustain his family and pay for his children's education. 

Shiraz would like to purchase livestock and expand his farm. This loan will help Shiraz to implement this goal, increase his income and insure higher living standards for his family.

loans.use: to pay for livestock.

loans.name: Rosalita

texts.en:
Rosalita is a married woman and has two children. She is 43 years old and resides at Dalapang, Ozamis City, Philippines. She owns and operates a coco land (fertile ground planted in coconut trees). She plants & harvests coconut for sale to earn a living and she's been 10 years in this business. Each month, she earns 3,000 doing this type of business. 

She requested a loan of 7,249 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. In 2008, Rosalita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, she wants to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Mila

texts.en:
Mila is married and has six children. She is 37 years old and resides at Dalapang, Ozamis City, Philippines. Mila operates a farming venture. She plants, harvests and sells coconuts and bananas to earn a living. She's been 7 years in this business. Each month, she earns about 3,000 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 7,430 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. 

In 2008, Mila joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, she wants to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Milinkou

texts.fr:
Milinkou est une femme âgée de 37 ans. Elle est mariée å un chauffeur. Elle a 4 enfants qui vont tous à l’école. Le premier a 21 ans et le dernier a 8 ans.
Milinkou travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2007. Elle vend des céréales pour tous clients à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la rupture de stock.
Milinkou a requis son deuxième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des céréales. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Milinkou voudrait diversifier ses marchandises. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Milinkou is a 37-year-old woman. She is married to a driver, and has four children who all go to school. The eldest is 21 years old and the youngest is 8.

Milinkou has been working as a retail merchant since 2007. She sells grain cereals to all-comers from her home. She resupplies in Lome and works alone. At this time, her main problem is that she is out of stock.

Milinkou is requesting her second WAGES credit loan to buy grain, as she wants to reinvest in the business. In coming years, Milinkou would like to diversify her offerings. She stated that with the profits she plans to take care of her family.

loans.use: Buy grain cereals

loans.name: Karimatou

texts.fr:
Karimatou est une femme âgée de 55 ans. Elle est mariée å un commissaire. Elle a 2 enfants qui vont tous à l’école. Le premier a 20 ans et le dernier a 18 ans.
Karimatou travaille comme revendeuse depuis 1997. Elle vend de la bonneterie pour tous clients au marché. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, n’a pas de difficultés.
Karimatou a requis son 1 crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter de la bonneterie. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Karimatou voudrait agrandir son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Karimatou is a fifty-five year old woman.  She is married to a policeman.  She has two children who attend school.  The oldest is 20 and the younger one is 18. 

Karimatou has been working as a vendor since 1997. She sells clothing for everyone at the market.  She buys her products in Lomé.  She works alone.  At the moment, she does not have any difficulties.  Karimatou has received her first loan through WAGES in order to buy clothing.  She wants to reinvest it in her business.

In the years to come, Karimatou would like to grow her business.  She says that with the profits she will be able to take care of her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad, who is a 30-year-old young man, is married and without children yet. He is a Palestinian National Authority employee with a decent salary.

He is raising sheep and works in agriculture.  He sells his products to help increase his income. Mohammad wants to prepare his piece of land for the winter season by cultivating with peas such as wheat peas, chick peas, etc., but the amount of money he has isn't enough to pay, so he needs to take a loan from FATEN.

When Mohammad gets the loan, he will be able to purchase different types of peas and cultivate his piece of land to prepare well for the winter season. This will enable him to get a better crop and this will lead to an increase in his sales and his income. Mohammad is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural peas to prepare for the winter season

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr:
Adjo est une femme âgée de 41 ans. Elle est mariée å un maçon carreleur. Elle a 3 enfants qui vont tous à l’école. Le premier a 17 ans et le dernier a 12 ans.
Adjo travaille comme revendeuse depuis 1990. Elle vend des céréales et du charbon de bois pour tous clients à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment,elle n’a pas de difficultés.
Adjo a requis son cinquième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des céréales et du charbon de bois. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Adjo voudrait diversifier ses marchandises. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Adjo is 41 years old.  She is married to a tile mason. She has three children who all attend school.  The oldest is 17 and the youngest is 12. 

Adjo has been working as a vendor since 1990.  She sells grain and charcoal from her home.  She buys her products in Lomé.  She works alone.  At the moment, she does not have any difficulties.
Adjo has received her fifth loan through WAGES in order to buy grain and charcoal. She wants to reinvest in her business. 

In the years to come, Adjo would like to diversify her merchandise. She says that with the profits she will be able to take care of her family.

loans.use: to buy grain and sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Ahomadou

texts.fr:
Ahomadou est un homme âgé de 47 ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse. Il a 4 enfants qui vont tous à l’école. Le premier a 20 ans et le dernier a 13 ans.
Ahomadou travaille comme dactylographe et informaticien depuis 2001. Il produit des documents scolaires pour le corps enseignant et les étudiants dans sa boutique. Il achète les produits à Lomé. Il travaille seul. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est le manque de fourniture.
Ahomadou a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter du papier et du stencil. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Ahomadou voudrait agrandir l’activité. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit d’assurer les besoins vitaux de sa famille.
texts.en:
Ahomadou is a  47-year old man, who is married to a retailer. He has four children who all attend school. The eldest is 20 year old while the youngest is 13. Ahomadou works as a typist and a computer specialist. He produces educational documents for teachers and students in his shop. He buys his products in Lomé and he works alone.

Ahomadou's main problem at the moment is his lack of materials, and he has requested his first loan from WAGES so that he can buy paper and stencils. He would like to reinvest in his business and in the coming years he would like to expand it. He says that he plans to provide for his family's basic needs with the profits he makes.

loans.use: to buy paper, ink and educational documents

loans.name: Geghetsik

texts.en:
Geghetsik lives in Aygestan village with her husband, sons, daughter-in-law and grandchildren. For thirteen years already, Geghetsik has sustained her family by cattle-breeding and land cultivating.

To improve the conditions of her household, Geghetsik plans to increase her income. This loan will help her to purchase cattle and forage (feed). Geghetsik will expand her farm and insure a more prosperous future for her family.

loans.use: to pay for calves and forage

loans.name: Kossiwa

texts.fr:
Kossiwa est une femme âgée de 47 ans. Elle est mariée. Elle a quatre enfants.
Kossiwa travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2006. Elle vend des produits vivriers pour tous clients dans un quartier de la place. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est de ne pas pouvoir satisfaire toute sa clientèle.
Kossiwa a requis son quatrième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des poissons et des tomates. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Kossiwa voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Kossiwa is a 47-year-old woman. She is married and has four children. She has been working as a retailer since 2006 selling staple foods to any customer in her local district. The goods are purchased in Lomé. Kossiwa works by herself. At the moment, her main difficulty is not being able to satisfy all her customers. 

Kossiwa has requested her fourth loan from WAGES to buy some fish and tomatoes. She wants to reinvest in the business. 

In the next few years, Kossiwa would like to expand her business. She says she plans to use the profits to take care of her family.

loans.use: to buy staple foods

loans.name: Kunduz

texts.ru:
Кундуз 31 год, воспитывает  четверых детей. В поисках источника финансирования для своей семьи, 10 лет назад Кундуз начала свой бизнес в откорме и перепродаже скота, стартовав с покупки одной дойной коровы. Молоко и молочные продукты, такие как айран (кисломолочный продукт), сметана, творог Кундуз продает на местном базаре.  Такая деятельность позволяет Кундуз зарабатывать около 10,000 сом (KGS)в месяц.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кундуз обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку трех голов скота. Доходы Кундуз планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота, в будущем мечтает дать достойное образование своим детям.
texts.en:
Kunduz is 31 years old and raising four children. In search of a source of funding for her family, Kunduz started her business of fattening and reselling cattle 10 years ago, having started with the purchase of one dairy cow. Kunduz sells milk and dairy products, such as ayran (cultured milk product), sour cream and cottage cheese, at the local bazaar. This activity allows Kunduz to earn around 10,000 som (KGS) per month. 

In order to further develop her business, Kunduz turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS), for the purchase of three head of cattle. Kunduz plans to invest the income in further increasing the number of livestock, and dreams of giving her children a decent education in the future.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Shahnaz's Group

texts.en:
Shahnaz is a focused lady. She owns and operates a sewing business at her home to supplement the income for her family. She has been in this business for over 10 years. She sews dresses with perfect measurement and delivers the orders on time. Her work becomes in demand especially during wedding season, and on other days, she gets routine orders.

Her husband is a barber. He runs a barber shop in the community where he serves his customers with services including haircuts and facials.

Shahnaz has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan, she will buy a new sewing machine because her current machine takes a lot of time to sew a single dress. She is hopeful that her business will become more profitable after the loan investment.

Note: In the photo, the lady raising her hand is Shahnaz.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for her sewing business.

loans.name: Yao Edem

texts.fr:
Yao est un homme âgé de 35 ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse. Il a deux enfants.
Yao travaille comme revendeur depuis 2008. Il vend du pure water pour tous clients dans sa boutique. Il achète les produits à Lomé. Il travaille seul. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est de ne pas pouvoir satisfaire la demande pour cause de stock insuffisant.
Yao a requis son deuxième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter un congélateur et du pure water. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Yao voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit d’assurer le bien être de sa famille.
texts.en:
Yao is a 35-year old man, who is married to a retailer and has two children.

He has been working as a retailer since 2008 and sells "pure water" to all types of customer in his shop. He buys his products in Lomé and works alone. His main problem at the moment is that he does not have sufficient stock to satisfy customer demand. 

Yao has requested a second loan from WAGES so that he can buy a freezer and some "pure water". He wants to reinvest in his business and in the coming years he would like to expand. He says that he will ensure his family's well-being with the profits he makes.

loans.use: to buy sachets of "pure water"

loans.name: Yollande

texts.fr:
Yollande est une femme âgée de 34 ans. Elle est mariée å un tailleur. Elle a 1 enfant.
Yollande travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2006. Elle vend de la nourriture pour tous clients à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille avec 02 personnes. Au moment, elle n’a pas de difficultés.
Yollande a requis son deuxième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter du maïs ; du charbon, des tubercules d’igname et d’autres condiments. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Yollande voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Yollande is a 34-year old woman, who is married to a tailor. She has one child. She has been working as a retailer since 2006 and sells food to all types of customer from her home. She buys her products in Lomé and works with two other people. At the moment she is not experiencing any difficulties. 

She has requested a second loan from WAGES so that she can buy corn, charcoal, yam tubers and other condiments. She wants to reinvest in her business. In the coming years Yollande would like to expand her business and she says that she will look after her family with the profits she makes.

loans.use: to buy ingredients (corn, oil, onions and others) for preparing food

loans.name: Zaynidin

texts.ru: Зайнидин 59-летний пенсионер, вдовец, воспитал четверых детей.  Основным направлением деятельности и источником дохода семьи Зайнидина является  животноводство, начатое им с суммы 20,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорству и настойчивости Зайнидина, , на сегодняшний день его хозяйство приносит около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных  и мясных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Зайнидин обратился в компанию «Бай - Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 4 бычков и 5 баранов для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Зайнидин планирует вложить в постройку нового вместимого сарая для скота.
texts.en:
Zaynidin is a 59-year old pensioner and a widower, who has raised four children. The main activity and source of income for Zaynidin's family is animal husbandry, which they started with the sum of 20,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Zaynidin's persistence and perseverance, the farm today brings in around 15,000 som (KGS) per month from the sale of meat and dairy products. 

In order to further increase the number of livestock, Zaynidin turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of 4 bulls and 5 sheep for fattening and resale. Zaynidin plans to invest the income from the loan to build new barn capacity for livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Sanounou

texts.fr:
Sanounou est un homme âgé de 27 ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse. Il a 2 enfants qui ne vont pas encore à l’école. Le premier a 3 ans et le dernier a 5 mois.
Sanounou travaille comme revendeur depuis 2006. Il vend des produits d’alimentation générale pour tous clients dans sa boutique. Il achète les produits à Lomé. Il travaille seul. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la concurrence.
Sanounou a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits d’alimentation générale. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Sanounou voudrait rendre l’activité plus rentable. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit de préparer l’avenir de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Sanounou is a 27-year old man, who is married to a retailer. He has two children who do not yet go to school. The elder child is three years old and the younger five months old.

Sanounou has worked as a retailer since 2006. He sells groceries to all types of customers in his shop. He buys his products in Lomé and works alone. His main problem at the moment is the competition. 

Sanounou has requested a first loan from WAGES to buy groceries. He wants to reinvest in his business and in the coming years he would like to make it more profitable. He says that he is planning to prepare his children's future with the profits he makes.

loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Dogan Hortense

texts.fr:
Dogan est une femme âgée de 46 ans. Elle est mariée å un instituteur. Elle a 4 enfants qui vont tous à l’école. Le premier a 23 ans et le dernier a 4 ans.
Dogan travaille comme revendeuse depuis 1992. Elle vend du charbon de bois pour tous clients à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la concurrence.
Dogan a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter du charbon de bois. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Dogan voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Dogan is a woman of 46. She is married to a grammar school teacher. She has four children who all attend school. The oldest is 23 and the youngest four. 

Dogan has been working as a retailer since 1992. She sells charcoal to all comers out of her home. She buys her product in Lomé and she works alone. At the present time, her biggest difficulty is the competition. 

Dogan has requested her first loan from WAGES to buy charcoal. She wants to reinvest in her business. In the coming years, she would like to expand her business. She says that with the profit, she intends to care for her family.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Holali

texts.fr:
Holali est une femme âgée de 30 ans. Elle est mariée å un commerçant. Elle a deux enfants, dont un à l’école. Le premier a dix ans et le dernier a deux ans.
Holali travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2007. Elle vend des bidons et des tonneaux vides pour tous clients à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, elle n’a pas de difficultés.
Holali a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des bidons et des tonneaux vides. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Holali voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille et assurer l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en: Holali is a 30 year old woman. She is married to a trader. She has two children, one is in school. The elder is 10 and the younger 2 years old. Holali has worked as a retailer since 2007. She sells containers and empty barrels to all her customers from home. She purchases her products in Lomé, and works alone. At the moment, she doesn't have any particular difficulties. Holali is seeking this first loan from WAGES in order to buy containers and empty barrels. She wants to reinvest in her business. She says that with her profits, she intends to cover the family's living expenses and to ensure the childrens' education.

loans.use: to buy containers

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.en:
Svetlana is an entrepreneur who lives in Novaya Kahovka. She sells clothing in a small store and in some other local markets. She has been in this business for five years and is a serious and skilled business owner. Her perseverance, combined with the lending assistance she has received, have allowed her to gradually expand her business. 

Presently, Svetlana’s working capital has grown to 30,000 grivnyas and her net profit amounts to 4,000 grivnyas a month. There are many vendors and competition in clothing sales is high. However, Svetlana’s pleasant manner and willingness to meet clients’ needs have helped her keep loyal clientele. She is requesting a loan of 15,000 grivnyas to buy an assortment of clothing in bulk to sell in her store. She hopes to make additional income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a new assortment of merchandise

loans.name: San Antonio Group

texts.es:
El comité fue formado gracias a la gestión de una de las miembros.  Ella  al enterarse sobre el programa de la Fundación, contactó con sus vecinas y amigas para formar el comité en la zona. El comité se denomina San Antonio, en alusión al barrio donde viven  la mayoría, están en el Cuarto Ciclo con 16  integrantes.
Una de las miembros es la señora Gloria, ella nos comenta que se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de prendas, como ser remeras, camisetas, pantalones y demás tipos de prendas. Gracias a su esfuerzo y trabajo y sumado a la buena forma de vender que tiene, ha podido salir adelante y ayudar a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de verano con las cuales podrá abastecerse y darle más variedad a sus clientes. Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad que les está dando.
texts.en:
The committee was formed thanks to the management of one of the members.  Upon being informed on the program of the Foundation, she contacted her neighbors and friends to form the committee in the zone.  The committee is called San Antonio, in allusion to the neighborhood where the majority of them live.  They are in the Fourth loan cycle and have 16 members.  
One of the members is Señora Gloria.  She tells us that she is dedicated to the sale of all kinds of clothing, such as Tshirts, undershirts, pants and other types of garments.  Thanks to her effort and work, in addition to her good salesmanship, she has been able to do well and help her family.  She requests the loan to purchase summer clothing with which she will be supplied and thus be able to offer more variety to her clients.  She thanks the foundation and kiva for the opportunity that they are giving her.

loans.use: To buy summer clothes to sell.

loans.name: Rashda's Group

texts.en:
Rashda is a divorced lady who lives with her brother and three children. All of her children are getting their education from a school.

Rashda is a very responsible and kind-hearted lady. She does sewing work to meet the living expenses of herself and her children. She does this work because she doesn't want to become a burden on her brother. Her brother runs his own grocery store in the community market and earns income. He has been in this business for over 5 years.

Rashda has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her brother’s business. He will invest the loan in the buying of groceries in bulk to be able to put in his store for selling. Rashda is very confident about the store's further expansion after the loan investment.

loans.use: to buy groceries for grocery store business

loans.name: Aridza

texts.fr:
Aridza est une femme âgée de 31 ans. Elle est mariée å un tapissier. Elle a quatre enfants, dont trois à l’école. Le premier a 15 ans et le dernier a 1 an.
Aridza travaille comme revendeuse depuis 1995. Elle vend des produits de mercerie et du déguè pour tous clients dans sa boutique. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la mévente.
Aridza a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits de mercerie, du sucre, du petit mil, du lait et du couscous. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Aridza voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’assurer le bien être de sa famille.
texts.en: Aridza is a 31 year old woman. She is married to an upholsterer. She has four children, three of whom are at school. The oldest is 15 and the youngest 1 year old. Aridza has been working as a retailer since 1995. She sells haberdashery products and 'déguè' (a food product) for all her customers in her shop. She buys her stock in Lomé. She works alone. Currently, her main problem is the slump. Aridza is seeking her third loan with WAGES in order to buy haberdashery products, sugar, millet, milk and couscous. She wants to reinvest in her business. In the coming years, Aridza would like to grow her business. She says that with her profits, she intends to ensure the family's wellbeing.

loans.use: to purchase haberdashery products, milk, sugar and other products.

loans.name: Alaa'

texts.en:
Alaa' is a 20-year-old young woman. Her husband is a Palestinian National Authority employee with a decent salary.

Alaa' and her husband want to establish an olive and almond farm around their house. Alaa' wants to share with her husband in preparing well by purchasing olive and almond seedlings to cultivate on the farm, but Alaa' hasn't enough money to pay, so she needs to take a loan from FATEN. When Alaa' gets the loan, she will be able to share with her husband in purchasing the seedlings and preparing well the farm to get a better crop. This will increase the farm crop and increase their sales which will lead to an increase in the family income and offer to them better living conditions.

Alaa' is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: to purchase olive and almond seedlings

loans.name: Vohid

texts.ru: Вохид житель города Истаравшан. Возраст, 47 лет. Женат. Имеет троих детей. Вохид занимается ремонтом генераторов и моторов легковых и грузовых автомобилей. Этим видом деятельности он занимается 10 лет. Кредит берет для покупки запасных частей и инструментов.
texts.en:
Vohid is a resident of the city Istaravshan. He is 47 years old and married. He has three children. Vohid works with repair of generators and motors for cars and trucks. He has been engaged in this activity for 10 years. 

He takes the loan for the purchase of spare parts and tools.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and tools

loans.name: Nataliya

texts.en:
Twelve years ago, Nataliya opened her bakery and candy goods kiosk. A wife and mother, Nataliya was determined to improve the welfare of her family by contributing to their income. With a personal love for sweets and a keen eye for a business opportunity, Nataliya chose to sell candy and sweets as they are in constant demand. Warmhearted and hard working, Nataliya has successfully developed her business over the past decade and has secured a favorable location at the central market.
 
Currently, Nataliya is seeking a loan for 15,000 UAH to purchase additional inventory for the upcoming holidays. With her profits, Nataliya plans to continue developing her business and providing stable income for her family.

loans.use: to increase assorted merchandise

loans.name: Shamim Akhtar's Group

texts.en:
Shamim akhtar is an enthusiastic lady who operates a sewing business to supplement the income of her family. She is very dedicated to her work. Every day, she starts work with the mindset of meeting her orders and delivering to her clients. Shamim has obtained much respect among her clients for her honesty and dedication towards her work. The income she earns helps her to meet the household expenses.

Shamim is the mother of three children. Two of them are married while her other son is involved in a clothing sales business.  He is very talented and has good knowledge about clothing varieties. He has been operating his business for over 12 years. With this loan, he will purchase clothes of different variety in bulk quantity for reselling. Shamim is quite hopeful that her sons’ business will mature further after the loan investment.

loans.use: To buy clothes for resale

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabrics, threas, needles, buttons and other supplies.

loans.name: Nadezhda

texts.ru:
Надежда просит предоставить ей кредит на закупку семян, пленки, удобрений, а также материалов для орошения и отопления. Предыдущий кредит она использовала для аналогичных целей - закупка расходных материалов для выращивания ранних овощей. 

За последний год Надежда посторили еще одну (седьмую) теплицу и намерена развивать бизнес дальше.
Дочь Натальи поступила в университет в г.Минск (Беларуссия), и Наталья помогает ей оплачивать учебу.
texts.en: Nadezhda is requesting this loan for the purchase of seeds, plastic, fertilizers, and also materials for irrigation and heating.  She used her previous loan for similar goals - purchase of materials for growing early vegetables.  Over the last year, Nadezhda built one more (seventh) greenhouse and now intends to develop her business further.  Nadezhda's daughter was accepted to a university in the city of Minsk (Belarus), and Nadezhda helps her to pay for education.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, plastic, fertilizers and supporting materials

loans.name: San Isidro Labrador Group

texts.es:
San Isidro Labrador es el grupo formado por 10 mujeres de la ciudad de Caaguazú, quienes se ha unido con la esperanza de salir adelante por medio del trabajo en conjunto y la ayuda mutua del grupo. Ellas son mujeres de escasos recursos, pero muy trabajadoras y luchadoras.
Zully es una de las integrantes, ella tiene una despensa bien surtida, con la cual abastece a su barrio.Comenta que tiene muy buena venta ya que siempre tiene mucha variedad de artículos para vender. Ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora que diariamente se esfuerza por darle lo mejor a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para surtir su negocio con comestibles, bebidas, lácteos, enlatados y demás articulos de primera necesidad, con lo cual podrá cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
San Isidro Labrador is the group formed by 10 women of the city of Caaguazú, who have united with the hope to do well through working as a group and the mutual aid of the group.  They are women of scarce resources, but very hard-working and determined.  
 Zully is one of the members.  She has a well supplied pantry, with which she supplies her neighborhood.  She tells us that she has very good sales since she always has a good variety of articles to sell.  She is known as a very hard-working and determined woman that strives daily to give the best to her family.  She requests the loan to supply her business with food, beverages, milk, canned goods and other grocery articles, with which she will be able to satisfy the demands of her clients.

loans.use: to buy food, beverages, milk, canned goods and other articles.

loans.name: Mairamkul

texts.ru: Майрамкул 49 лет. В поисках источника финансирования, 20 лет назад Майрамкул начала свой бизнес в животноводстве, стартовав с суммы 5,000 сом (KGS).  Благодаря упорному труду Майрамкул, на сегодня в ее хозяйстве имеется две дойные коровы и одна лошадь,  что позволяет получать прибыль около 4,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока.  Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Майрамкул обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительного скота. Доходы от кредита Майрамкул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья домашней скотины, а в будущем – купить машину для семьи.
texts.en:
Mairamkul is 49 years old. In search of a source of funding, Mairamkul started her business of animal husbandry 20 years ago, with a sum of 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Mairamkul's hard work, her farm today has two dairy cows and one horse, which allows for a profit around 4,000 som (KGS) per month from the sale of milk. 

For the further development of her business, Mairamkul turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of additional livestock. The income from the loan, Mairamkul plans to invest in the further increase of the number of domestic animals, and in the future to buy a car for her family.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Valeriy

texts.ru:
Валерий женат. Его супругу  зовут Оксана. У них двое детей. Живут они в собственном доме в селе Каменка-Днепровская. Валерий имеет свой бизнес - выращивает ранние овощи в теплицах. 

Валерий занимается этим бизнесом уже 10 лет. Трудолюбие и желание развиваться помогают бизнесу расти. Сейчас Валерий имеет большой участок земли и четыре теплицы. В будущем он планирует приобрести еще один участок земли и построить дополнительную теплицу. Валерий - спокойный и уверенный человек, который планомерно идет к поставленным целям. 

Валерий просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 13,000 гривен на закупку материалов для отопления двух теплиц.

(примечание: на фото Валерий вместе со своей женой)
texts.en: Valeriy is married, and his wife's name is Oksana.  They have two children.  They live in their own house in the Kamenka-Dneprovskaya village.  Valeriy has his own business of growing early vegetables in greenhouses.  He has been involved in this business for ten years.  His love of hard work and desire to expand help his business grow.  Currently, Valeriy has a large plot of land and four greenhouses.  In future, he plans to purchase another plot of land and build an additional greenhouse.  Valeriy is a calm and confident person, who systematically moves toward set goals.  He is requesting a loan in the sum of 13,000 hryvnia to purchase materials for heating two greenhouses.  (Note: the photograph shows Valeriy and his wife)

loans.use: to purchase materials for heating two greenhouses

loans.name: Naseem Akhtar's Group

texts.en:
Naseem akhtar is a 53-year-old married woman who lives with her husband and two daughters. Her daughters have completed their education through the 10th standard. Now they both stay at home and help Naseem to manage the household.

Naseem and her husband are both very hard working. They are involved in clothing sales businesses. They operate their businesses independently and separately. Naseem sells clothes to her community clients while her husband sells clothes to different clothing shops. In this way, they both run the finances of their family.

Naseem has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her clothing sales business. She will invest the loan in purchasing of different varieties of clothes in bulk quantity for resale. She is very confident about the further expansion of her business after the loan investment.

Note: “In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Naseem akhtar.

loans.use: To buy clothes for resale

loans.name: Ashjan

texts.en:
Ashjan is a 29-year-old young woman. She is married and has two sons and three daughters. Her husband is a school teacher with a decent salary. 

Ashjan has had a grocery store since two years ago. She wants to purchase different collections of groceries to sell so she can increase her income. The amount of money she has isn't enough so she needs to take a loan from FATEN to pay for the groceries. When Ashjan gets the loan, she will be able to purchase more groceries and thus increase her sales and income.

Ashjan is photographed in the picture with her husband Ra'fat in her grocery store.

loans.use: To purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Ignacia

texts.es:
La Sra. Ignacia tiene 42 años de edad, es una señora que trabaja mucho, está casada con el Sr. Juan hace 25 años, tienen una hija que se llama Alexandra, viven en la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo hace mas de 10 años.
La señora Ignacia tiene una despensa y su marido es herrero hace 15 años.Comenta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado porque ella trabaja en la despensa para hacerle estudiar a su hija, todos los días desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana hasta muy entrada la noche.
Ella junto a su marido se esfuerzan al máximo para poder darle todo lo mejor a su hija, y de esa forma poder mantener la casa y el negocio. Su sueño es comprar más congeladoras para poner en su despensa y de esa forma poder tener más espacio para poder congelar.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de harina, azucar, galleta, leche y demás artículos de primera necesidad, con las cuales podrá seguir ofreciendo más variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Señora Ignacia is 42 years of age.  She is a lady that works a lot.  She was married to Señor Juan 25 years ago.  They have a daughter who is called Alexandra.  They have lived in the city of Colonel Oviedo for more than 10 years.  
Señora Ignacia has a pantry and her husband has been a blacksmith for 15 years.  She tells us that her work is very difficult because she works in the pantry every day from very early in the morning until late into the night, so that her daughter can study.  She and her husband strive to the maximum to be able to give all the best to their daughter, and in that way to be able to maintain the house and the business.  Their dream is to buy more freezers to put in her pantry and in that way to be able to have more space for frozen goods.  She requests the loan for the purchase of flour, sugar, cookies, milk and other consumer staples, with which she will be able to continue offering more variety to her clients.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, cookies, milk and other supplies.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
La Sra. Silvia es de la ciudad de Santaní, tiene 21 años de edad, es Soltera y vive con sus padres en su modesta casa.
Silvia comenta que se dedica a la venta de artículos de mercería, como ser calzados, prendas, prendas intimas, sabanas, frazadas, artículos navideños y demás. Nos cuenta que tiene muy buena clientela y por consiguiente muy buen ingreso, lo cual la ayuda a poder aportar en la casa y de esa forma aligerar un poco la carga de sus padres. Ella sueña con poder seguir creciendo y de esa forma tener un poco más de ingresos para seguir ayudando a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas, calzados, zapatillas, artículos navideños y demás insumos para poder seguir creciendo y de esa forma poder seguir abastecida para poder cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en: Señora Silvia is of the city of Santaní.  She is 21 years of age.  She is a single woman and lives with her parents in their modest house.  Silvia tells us that she is dedicated to the sale of articles of clothing, such as footwear, garments, underwear, sheets,  blankets, Christmas articles and other things.  She tells us that she has a very good clientele and consequently very good income, which enables her to be able to contribute in the house and in that way lighten the load of her parents a little.  She dreams of being able to continue growing and in that way to have a little more income to continue helping her family.  She requests the loan for the purchase of garments, footwear, slippers, Christmas articles and other supplies to be able to continue growing and in that way to continue to be supplied so that she can satisfy the demands of her clients.

loans.use: to buy garments, footwear, slippers, Christmas articles and other supplies.

loans.name: Alaaeddeen

texts.en:
AlaaEddeen is a 28-year-old young man who is the father of one son. He is a Palestinian National Authority employee with a decent salary. To increase his income, AlaaEddeen also has a store for selling broilers to customers.

AlaaEddeen wants to purchase broilers in bulk for resale, but the amount of money he has isn't enough to pay, so he needs to take a loan from FATEN. When AlaaEddeen gets the loan, he will purchase more broilers. This will enable him to compete with others in the same field and to increase his sales and income, thereby creating better living conditions for the family.

AlaaEddeen is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To purchase broilers in bulk for resale

loans.name: Pyahu Mba'apora Group

texts.es:
El comité “Pyahu Mba´apora" se conformó con la iniciativa de la señora Celia. Actualmente se encuentran  en el primer ciclo, con diez integrantes. Todas ellas son mujeres muy sacrificadas,y de escasos recursos, por lo que reciben muy pocas antenciones y beneficios, es por ello que está muy contentas por la ayuda que les da la fundación.
Celia, nos cuenta que tiene una modesta despensa en su casa, donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, como ser azúcar, fideos, lácteos, y demás. Cuenta que la mayoría de sus vecinos compran de ella y que gracias a eso tiene buenos ingresos con los cuales puede mantener la casa y ayudar a su familia. Ella sueña con algún día poder tener una gran despensa mucho mejor surtida.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de azúcar, fideos, lácteos, y demás tipos de artículos de primera necesidad, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The "Pyahu Mba´apora" committee was started due to the initiative of Señora Celia.  At present they are in their first loan cycle, with ten members.  They are all women who have sacrificed, being of scarce resources, for which they receive very little attention or benefits.  Because of this they are very pleased with the aid that the foundation gives them.  
Celia tells us that she has a modest pantry in her house, where she sells consumer staples such as sugar, noodles, milk, and other things.  She tells us that the majority of her neighbors buy from her and that thanks to that she has a good income with which she can maintain the house and help her family.  She dreams of some day being able to have a great pantry with a lot better assortment of goods.  She requests the loan for the purchase of sugar, noodles, milk, and other types of consumer staples, with which she will be able to be better supplied and to satisfy the demands of her clients.

loans.use: to buy sugar, noodles, milk, and other consumer staples.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en:
Edgar is 28 years old; he lives in the village of Tsovagyugh, in the area of Sevan, with his parents. Edgar’s parents are jobless. Edgar graduated form Yerevan State University, but he has never worked, as he couldn’t find a job in his village.   
   
Edgar and his parents are engaged in animal breeding and market gardening. Through their joint efforts, they breed cows and calves, sheep and lambs, and chickens as well. They also produce dairy products, meat and eggs, which Edgar sells from their house. He also sells vegetables at the food market. 

Edgar and his family intend to develop their farm and therefore Edgar is asking for a 1000000 AMD loan to buy five more calves and also a large lot of fodder for his farm animals for the winter months.

loans.use: to buy five more calves and also a large lot of fodder for his farm animals for the winter months.

loans.name: Bassirou

texts.fr: Monsieur Bassirou est âgé de 21 ans. Il est célibataire et vit au Sénégal. Il exerce l’activité de charretier et s’adonne a la vente de bonbonnes de gaz. Il pratique aussi l’élevage de moutons. Il a choisi ses activités par nécessité dans le but de se procurer des revenus et de subvenir a ses propres besoins. Il est membre  de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis juillet 2010. Il sollicite un crédit de 150 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de quelques brebis à élever et qui seront  destinés  a la vente .Son objectif est d’accroitre ses revenus pour être a mesure d’améliorer sa situation de vie sociale et aussi aider ses parents.
texts.en: Bassirou is 21 years old. He is single and lives in Senegal. He is a cart driver and sells gas cylinders.  He also raises sheep. Looking for a source of income, Bassirou has chosen these professional activities out of necessity, in order to support himself.  He has been a member of a local UIMCEC branch since July 2010.  He is requesting a loan in the amount of 150,000 CFA francs in order to buy a few sheep that he will raise and ultimately resell.  His goal is to increase his income in order to improve his living conditions and to help his parents.

loans.use: to buy sheep that he will raise and ultimately resell.

loans.name: Fareed

texts.en:
Fareed who is a 49-year-old man who is the father of three sons and four daughters. He is a school teacher with a decent salary. To increase his income, Fareed works in agriculture and additionally wants to start a new internet cafe project.

He wants to prepare well for the opening by purchasing computers, so he needs to take a loan from FATEN since the amount of money he has isn't enough to pay. Getting this loan will enable Fareed to purchase the number of computers he needs to prepare to open his project successfully. This will lead to loyal costumers and will increase his income.

Fareed is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To purchase computers to prepare for opening an internet cafe.

loans.name: Elba

texts.es:
Elba es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, tiene 28 años, está casada, tienen dos hijos, uno de once y otro de nueve años, desde que se casó hace 4 años vive con su marido e hijos en esa ciudad.
Elba tiene una despensa muy bien surtida que es la única de la zona, con la cual provee de alimentos e insumos para el hogar a varias familias cercanas a su casa y al barrio. Abrió su negocio hace más de 10 años y hace aproximadamente 6 meses también empezó a trabajar en el macate (venta ambulante) con su marido el Sr. Francisco en lo que le va muy bien a pesar del poco tiempo transcurrido.
Ella solicita el crédito para abastecer su local con azúcar, leches, fideos, arroz, yerba, y demás artículos de primera necesidad, con lo cual podrá cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Agradece a la fundación por la oportunidad que le ofrece.
texts.en:
Elbe is of the city of Paraguarí.  She is 28 years old.  She is married and has two children, ages 11 and 9 years.  Since she married 4 years ago, she has lived with her husband and children in that city.  
Elbe has a very well supplied pantry that is the only one in the area, with which she provides food and supplies for the home to several families close to her house and in the neighborhood.  She opened her business over 10 years ago and approximately 6 months ago also began to work selling on foot with her husband,  Señor  Francisco,  which goes very well in spite of the little time elapsed.  She requests the loan to supply her locations with sugar, milk, noodles, rice, yerba (an herb used to make tea), and other consumer staples, with which she will be able to satisfy the demands of her clients.  She thanks the foundation for the opportunity that it offers her.

loans.use: to buy sugar, milk, noodles, rice, yerba, and other consumer staples.

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El comité Mujeres Trabajadoras nace mediante la gestión y el apoyo de un grupo de mujeres que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar. Las integrantes del comité fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas en lo personal como laboral, son 16 las que integran dicho grupo.
La Sra. Estefania es una de las miembros del grupo, ella nos comenta que se dedica a la costura, trabajo gracias al cual pudo salir adelante y ayudar a mantener la casa y a su familia. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, emprendedora y creativa, y comenta que gracias al buen trabajo que hace tiene una buena clientela.
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de telas, cierres, botones y demás insumos necesarios para su taller, ya que tiene muchos pedidos y desea poder cumplir con ellos. Agradece a la fundación por la oportunidad que les da a ella y a su grupo.
texts.en:
The committee known as Hard-working Women was started by means of the management and support of a group of women who work in the area.  The members of the committee set as their main objective the personal growth of each one of them in their labors.  There are 16 members that comprise said group. 
Señora Estefania is one of the members of the group.  She tells us that she is dedicated to dressmaking.  It is thanks to this work that she is able to do well and to help maintain the house and her family.  She is a creative, enterprising, and very hard-working woman, and she tells us that thanks to her good work she has a good clientele.  She requests the loan for the purchase of fabrics, closings, buttons and other necessary supplies for her workshop, since she has many orders and wants to be able to fill them.  She thanks the foundation for the opportunity that it gives her and her group.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, closings, buttons and other supplies.

loans.name: Antonieta Graciela

texts.es: Antonieta es socia del Banco Comunal Capulí, tiene 53 años, se dedica a la venta de pollos y derivados en el mercado, es madre de 4 hijos, casada, ella recuerda que para entrar a Finca se esforzó mucho porque antes ellas hacían un Pre Banco y después de ahorrar recién inauguraban el banco, esta muy feliz porque todo este tiempo que esta aquí pudo lograr sus metas y adquirió muchas cosas como sus congeladoras, exhibidores, y su balanza electrónica, muchas socias a veces se quieren retirar pero ella les anima a que no lo hagan para que todas puedan progresar al igual que ella, le encanta las capacitaciones y el ahorro que le ayudan a poder fijarse metas y las cumple, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de pavos.
texts.en:
Antonieta is a member of the Capulí Communal Bank (Capulí is a kind of cherry tree). 

She is 43 years old and works selling chickens and by-products at the market. She is the mother of 4 children. She remembers that in order to enter the Finca institution it took a lot of courage before she made a preliminary visit and later to save at the newly opened bank. She is very happy because all this time that she has been a member she could obtain her goals and she acquired many things such as freezers, display cases, and electronic scales. Many members at times wanted to quit but she encouraged them not to do it because all of them can get ahead the same as her. She loves the training sessions and the savings help her to be able to set goals and keep them. 

She is going to use this loan to buy turkeys.

loans.use: to buy turkeys

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: Beatriz es socia del Banco Comunal Capulí, tiene 26 años, ella viaja a la Selva distribuyendo abarrotes por mayor, tiene 1 hijo, es soltera, esta en Finca desde hace 4 años, todo este tiempo que pasó ella siente que ha progresado mucho en su vida personal como en su negocio, las capacitaciones son muy valiosas para ella, ya que ahora ahorra y esta cumpliendo todo lo que se propone, pudo comprarse un terreno en Huanta, y ahora su deseo es poder construir su casa, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de  ropa y abarrotes.
texts.en:
Beatriz is a member of the Capulí Communal Bank (Capulí is a kind of cherry tree). 

She is 26 years old and she travels to Selva distributing wholesale groceries. She is a single mother with one child. 

She has been with Finca for 4 years. Through all of the time that has passed she has felt that she has made good progress in her personal and business life. The training sessions are very valuable for her. She is now saving and is keeping to her plan. She has bought land in Huanta and now she wants to be able to build a house. 

The money from this loan will be used to buy clothing and groceries.

loans.use: to buy clothing and groceries

loans.name: Baye Siny

texts.fr: Monsieur Baye est  un jeune pêcheur de 26 ans. Il habite dans une des communautés sénégalaises et s’active dans le secteur de la pêche depuis 10 ans. Le fait qu’il soit né dans une famille de pêcheur  l’a beaucoup influencé a choisir cette  activité. Il est membre de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis septembre 2008. Il sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour l’achat d’une  combinaison qui lui permette  de plonger  dans la mer en respectant les normes de sécurité  et  exercer son activité convenablement. Son objectif est d’accroitre la rentabilité de  son activité et augmenter ses revenus pour une meilleure prise en charge de ses besoins personnels.
texts.en:
Mr. Baye is a young, 26-year-old fisherman who lives in a Senegalese community. He has been working in the fishing industry for 10 years. His being born into a family of fishermen had an important impact on his choice of activity. 

He became a member of a U-IMCEC branch in September 2008. He is seeking a loan of 200,000 francs to purchase a wetsuit that will allow him to dive into the sea in compliance with safety standards, thereby practicing his activity properly. 

He plans to increase the profitability of his business and increase his revenues to better support himself.

loans.use: to buy a wetsuit for diving.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es:
Arturo es socio del Banco Comunal Capulí, tiene 44 años, se dedica a la venta de gelatinas, logró tener una Micro Empresa, es padre de 2 hijos, casado, esta en Finca desde hace 2 años, él aprendió por su hermano a preparar gelatina y desde la fecha se dedico a eso. Lamentablemente su negocio bajó debido a los gastos que tuvo que realizar cuando su esposa salió embarazada, debido a que tuvo algunas complicaciones, pero con la ayuda de Finca el pudo salir de ese problema y ahora sigue esforzándose y las cosas están mejorando. Agradece mucho a Finca que en el momento indicado el pudo tener el apoyo necesario, de las capacitaciones él aprendió mucho como tener una buena familia y progresar en su negocio.
Arturo tiene un proyecto que lo realizará con el préstamo que esta sacando para que pueda tener mas ingresos, lo invertirá en la compra de accesorios para damas.
texts.en:
Arturo is a member of the Capulí Communal Bank (Capulí is a kind of cherry tree). 

He is 44 years old and works selling gelatin, managing to have a micro-business. He is the father of two children, married, and has been with Finca for two years. He learned from his brother how to prepare gelatin and from that time he has worked in this field. 

Unfortunately his business has declined due to the expenses that he had while his wife was pregnant, because she had some complications, but with the help of Finca he can break away from this problem and continue with determination since things are getting better. 

He is very thankful to Finca because at the helpful time he could have the necessary support, and the training sessions helped him to have good progress in family and business matters.

Arturo has a project that he would work on with the money from the loan that he is asking for. In order to have more income, he will buy accessories for women.

loans.use: to buy accessories for women

loans.name: Leonilda

texts.es: Leonilda es socia del Banco Comunal El Roble, tiene 62 años, se dedica la tejido de ropones para bebe y cubrecamas de hilo, es madre de 9 hijos, casada y socia de Finca Perú desde hace 13 años, todo este tiempo ella pudo realizar sus metas como madre y como mujer, pudo construir su casa y así ahora puede vivir de sus tejidos y del alquiler, en su Banco Comunal aprendió mucho, esta muy feliz aquí por las capacitaciones y todo lo que aprende, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de hilos.
texts.en: Leonilda is a member of the El Roble Communal Bank. She is 62 and weaves baby clothing and bedspreads. She is married with 9 children and has been a member of Finca Peru for 13 years. Throughout this time, she has been able to meet her goals as a mother and a woman. She was able to build her home and is able to live off of her weaving and rent. She has learned a lot from her Communal Bank, and is very happy to have had these loans and to have learned so much. She will invest this loan in the purchase of thread.

loans.use: to buy thread.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es: Adela es socia del Banco Comunal El Roble, tiene 39 años, se dedica a la venta de carros usados, tiene 2 hijos, es casada y socia de Finca Perú desde hace un año, esta muy feliz en Finca, solo aquí pudo aprender como se hace un negocio y el ahorro que es lo que mas valora, siente que aquí pudo progresar, agradece toda la confianza que le brindan, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en su negocio.
texts.en: Adela is a member of the El Roble Communal Bank. She is 39, married with two children, and sells used cars. She has been a member of Finca Peru for one year, and is very happy here. She is here so that she can learn about running a business and save money--this is the most important element for her. She feels that this is how she can improve and is very grateful for our confidence in her. She will use this loan to invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for cars.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita es socia del Banco Comunal Hormigas, tiene 59 años, es dueña de una Pollería, también tiene una Farmacia y Hostal que funcionan en su casa, es madre de 1 hijo, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 15 años, confía en Finca, las capacitaciones le han ayudado a progresar, todo lo que aprendió lo practicó y ahora puede vivir tranquila, al venir a Finca siente como si estuviera en casa, agradece mucho por todo el apoyo que le dieron, durante todos estos años, ahora este préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de pavos.
texts.en: Margarita is a member of the Hormigas ["Ants"] Communal Bank. She is 59 and owns a poultry store. She also has a pharmacy and runs a boarding house from her home. She has one child and has been a member of Finca Peru for 15 years. She trusts Finca. Her loans from Finca have helped her to progress. She uses everything she has learned and is now able to live comfortably. When she arrives at Finca she feels like she has come home. She is very grateful for the help they have given her all these years. She will invest this loan in the purchase of turkeys.

loans.use: to buy turkeys.

loans.name: Ruth Constanza

texts.es: Ruth es socia del Banco Comunal Hormigas, tiene 52 años, se dedica a la venta de ropas y ollas en la ferias, es madre de 3 hijos, es casada y es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 10 años. Antes ella sufrió con su negocio, pero ahora gracias  las capacitaciones que le dieron en su Banco Comunal pudo aprender y ahora esta muy bien con su negocio, y todo lo que tiene es gracias a el ahorro, antes la mantenía su esposo ahora ella es autosuficiente, aprendió a trabajar sola, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ollas.
texts.en:
Ruth is a member of the Hormigas ["Ants"] Communal Bank. She is 52 and sells clothing and pots in various markets. She is married with three children and has been a member of Finca Peru for ten years. She once had problems with her business, but now thanks to the loans she has taken out of her communal bank, she was able to learn and now runs her business much better. Everything she has is thanks to her savings. Her husband used to take care of it but she is now self-sufficient. She learned to work independently.
She will use this loan to buy pots.

loans.use: to buy pots.

loans.name: Miluska Anali

texts.es: Miluska es socia del Banco Comunal Hormigas, tiene 24 años, se dedica a la venta de celulares, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 2 años, desde joven ha trabajado mucho, empezó de muy poco con 6 celulares y ahora ya tiene mas de 50 celulares, esta muy feliz con todo lo que esta logrando, su mayor deseo es poder tener una tienda, y también crecer como mujer y seguir progresando, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de celulares de Bolivia.
texts.en:
Miluska is a member of the "Hormigas" communal bank. She is 24, and sells cell phones. She has been a member of Finca Perú for two years. 

She has worked hard since she was young. She began with very little; with six cell phones, and now she has more than 50 cell phones. She is very happy with everything that she is achieving. 

Her greatest desire is to be able to have a store, and also to grow as a woman, and continue progressing. Now, with the loan, she will invest in the purchase of cell phones from Bolivia.

loans.use: To buy cell phones.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
“Virgen de Fatima” fue denominado el comité y actualmente se encuentra en el segundo ciclo con 13 integrantes,son señoras muy actívas destacadas en su trabajo. Ellas se unieron con el propósito de buscar mejores condiciones para sus hijos y familiares y que de esa forma tengan un mejor estilo de vida.
La Sra Liberata es una de las señoras que plenamente se dedíca a su trabajo para cumplir con sus obligaciones su actividad de todos los días se basa en vender Comestibles de todo tipo, de forma ambulante. Ella comenta que tiene muy buena venta, ya que tiene clientes que siempre compran de ella. Uno de sus sueños es poder tener un local propio para no tener que recorrer, ya que ese trabajo es muy sacrificado. Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de carnes, pollos, condimentos, panificados y demás insumos necesarios para preparar los alimentos que vende. Agradece la oportunidad que les está dando la fundación y kiva.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Virgen de Fatima”, and currently it is in its second loan cycle. It has 13 members, who are very active women, outstanding in their work. They got together with the aim of seeking better conditions for their children and family members, and to have a better way of life. 

Liberata is one of the women who devotes herself completely to her work, in order to fulfil her obligations. Her daily livelihood is based on selling food of all kinds, as a street vendor. She says that she has very good sales, since she has customers who always buy from her. 

One of her dreams is to have her own shop, so that she doesn't have to walk around, as that work is very hard. She is applying for the loan to buy meats, chickens, condiments, baked goods, and other supplies she needs to prepare the food that she sells. She is thankful for the opportunity that the Foundation and Kiva are giving her.

loans.use: To buy meats, chicken, condiments, baked goods, and other supplies.

loans.name: Edwin Jonathan

texts.es:
Edwin Jonathan tiene 20 años es soltero, vive con los padres, no tiene hijos, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Edwin Jonathan se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 8 años,  las compras la realiza en Ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia.

Sueño es comprar un terreno y una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Edwin Jonathan is 20 years old.  He is single, lives with his parents and does not have children.  He lives in the Ventanas Canton in the Campo Alegre precinct. 
The SAN HYACINTH branch is located in the Campo Alegre precinct, near the Guare parish which belongs to the Ventanas Canton.  This branch is dedicated to agricultural works of short growing cycle, such as sowing corn and rice.  
Edwin Jonathan is dedicated to agriculture.  He has sown corn and rice for 8 years.  He purchases his supplies in Ventanas and sells his harvest in the same city.
He requests the loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer and supplements to care for his crops, as well as help him grow the family income. 
His dream is to buy land and a house.  In his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and supplements for the care of his crops

loans.name: Carlos Vinicio

texts.es:
Carlos Vinicio tiene 31 años es casado, vive con la esposa y con los  hijos, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Carlos Vinicio se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 3 años,  las compras la realiza en  ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es comprar una casa en la ciudad para que los hijos vayan a estudiar.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Carlos Vinicio is 31 years of age.  He is married and lives with his wife and children in the Ventanas canton in the Campo Alegre district. 

The SAN JACINTO branch is located in the Campo Alegre district, close to the Guare parish which belongs to the Ventanas Canton.  This branch is dedicated to agriculture, sowing crops with short growing cycles such as corn and rice. 

Carlos Vinicio is dedicated to agriculture.  He has sown corn and rice for 3 years.  He purchases his supplies in Ventanas and sells his harvest in teh same city. 

He requests the loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer and supplements to care for his crops as well as to help him grow the family income.  His dream is to buy a house in the city so his children can attend school.
He enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and supplements for the care of his crops.

loans.name: Sanabel

texts.en:
Sanabel is a 27-year-old married woman from Madaba, Jordan.

Sanabel is selling cloth and she is requesting a loan of 800 JD to purchase more cloth to sell.

Sanabel is looking to improve her family's living conditions and increase their living standard.

loans.use: to purchase more cloth items to sell.

loans.name: Las Poderosas Group

texts.es:
El contacto para el inicio del presente comité fue la señora Francisca quién  invito y organizo a sus amigas para formar parte del programa Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras. Ellas gustosas acepatron, ya que vieron una gran oportunidad de progreso en el programa. 
La sra. Franciscsa, es la presidenta del grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de ropas en general para damas, niños, caballeros. Esta Casada hace 22 años con el señor Anastacio  quien se dedica a la sastreria,  tienen cinco hijo estudiantes cuatro mayores de edad y uno menor en la primaria.
