Ella comenta que su sueño es poder tener un negocio grande donde ofrecer las prendas que vende.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas para damas, caballeros y niños, con los cuales podrá abastecerse y tener más variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The contact who started the present committee was Señora Francisca,  who invited and organized her friends to form part of the Enterprising Women Committee program.  They pleasantly accepted, since they saw a great opportunity for progress in the program.  
Señora Franciscsa is the president of the group.  She is dedicated to the sale of clothes in general for ladies, children and gentlemen.  She married Señor Anastacio 22 years ago.  He is a tailor.  They have five sons who are students,  four of legal age and one younger in grade school.  She tells us that their dream is to be able to have a large business where they can offer the garments that she sells.  She requests the loan to purchase garments for ladies, gentlemen and children, with which she will be able  to be supplied and to have more variety to offer her clients.

loans.use: to buy garments for ladies, gentlemen and children for subsequent sale.

loans.name: Catalina Maruja

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Catalina Maruja; tiene 58 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa,ella vende pantalones,polos,blusas y casaca para niños y ahora la socia tambien teje chompas a maquina y tambien lo vende en las tiendas que venden ropa para niños,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa y negocio de tejido de chompas . La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa de niños como pantalones, polos y chompas y tambien para comprar lana.

 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The borrower is Catalina Maruja. She is 58, married, and has five children.  

She continues to sell clothing. She sells pants, T-shirts, blouses, and jackets for children, and now she also knits sweaters by machine, and also sells them in the stores that sell children's clothing. Through this business, she is raising her children. 

Her dream is to expand her business selling clothing, and her business of knitting sweaters. She is applying for the loan to buy children's clothing such as pants, T-shirts, and sweaters, and also to buy wool. 

She is grateful for the loan, and promises to make her instalment payments on time.

loans.use: To buy children's clothing, such as pants, T-shirts, and sweaters, and also to buy wool.

loans.name: Elsa Dionicia

texts.es:
Elsa Dionicia tiene 55 años es casada vive con el esposo y con los  hijos, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Elsa Dionicia se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 20 años, herencia de los padres,  las compras las realizan en comercial Jiménez de la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es comprar una casa.

Le gusta arreglar la casa.
texts.en:
Elsa Dionicia is 55 years old, married and lives with her husband and children in Ventanas Canton in the Campo Alegre precinct.

This communal bank, San Jacinto, is located in the Campo Alegre precinct, near Guare parrish, which belongs to Ventanas Canton.  The members of this communal bank make their livings in short-cycle agriculture.  They plant corn and rice.

Elsa Dionicia makes her living in agriculture; she has been growing corn and rice for more than 20 years, a legacy from her parents.  She makes her purchases in Comercial Jiménez in the city of Ventanas, and she makes her sales in the same city.

Elsa Dionicia is requesting the loan in order to buy seeds, chemical fertilizers and organic fertilizers to take care of her crops.  In addition, it will help to increase her family's income.  Her dream is to purchase a house.

She enjoys housekeeping.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, chemical fertilizers and organic fertilizers to take care of her crops.

loans.name: Elsa Aurora

texts.es:
Elsa Aurora tiene 39 años es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Elsa Aurora se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 5 años,  las compras las realizan en comercial Jiménez de la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es tener una casa y un terreno.

Le gusta hacer la limpieza de la casa.
texts.en:
Elsa Aurora is 39 years old and married. She lives with her husband and children in the Ventanas canton in the precinct of Campo Alegre. 

The San Jacinto community bank is located in the Campo Alegre precinct, near Guare parish, which is in Ventanas canton. The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice. 

Elsa Aurora has been working in agriculture growing corn and rice for five years. She buys her products from Comercial Jiménez in Ventanas and sells her goods in the same city. 

She is asking for this loan to buy seeds and fertilizers to care for her crops, which are helping her increase her family's income. Her dream is to have a house and plot of land. 

She enjoys cleaning her house.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers to grow crops.

loans.name: Mauro Nicolas

texts.es:
Mauro Nicolas tiene 27 años es casado vive con la esposa y con los  hijos, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Mauro Nicolas se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 10 años, herencia de los padres,  las compras las realizan en comercial Jiménez de la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es comprar un terreno y una casa.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Mauro Nicolas is 27 years old and married. He lives with his wife and children in the Ventanas canton in the precinct of Campo Alegre. 

The San Jacinto community bank is located in the Campo Alegre precinct, near Guare parrish, which is part of the Ventanas canton. The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture growing corn and rice. 

Mauro Nicolas has worked in agriculture for ten years growing corn and rice, which he learned from his parents. He buys his products in Comercial Jiménez in the city of Ventanas, and sells his goods in the same city. 

He's requesting this loan in order to buy seed and fertilizers to grow crops, which help him increase his family's income. His dream is to buy a plot of land and a house. 

He enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizers to grow crops.

loans.name: Sèdjro Sabine Monique

texts.fr: Sèdjro Sabine Monique est âgée de 32 ans et vit au Bénin. Sèdjro Sabine Monique est mariée à un certain Yves. Sèdjro Sabine Monique a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Le couple n’a aucun enfant. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour contribuer aux divers besoins de la famille, Sèdjro Sabine Monique exerce depuis dix huit ans le métier de photographie dans sa région. De façon secondaire, Sèdjro Sabine Monique vend des tissus et des chaussures. Sèdjro Sabine Monique achète ses produits au Bénin et au Nigeria. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Sèdjro Sabine Monique contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Sèdjro Sabine Monique sollicite pour une troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux crédits reçus antérieurement par Sèdjro Sabine Monique ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Sèdjro Sabine Monique is 32 years old and lives in Benin.  Sèdjro Sabine Monique left school at the primary level. She is married to a man named Yves, and they have no children. The couple takes care of all household expenses together.  In order to provide for her family, Sèdjro Sabine Monique has been working as a local photographer for eighteen years.   Additionally, she also sells fabrics and shoes.  Sèdjro Sabine Monique buys her merchandise in Benin and Nigeria. With the income generated by her professional activity, Sèdjro Sabine Monique contributes to the various expenses of her family.  In order to meet the needs of an increasing number of customers, Sèdjro Sabine Monique is requesting a third loan from ALIDé. Her two previous loans have been well repaid.

loans.use: To buy films, fabrics and shoes.

loans.name: Jenny Carolina

texts.es:
Jenny Carolina tiene 25 años Es casado vive con el esposo y con los tres hijos de nueve, siete y dos años de edad , vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Jenny Carolina se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 5 años, herencia de los padres,  las compras las realizan en comercial Jiménez de la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es comprar una casa.

Le gusta descansar  y salir con los hijos.
texts.en:
Jenny Carolina is 25 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and three children, who are nine, seven, and two years old. She lives in  Ventanas canton in Campo Alegre precinct.

This communal bank, SAN JACINTO, is located in Campo Alegre, close to the Guare parish in Ventanas canton. The communal bank works in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

For the last five years Jenny Carolina has worked farming corn and rice, something she learned from her parents. She makes her purchases at Comerical Jiménez in the city of Ventanas, which is also the city where she sells her goods.

She is requesting this loan for the purchase of seeds, fertilizer, and manure to care for her crops, which will also to help her increase her family's income. Her dream is to purchase a house.

She likes to relax and go out with her children.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, and manure to care for her crops.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia Juana ahora se esta dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales como compra y venta de ovejas y tambien cria cuyes,ella lo vende en las diferentes ferias que existe en el distrito de Anta,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales.La socia solicita le credito para comprar animales como cuyes y ovejas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juana now has a business raising animals. She buys and sells sheep and guinea pigs. The animals are sold at different fairs that exist within the District of Anta. Through this business, Juana is able to help her children move forward. Her dream is to have a place where she can sell animals. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy animals, such as guinea pigs and sheep.

Juana is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and sheep.

loans.name: El Triunfo Group

texts.es:
El contacto para el inicio del presente comité fue la señora Lina quién  invito y organizo a sus amigas para formar parte del programa Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras. Ellas son mujeres trabajadoras y luchadoras que diariamente se esfuerzan por darles a sus familias lo mejor y evitar que pasen por necesidades.
La sra. Lina se dedica a la venta de frutas en general. Esta acompañada  hace 20 años con el señor Victor quien tiene una gomería, tienen cinco hijos, uno mayor de edad y cuatro menores que van a  la primaria. Lina comenta que por medio de su negocio ha podido ayudar a su marido con los gastos de la casa y de esa forma poder llevar juntos el hogar.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de frutas de estación, como ser bananas, sandias, melones, uvas y demás tipos de frutas para poder abastecerse y cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group contact who was responsible for starting this current committee is Sra. Lina. She invited and organized her friends in order to join the Committee of Women Entrepreneurs Program. The members are hardworking and determined women who strive on a daily basis to provide the best for their families and to avoid being in need.

Sra. Lina sells fruit. She has been married for 20 years to Sr. Victor, who owns a tire shop. They have five children, one who is grown while the other four are in school. Lina says that through her business she has been able to help her husband with the household expenses. By partnering together, they have been able to establish their home.

Lina is requesting a loan to buy seasonal fruits such as bananas, watermelons, melons, grapes, and other types of produce so that she can restock her inventory and satisfy her customers.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruits.

loans.name: Laura Emilia

texts.es:
Laura Emilia tiene 29 años es casada vive con el esposo y con los  hijos, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Laura Emilia se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 7 años, herencia de los padres,  las compras las realizan en comercial Jiménez de la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es tener una casa.

Le gusta arreglar la casa y descansar.
texts.en:
Laura Emilia is 29 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre in the canton of Ventanas.

The San Jacinto Communal Bank is located in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre, which is near the parish of Guare in the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Laura Emilia is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for seven years. She learned this trade from her parents. Her purchases are made at the Jiménez Commericial Center in the city of Ventanas and she sells her products in the same city. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy seeds, fertilizers, and composts for taking care of her crops. This will also help increase her family’s income. Her dream is to have a house.

Laura enjoys remodeling her house and relaxing.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and composts.

loans.name: Taofiki

texts.fr: Taofiki est âgé de 58 ans et vit au Bénin. Taofiki a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Taofiki est marié à une certaine Ayélé. Le couple a cinq enfants tous scolarisés et tous à leur charge. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à charge. Les enfants vivent ensemble avec leurs parents. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Taofiki vend depuis vingt six ans, des matériels électriques dans une région du Bénin. Taofiki s'approvisionne au Bénin. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Taofiki contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille. Pour satisfaire les besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Taofiki sollicite pour une troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux crédits reçus antérieurement par Taofiki ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Taofiki is 58 years old and lives in Benin. He attended high school. He is married to a lady named Ayele, and they have five dependent children, all in school. In addition to their own children, the couple have another child in their care. The children live with their parents, and the couple handle together the various household responsibilities. 

To support himself and his children, Taofiki has been selling electrical equipment in a region of Benin for the past 26 years. He buys his merchandise in Benin. The income generated through this activity enables him to provide for his family. 

To meet the needs of a growing customer base, Taofiki is seeking a third loan from ALIDé. The two previous credits he received were correctly repaid.

loans.use: to buy electrical equipment for resale.

loans.name: Ana Maria

Ana Maria tiene 38 años es casada vive con el esposo y con los  hijos, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Ana Maria se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 5 años, herencia de los padres,  las compras las realizan en comercial Jiménez de la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es tener una casa.

Le gusta arreglar la casa y descansar.
texts.en:
Ana Maria is 38 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre in the canton of Ventanas.

The San Jacinto Communal Bank is located in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre, which is near the parish of Guare in the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Ana Maria is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for five years. She learned this trade from her parents. Her purchases are made at the Jiménez Commericial Center in the city of Ventanas and she sells her products in the same city. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy seeds, fertilizers, and composts for taking care of her crops. This will also help increase her family’s income. Her dream is to have a house.

Ana Maria enjoys remodeling her house and relaxing. Le gusta arreglar la casa y descansar.

loans.name: Guillermo Gustavo

texts.es:
Guillermo Gustavo tiene 22 años es soltero no tiene  hijos, vive con los padres y hermanos en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Guillermo Gustavo se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 8 años, herencia de los padres,  las compras las realizan en comercial Jiménez de la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es tener una casa y un terreno.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Guillermo Gustavo is 22 years old, single, and has no children. He lives with his parents and siblings in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre in the canton of Ventanas.

The San Jacinto Communal Bank is located in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre, which is near the parish of Guare in the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Guillermo Gustavo is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for eight years. He learned this trade from his parents. His purchases are made at the Jiménez Commericial Center in the city of Ventanas and he sells his products in the same city. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy seeds, fertilizers, and composts for taking care of his crops. This will also help increase his family’s income. His dream is to have a house and a plot of land.

Guillermo Gustavo enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and composts.

loans.name: Ana Maria's Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres del presente comité son de la ciudad de Caacupé. Las señoras están en el ciclo Nº  1 con sus 13 integrantes, ellas están con las esperanzas puestas en el programa de la fundación paraguaya, ya que ven una gran oportunidad de progreso en el. Ellas tienen como objetivo trabajar juntas y por medio de ese trabajo en conjunto salir adelante.
Gladys comenta que se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de bebidas, en lo cual le va muy bien. Dice que la mayoría de sus vecinos van hasta su negocio, lo cual la ayuda a tener los medios necesarios para poder ayudar a su familia. Ella se define como una mujer muy sacrificada y luchadora, que diariamente se esfuerza por sus seres queridos.
Ella solicita el crédito para poder surtir su negocio, ya que se acerca la época donde más ventas tiene, que es la navidad y el año nuevo. Ella desea comprar cervezas, vinos, gaseosas, sidras y demás. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
The women of this existing committee are from the city of Caacupé. This group of women is participating in their first loan cycle with 13 members. They have placed their hopes in this program with Fundación Paraguaya because they see it as a great opportunity for making progress. Their goal is to work together and move forward as a result.

Gladys says that she sells all types of beverages and has done very well. She says that most of her neighbors come to her business, which gives her the means to support her family. Gladys defines herself as a self-sacrificing and determined woman who strives each day on behalf of her loved ones.

She is requesting a loan to restock her business since the season when she has more sales, Christmas and New Years, is approaching. Gladys wants to buy beer, wine, soft drinks, cider, and other beverages. She is grateful for the opportunity she has received.

loans.use: to buy beer, wine, soft drinks, cider, and other beverages.

loans.name: Gabriel Abelardo

texts.es:
Gabriel Abelardo tiene 20 años es casado vive con la esposa y con el hijo, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Gabriel Abelardo se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 2 años, herencia de los padres,  las compras las realizan en comercial Jiménez de la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es tener una casa y un terreno.

Le gusta hacer deporte y escuchar música.
texts.en:
Gabriel Abelardo is 20 years old, married, and lives with his wife and child in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre in the canton of Ventanas.

The San Jacinto Communal Bank is located in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre, which is near the parish of Guare in the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Gabriel Abelardo is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for two years. He learned this trade from his parents. His purchases are made at the Jiménez Commericial Center in the city of Ventanas and he sells his products in the same city. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy seeds, fertilizers, and composts for taking care of his crops. This will also help increase his family’s income. His dream is to have a house and a plot of land.

Gabriel Abelardo enjoys playing sports and listening to music.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and composts.

loans.name: Valeria Tatiana

texts.es:
Valeria Tatiana tiene 24 años es casada vive con el esposo y con los  hijos, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre Tiene tres hijos de 10, 8 y 2 mese de edad.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Valeria Tatiana se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 2 años, herencia de los padres,  las compras las realizan en comercial Jiménez de la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es tener una casa y un terreno.

Le gusta estar con la familia.
texts.en:
Valeria Tatiana is 24 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre in the canton of Ventanas. She has three children who are ages 10, 8, and 2 months.

The San Jacinto Communal Bank is located in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre, which is near the parish of Guare in the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Valeria Tatiana is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for two years. She learned this trade from her parents. Her purchases are made at the Jiménez Commericial Center in the city of Ventanas and she sells her products in the same city. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy seeds, fertilizers, and composts for taking care of her crops. This will also help increase her family’s income. Her dream is to have a house and a plot of land.

Valeria Tatiana enjoys being with her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and composts.

loans.name: Lakounlé Prospère

texts.fr: Lakounlé Prospère est âgé de 33 ans et vit au Bénin. Lakounlé Prospère a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Lakounlé Prospère est marié à une marchande du nom de Charlotte. Le couple a quatre enfants dont certains scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Les enfants vivent ensemble avec leurs parents. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Lakounlé Prospère répare depuis neuf ans les pneus. Lakounlé Prospère achète ses produits au Bénin et au Nigeria. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Lakounlé Prospère contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Lakounlé Prospère sollicite pour une troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux crédits reçus antérieurement par Lakounlé Prospère ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Lakounlé Prospère is 33 years old and lives in Benin. He attended primary school. He is married to a merchant named Charlotte, and they have four dependent children, some of whom go to school. The children live with their parents, and the couple handle together the various household responsibilities. 

To support himself and his children, Lakounlé Prospère has been repairing tires for the past nine years. He buys his supplies in Benin and Nigeria. The income generated through this activity enables him to provide for his family. 

To meet the needs of a growing customer base, Lakounlé Prospère is seeking a third loan from ALIDé. The two previous credits he received were correctly repaid.

loans.use: to buy supplies for repairing tires.

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es:
Juan Pablo tiene 34 años es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Juan Pablo se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 15 años, herencia de los padres,  las compras las realizan en comercial Jiménez de la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es tener una casa y un terreno y un vehículo para el trabajo.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Juan Pablo is 34 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre in the canton of Ventanas.

The San Jacinto Communal Bank is located in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre, which is near the parish of Guare in the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Juan Pablo is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for 15 years. He learned this trade from his parents. His purchases are made at the Jiménez Commericial Center in the city of Ventanas and he sells his products in the same city. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy seeds, fertilizers, and composts for taking care of his crops. This will also help increase his family’s income. His dream is to have a house, a plot of land, and a vehicle for work.

Juan Pablo enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and composts.

loans.name: Ndiankou

texts.fr: Monsieur Ndiankou  est âgé de 31 ans. Il vit dans une des localités du Sénégal. Il exerce depuis plus de 8 ans l’activité de plongeur en mer. Auparavant il exerçait  l’activité de vendeur dans une boutique. Il a choisi cette activité car c’est un passionné du plongeon. Ce qui l’intéresse  beaucoup aussi c’est la prise de poissons et leur commercialisation. Il est membre de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis septembre 2009.Il a déjà remboursé un crédit antérieur. Il sollicite un prêt de 350 000 frs prévu pour la réfection et l’entretien de sa pirogue qui est en état  de délabrement. Son objectif est de mieux rentabiliser son commerce pour améliorer la situation  sociale de sa famille
texts.en:
Mr. Ndiankou is 31 years old. He lives in a district of Senegal. He has been a deep sea diver for over eight years, an activity chosen out of passion. Prior to that, he was a sales clerk in a shop. He has developed a strong interest in catching and selling fish. 

He became a member of a U-IMCEC branch in September 2009. He has already obtained and repaid one loan. He is now seeking a loan of 350,000 francs to repair his boat. His goal is to increase the profitability of his business and improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to repair his fishing boat.

loans.name: Jacinta Nicolasa

texts.es:
Jacinta Nicolasa tiene 34 años es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Jacinta Nicolasa se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 2 años, herencia de los padres,  las compras las realizan en comercial Jiménez de la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es tener una casa y un vehiculo.

Le gusta tejer ropa de lana para los hijos.
texts.en:
Jacinta Nicolasa is 34 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre in the canton of Ventanas.

The San Jacinto Communal Bank is located in the neighborhood of Campo Alegre, which is near the parish of Guare in the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Jacinta Nicolasa is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for two years. She learned this trade from her parents. Her purchases are made at the Jiménez Commericial Center in the city of Ventanas and she sells her products in the same city. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy seeds, fertilizers, and composts for taking care of her crops. This will also help increase her family’s income. Her dream is to have a house and a vehicle.

Jacinta Nicolasa enjoys knitting clothes out of wool for her children.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and composts.

loans.name: Wilmer Hernan

texts.es:
Wilmer Hernan tiene 19 años es casado vive con la esposa y con la  hija de 1 año de edad, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Wilmer Hernan se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 2 años, herencia de los padres,  las compras las realizan en comercial Jiménez de la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es tener una casa.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Wilmer, 19, is married and lives with his wife and their 1-year old daughter in Ventanas Canton, Campo Alegre division.

The San Jacinto bank is located in Campo Alegre, near Guare parish which is part of Ventanas canton and focuses on short-cycle agricultural crops such as corn and rice.

Wilmer Hernan has planted rice and corn for the past 2 years, skills that he learned from his parents.  He buys in the Jiménez Commercial Center in Ventanas and sells the products there as well.

He will use the loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and manure to care for his plants, and they will help increase his income for his family.  He dreams of having a house.

He likes sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and manure to care for his plantings and to increase the income for his family

loans.name: Gregorio Mariano

texts.es:
Gregorio Mariano tiene 37 años es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Gregorio Mariano se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 10 años, herencia de los padres,  las compras las realizan en comercial Jiménez de la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es tener una casa.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Gregorio Mariano is 37 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and their children. They live in the Ventanas canton in the Campo Alegre precinct.

The communal bank San Jacinto is located in the Campo Alegre precinct, near the Guare parish, which is part of the Ventanas canton. This communal bank works with short-cycle agricultural tasks such as planting corn and rice.

Gregoria Mariano works in agriculture. He has been planting corn and rice for 10 years on an inheritance from his parents. He buys his supplies at the Jiménez commercial center in the city of Ventanas, and he sells his products in the same city.

He is applying for the loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and compost to care for his crops. In addition, this will help him increase his family income. His dream is to own a house.

He likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and compost to care for his crops and to help him increase the family income.

loans.name: Tomas Nicolas

texts.es:
Tomas Nicolas  tiene 77 años vive en unión libre con la compañera y con un hijo y un nieto, vive en el Cantón Ventanas en el Reciento Campo Alegre.

Esta ventanilla SAN JACINTO, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Campo Alegre, cerca de la parroquia Guare perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Tomas Nicolas se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace 52 años atras, herencia de los padres,  las compras las realizan en la ciudad de ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El préstamo lo solicita para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para el cuidado de los cultivos, además le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. Sueño es tener una casa.

Le gusta descansar.
texts.en:
Tomas Nicolas is 77 years old. He lives in a common-law marriage with his life partner, one son and a grandson. He lives in the canton of Ventanas, in the  Campo Alegre district.

The SAN JACINTO communal bank is located in the Campo Alegre district, near the parish of Guare in the canton of Ventanas. The members of this communal bank work in agriculture, planting short-cycle crops of corn and rice. 

Tomas Nicolas has worked in agriculture for 52 years, planting corn and rice, a legacy from his parents. He buys supplies in the Jiménez shopping center of the city of Ventanas, and he sells his products in the same city.

He is requesting the loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and compost to take care of his crops. This has been useful in increasing his family's income. His dream is to have a house. 

He enjoys resting in his free time.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and compost for his crops.

loans.name: Odalis

texts.es:
Odalis, tiene 42 años de edad es una mujer alegre, entusiasta  y emprendedora. Convive con Alfonso quien es comerciante. Juntos habitan en su casa propia en compañía de su hijo que es discapacitado. El trabajo que realiza Odalis, es la crianza de pollos, ésta crianza lo realiza en su propio terreno, donde tiene instalado un galpón con una capacidad de hasta 200 pollos, ésta actividad viene realizando desde hace 03 años consecutivos, tiempo en el cual le valió para hacerse conocida por los vecinos y compradores  mayoristas que le compran los pollos. Ésta actividad lo realiza con el apoyo de sus hijos ya sea para la crianza, limpieza y venta. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que es rentable, le da un buen ingreso económico que le permite pagar sus gastos, y le permite estar en todo momento con sus hijos. Lo que no le gusta es que los alimentos del pollo varían en el precio, lo cual hacen variar sus márgenes de ganancia, pero  esto no la desanima a seguir trabajando. Nos comenta que tiene planes de criar mayor cantidad de pollos porque así obtendrá mayor ingreso económico. Este será su 04 préstamo con la institución MFP, le gusta mucho su grupo por que siente que son responsables, espera poder seguir bien y seguir trabajando con la institución a quien agradece mucho por la oportunidad brindada.
Con el préstamo solicitado de 3000 nuevos  soles comprará hojas de bijao que se utilizan para cambiar y ampliar su galpón, y así poner más cantidad de pollos.
texts.en:
Odalis is 42 years old and a cheerful, enthusiastic, and enterprising woman. She is in a common-law relationship with Alfonso, who is a merchant. They live together in their own home along with her son who is disabled. Odalis raises chickens on her own land and has a chicken coop that can hold up to 200 birds. She has been in this business for three consecutive years. During this time, she has become well-known among her neighbors and the wholesale buyers who purchase chickens. In her business, Odalis has the support of her children who help with raising, cleaning, and selling the chickens. What she enjoys about her work is the profitability because the good income that she generates allows her to pay for expenses. She also gets to spend every moment with her children. What she does not like are the cost variations in feeding the chickens because they cause her profit margins to be unstable. However, she is not discouraged from continuing her work. Odalis says that she has plans to raise chickens in larger quantities so that she can earn more income.

This will be her fourth loan with the MFP organization. She enjoys being part of her group because she feels the members are responsible. Odalis expects to continue doing well and working with the organization. She is grateful for the opportunity that has been given to her. The loan of 3000 PEN that she is requesting will be used to buy “bijao” (a South American plant) leaves to remodel and expand her chicken coop. She will also buy more chickens.

loans.use: to buy more chickens and "bijao" leaves for renovating her chicken coop.

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Group

texts.es:
10 mujeres de la ciudad de Caacupé se unieron con las ganas de salir adelante, ayudarse y por medio del trabajo en conjunto superar las barreras que tienen. Ellas son mujeres trabajadoras, emprendedoras y muy sacrificadas. Día a día se esfuerzan por darle a sus familias lo mejor y de esa forma evitar que pasen por privaciones.
Una de las miembros es la señora Nilsa, quien se dedica a la venta de helados. Ella tiene una buena clientela, ya que se dedica a esto hace ya un tiempo. Gracias a sus ventas ella puede ayudar en los gastos de la casa, y de esa manera hacer un poco más llevadero los gastos. Una de sus metas es poder tener un gran local donde pueda ofrecer más comodidad a sus clientes.
Nilsa solicita el crédito para la compra de helados de variados sabores, con los cuales podrá abastecerse y tener más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes, ya que se acerca la época de calor y desea tener un buen stock.
texts.en:
Ten women from the city of Caacupé have joined together because of their desire to move forward, help one another, and work together to overcome the barriers that they face. They are hardworking, enterprising, and self-sacrificing women. Day after day, they strive to provide the best for their families so that they can avoid hardships.

One of the members is Sra. Nilsa, who sells ice cream. She has a good customer base since she has already been in business for some time. Thanks to her sales, Nilsa is able to help with the household expenses, which makes dealing with the bills a little more bearable. One of her goals is to have a large shop where her customers can be more comfortable.

Nilsa is requesting a loan to buy ice cream in various flavors so that she can be well-stocked and have more variety to offer to her customers. The warm season is approaching, so she wants to have a large inventory.

loans.use: to buy ice cream in various flavors.

loans.name: Doris

texts.fr: Doris est âgée de 28 ans et vit au Bénin. Doris a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Doris est mariée à un certain Kolawolé. Le couple a deux enfants dont un scolarisé et tous à leur charge. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour contribuer aux divers besoins de la famille, Doris exerce depuis une dizaine d’année le métier de photographie dans sa région. Parallèlement, Doris vend du maïs. Doris s'approvisionne dans une région du Bénin. Grâce aux revenus que lui génèrent ces activités, Doris contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Doris sollicite pour une troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux crédits reçus antérieurement par Doris ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Doris is 28 years old and lives in Benin. She left school at the primary grade level. She is married to a man named Kolawolé. They have two children, of whom one is in school. Both of the children are in their care. The couple jointly ensure that the diverse household expenses are covered.

To help meet various family needs, Doris has been working in the photography trade for about ten years in her region. Concurrently, she sells corn. Her supplies come from one of the regions of Benin. Thanks to the revenues her businesses generate, she is helping with the different family expenses.

To satisfy the needs of her burgeoning customer base, Doris is requesting a loan from ALIDé for a third time. The two loan previously received by Doris were indeed repaid.

loans.use: to buy sacks of corn

loans.name: Aby

texts.fr: Madame Aby est une femme de 42 ans qui habite au Sénégal. Elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 5 et 24 ans. Elle évolue dans le secteur du  commerce  depuis plus  de 10 ans.  Elle s’adonne à la vente de glace et de poulets. Ce sont les difficultés de la vie qui l’ont poussé a choisir cette activité dans le souci de se procurer des revenus. Elle est  plutôt intéressé  par l’aspect lucratif de son activité. Elle est membre du guichet de l’U-IMCEC  qui se trouve dans sa zone d’habitation depuis novembre 2003. Elle y a déjà remboursé 2 prêts  antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs prévu pour l’achat d’un congélateur plus approprié  a la vente de glace et la conservation des poulets qu’elle commercialise. Elle souhaite mieux rentabiliser son activité de commerce accroitre  ses revenus afin de contribuer a l’amélioration des conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Ms. Aby is a 42-year-old woman who lives in Senegal. She is married and the mother of four children, from 5 to 24 years of age. She has been working in the commerce sector for over ten years. She devotes all her time to selling ice and chickens. What has driven her to choose this business are the problems in life concerned with earning an income. She is rather interested by the lucrative aspect of her business.

Since November 2003, she has been a member of the U-IMCEC office that is found where she lives. She has already repaid two previous loans there. 

Ms. Aby is requesting a 300,000 francs loan for buying a freezer more suitable for selling ice and for preserving chickens, which she markets. She would like to make her work in commerce more profitable and to increase her revenues, so as to help improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a freezer

loans.name: Julienne Sèmako

texts.fr: Julienne Sèmako est âgée de 39 ans et vit au Bénin. Julienne Sèmako a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Julienne Sèmako est mariée à un certain Désiré. Le couple a un enfant scolarisé et à leur charge. En plus de leur enfant, le couple a deux autres enfants à charge. Les enfants vivent ensemble avec leurs parents. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour contribuer aux divers besoins de la famille, Julienne Sèmako exerce depuis quinze ans le métier de coiffure dans son atelier située à son domicile. De façon secondaire, Julienne Sèmako vend des mèches, de charbon de bois et de l’huile de palme. Julienne Sèmako achète ses produits au Bénin. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Julienne Sèmako contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Julienne Sèmako sollicite pour une deuxième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le crédit reçu antérieurement par Julienne Sèmako a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
Julienne Sèmako is 39 years old and lives in Benin. She left school at the secondary level. She is married to a man named Désiré. They have one child who is in school and in their care. In addition to their child, they have two other children to support. The children live together with their parents. The couple jointly ensure that the diverse household expenses are covered. 

To help meet the various needs of the family,  Julienne Sèmako has been working in the hairdressing trade for fifteen years in her salon in her home. On the side, she sells hair extensions, charcoal, and palm oil. She purchases her supplies in Benin. Thanks to the revenues that her business generates, she is helping with the different family expenses. 

To satisfy her burgeoning customer base,  Julienne Sèmako is requesting a loan from ALIDé for a second time. The previously loan obtained by  Julienne Sèmako was indeed repaid.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and othe products (palm oil, charcoal).

loans.name: Los Esforzados Por Siempre Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Los Esforzados por Siempre”, está conformado por 17 emprendedores, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se destacan, fotografía, orfebrería, venta de joyas, venta de ropa, venta de perfumes, confección, entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la comuna de Independencia.
Rosaura integrante del grupo del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra en la segunda fila de pié, en el tercer lugar de izquierda a derecha, usa su cabello suelto y chasquilla. Además viste una polera estampada color blanco y negro.
Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa reciclada y nueva, desde hace 10 años, además desde hace un año ya se encuentra con permiso para trabajar sin dificultad. 
Su mercadería la ofrece en diferentes ferias libres y también desde su casa, su horario de trabajo es a partir de las 8ºº de la mañana hasta las 16ºº horas. Su mercadería la traslada en un triciclo, comenta que a pesar que no se encuentre en las mejores condiciones, le es muy útil.
Su mercadería la compra en distribuidoras, específicamente ropa para varón, dama y niños.
Con el crédito comprará ropa nueva para varón.
Una de sus metas es tener un local establecido y ofrecer sus productos en una boutique.
Rosaura vive junto a su hermano y su hijo de 12 años de edad. Uno de sus sueños es obtener su casa propia, para esto ya postuló al subsidio habitacional. 
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio y surgir.
Respecto al grupo del Banco comunal, comenta que son muy organizados. 
Independencia es una de las 34 comunas que componen la ciudad de Santiago (capital de Chile), ubicada en el sector centro-norte. Surgió a fines del siglo XIX como un sector tradicional de la ciudad. Su eje principal es la Av. Independencia, por la cual pasaba el antiguo Camino del Inca, puerta de entrada por el norte, a la ciudad de Santiago. Dada su amplia población indígena, en Independencia se encuentra el Centro Cultural Indígena de Chile. Cuenta también con importantes construcciones históricas, entre ellas 6 monumentos históricos de Chile.
texts.en:
This Communal Bank is called “Los Esforzados por Siempre” and consists of 17 entrepreneurs who engage in different trades such as photography, precious metalwork, selling jewelry, selling clothes, selling perfumes, sewing, and other businesses. All of the members are from the community of Independencia.

Rosaura is a member of this Communal Bank. In the photograph, she is in the second row that is standing. She is the third person, going from left to right, with her hair down and who has bangs. Rosaura is wearing a blouse with a black-and-white print. She sells both recycled and new clothing and has been in business for 10 years. For the past year, she has been able to work without any difficulty.

Rosaura offers her merchandise at different open fairs and also sells from her home. Her work schedule is from 8am to 2pm. Her merchandise is transported by tricycle. Even though it is not in the best condition, it is very useful. Rosaura buys her merchandise from distributors, especially those who sell clothing for men, women, and children. With this loan, she will buy new clothing for men. One of her goals is to have an established location and offer her products in a boutique.

Rosaura lives with her brother and her 12-year-old son. One of her dreams is to obtain her own home. For this reason, she has applied for a housing subsidy. She is very pleased with and appreciative of the opportunity provided by Fondo Esperanza so that she can invest and excel in her business. Regarding her Communal Bank, Rosaura says the group is very organized.

Independencia is one of 34 communities that comprise the city of Santiago, the capital of Chile which is located in the north-central sector. This area emerged in the late 19th century as one of the more traditional sectors of the city. The main axis is Independencia Avenue, which used to serve as the old road of the Incas and the gateway to the north in the city of Santiago. Given the growing indigenous population, Independencia is known as the Indigenous Cultural Center of Chile. There are also important buildings in Independencia, including six historical Chilean monuments.

loans.use: to buy new clothing for men.

loans.name: Clarisse Anto

texts.fr: Clarisse Anto est âgée de 40 ans et vit au Bénin. Clarisse Anto a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire et a appris la couture. Clarisse Anto est mariée à un certain Christian. Le couple a un enfant scolarisé et à leur charge. Le couple vit ensemble avec leur unique enfant. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de son enfant, Clarisse Anto exerce depuis une quinzaine d’années, la couture dans une région du Bénin. De façon secondaire, Clarisse Anto vend des fournitures de couture. Clarisse Anto achète ses produits au Bénin. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Clarisse Anto contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Clarisse Anto sollicite un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Clarisse Anto is 40 years old and lives in Benin. She left school at the primary grade level and learned how to sew. She is married to a man named Christian. They have a child in school and in their care. The couple live together with their only child and jointly ensure that the diverse household expenses are covered.

To support herself and her child, Clarisse Anto has been sewing for about fifteen years in her region in Benin. On the side, she sells sewing supplies. She purchases her supplies in Benin. Thanks to the revenues this business generates, she is helping with the different family expenses. 

To satisfy the needs of her burgeoning customer base, Clarisse Anto is requesting a loan from ALIDé for a third time. The first two loans were indeed repaid.

loans.use: to buy an embroidering machine and some sewing supplies

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es: La joven Sandra Milena a sus 25 años en madre soltera de una hija de 4 años por quien decide iniciar su propio negocio de venta de prendas de vestir femenina con el animo de poder generar los ingresos necesarios para su sostenimiento puesto que no cuenta con el apoyo de padre de su hija. La joven Sandra Milena cuenta con experiencia de 5 años en esta labor que espera realizar a la par con su trabajo en una empresa de flores en la cual trabaja únicamente en las mañanas. Para iniciar su negocio, la joven Sandra Milena necesita de la compra de surtido en prendas de vestir femeninas que pueda ofrecer a sus familiares y amigos. El sueño de la joven Sandra Milena es tener su propio almacén de venta de ropa y brindarle a su hija una excelente educación y bienestar.
texts.en:
Sandra Milena is a young woman who is 25 years of age and a single mother of a four-year-old daughter. She decided to start her own business of selling women’s clothes. Sandra is excited about generating the necessary income to support her family since she does not receive assistance from the father of her daughter. Young Sandra Milena has five years of experience in this type of work. For the past two years, she has been employed at a florist where she only works in the mornings.

In order to start her business, young Sandra Milena needs to buy women’s clothes that she can offer to her relatives and friends. Her dream is to have her own clothing store so that she can support her daughter and provide her with an excellent education.

loans.use: to buy women's jeans, blouses, and undergarments for starting her business.

loans.name: Mathias

texts.fr: Mathias est âgé de 31 ans et vit au Bénin. Mathias est marié à une couturière du nom de Babine. Mathias a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Le couple a deux enfants, dont un scolarisé et tous à leur charge. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour contribuer aux divers besoins de la famille, Mathias exerce le métier de photographie dans sa région. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Mathias contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Mathias désire mieux équiper son atelier par l'acquisition de pellicules et autres articles nécessaires au bon fonctionnement de son activité. Pour ce faire, Mathias sollicite pour une deuxième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le crédit reçu antérieurement par Mathias a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
Mathias is 31 years old and lives in Benin. He is married to a clothier named Babine. Mathias left school at the primary grade level. The couple has two children, one of whom is in school. Both children are in their care. The couple jointly ensure that the various household expenses are covered. 

To help with the diverse needs of the family, Mathias has been working in the photography trade in his region. Thanks to the income this business generates, he is helping to cover the different family expenses. 

To satisfy the needs of his burgeoning customer base, Mathias would like to do better at equipping his workshop by acquiring some film and other necessary items for his business to operate properly. To do so, Mathias is requesting a loan from ALIDé for a second time. The loan previously received by Mathias was indeed repaid.

loans.use: to buy film and frames for photographs and some video cassettes

loans.name: Glenys

texts.es: Glenys de 37 años de edad tiene dos negocios en las actividades de comercio y servicio simultáneamente; ella ofrece a las amas de casa, la facilidad de que alquilen máquinas para lavar su ropa y la de su familia, opción mediante la cual éstas disminuyen su carga del trabajo doméstico; la otra actividad es la de vender mercancía variada,  como colonias, desodorantes ropa interior, suéteres y bermudas. Su negocio lo inició,  cuando llegó desplazada de su pueblo natal, buscando oportunidades de vivir en paz y de generar ingresos, con el fin de sacar adelante a su familia, conformada por su cónyuge y sus 5 hijos hoy en las edades de 4 a 17 años. Inicialmente compró 2 lavadoras y posteriormente aprovechó su clientela doméstica para venderle productos mediante guías especializadas o catálogos.  Glenys para empezar acudió a  créditos onerosos que le prestaron en el barrio, personas dedicadas a esta actividad y que gradualmente ha ido saliendo de ellos, con su espíritu de trabajo forzado. En la actualidad  planea vincularse a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  para capitalizarse mediante su credikiva, a más bajo interés. Este es la primera vez que accede a los beneficios de esta organización y con el credikiva, comprará lavadoras y mercancías variadas para atender su demanda de fin de año, que usualmente se incrementa y  le permite ganar mas dinero, que en las otras temporadas, razón por la cual quiere aprovecharla una vez mas.
texts.en:
Glenys is 37 years old and operates two businesses (one retail and one service) at the same time.  She rents out washing machines to housewives so that they can do laundry for their families.  Providing this option helps them to reduce their workload around the house.  Her other business involves selling various types of merchandise such as colognes, deodorants, undergarments, sweaters, and Bermuda shorts.  Glenys started her business when she left her hometown in search of opportunities to live peacefully and generate income needed to raise her family, which consists of her husband and five children who are now between the ages of 4 and 17.  

Glenys initially started with two washing machines and later took advantage of her domestic clientele to sell products through specialty guides and catalogs.  She began accessing burdensome loans that were being offered in her neighborhood by people who were in that type of business.  Glenys was able to get out of those loans over time through hard work.  She currently approached Fundación Mario Santo Domingo about gaining capital with a low-interest Kiva loan.  This is the first time she has accessed the benefits of the organization, as well as a Kiva loan.  She will buy washing machines and various merchandise so that she can meet the year-end demand that usually increases at this time and allows her to generate more income compared to other seasons.  For this reason, she wants to take advantage one more time.

loans.use: to buy washing machines and various merchandise.

loans.name: Mamadou

texts.fr: Monsieur Mamadou  est âgé de 34ans et vit au Sénégal. Il est célibataire mais père d’un enfant de 7 ans. Auparavant il était mécanicien. Actuellement  Il est chauffeur depuis plus de 10 ans. Il exerce parallèlement  l’activité de vente de friperie.  . Il a choisi cette  activité sous l’influence d’un de ses amis  Qui exerce la meme activité.  Ce qui l’intéresse  dans son activité c’est son aspect lucratif. Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC de la  localité ou elle habite depuis juillet 2011. Il sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour l’achat d’habits de friperie  pour femmes et hommes  a revendre. Ce financement lui permettra de développer son activité  pour accroitre ses revenus.
texts.en:
Mr. Mamadou is 34 years old and lives in Senegal. He is unmarried but the father of a 7-year-old child. In the past, he used to be a mechanic. Now he has been a driver for over ten years. Concurrently, he sells second-hand clothing. He chose this business because he was influenced by his friends who work in the same business. What is interesting to him is the lucrative aspects of his work. 

Since July 2011, he has been a member of one of the local U-IMCEC branch offices. He is requesting a loan of 200,000 francs for buying used men's and women's clothing to resell. This financing will enable him to develop his business, so as to increase his revenues.

loans.use: to buy used cloting to resell

loans.name: Janeth

texts.es: Janeth de 33 años de edad , es una mujer muy alegre, emprendedora y dinámica. Convive con Daniel  quien es empleado, tiene dos hijos menores quienes son su inspiración para progresar. Juntos habitan en su casa propia la cual logró construir con el apoyo incondicional de su pareja  y sus dos menores hijos. El trabajo que realiza Janeth es la venta de materiales de construcción, accesorios, entre  otros, para esto tiene un espacio acondicionado en su propia casa. Tiene más de 3 años realizando está actividad, y en donde su esposo siempre la apoyo desde un principio, y durante este tiempo le ha valido hacerse conocida, siendo ahora su negocio las más concurrida de su localidad. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo, es el ingreso económico, ya que le permite mantener un sustento a su hogar, y le ha permitido pagar los estudios de hijos los cuales son la inspiración de seguir trabajando para darles una mejor calidad de vida. y viendo que sus productos no son perecibles y los puede almacenar por mas tiempo, además de eso la rentabilidad de su negocio. Tiene planes de seguir incrementado y ampliar su negocio. Este sería su cuarto préstamo con la institución MFP, se siente muy contenta y agradecida con el  grupo que viene trabajando ya que son personas responsables, para lo cual se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el préstamo solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, comprará materiales para implementar su ferretería, ella considera que a mayor variedad mayor ganancias.
texts.en:
Janeth is 33 years old and a cheerful, enterprising, and dynamic woman. She is in a common-law relationship with Daniel, who is employed, and they have two young children who are her inspiration for making progress. They live together in their own home that was built with the unconditional support of her partner and her two children. Janeth sells construction materials, accessories, and other products from a space that is set aside in her house. She has been in business for more than three years. Her husband has always supported her from the beginning and she has become recognized throughout this time. What she enjoys about her work is being able to generate a financial income that allows her to sustain her household. This has also enabled her to pay for her children’s studies since they are the inspiration that drives her to continue working so that they can have a better quality of life. Since the products she sells are nonperishable, she is able to store them for long periods of time. In addition, her business is profitable. Janeth has plans to continue growing and expanding her business.

This will be her fourth loan with the MFP organization. She is very pleased with and appreciative of the group she works with because the members are responsible people. For this reason, Janeth promises to be punctual with her payments. The loan of 2000 PEN that she requested will be used to buy merchandise to keep her hardware store in operation. She believes having a greater variety will generate more earnings.

loans.use: to purchase inventory to restock her hardware store.

loans.name: Houinsi Justine

texts.fr: Houinsi Justine est âgée de 45 ans et vit au Bénin. Houinsi Justine a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Houinsi Justine est mariée à un certain Marcel. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Houinsi Justine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les divers besoins de la maison. Pour assurer les divers besoins, Houinsi Justine vend depuis dix ans des produits vivriers, des bassines en plastiques et de l'huile végétale dans un quartier du Bénin. De façon secondaire, Houinsi Justine vend des vêtements et des produits cosmétiques. Houinsi Justine s’approvisionne au Bénin et à Lomé. Grâce au revenu que lui génère son activité, Houinsi Justine contribue aux différentes charges de sa famille. Pour rehausser le niveau de son activité et mieux satisfaire les besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Houinsi Justine sollicite un cinquième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les quatre premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Houinsi Justine is 45 years old and lives in Benin. She attended high school. She is married to a man named Marcel, and they have three dependent children who all go to school. Houinsi Justine lives with her husband and their children, and the couple handle together the various household responsibilities. 

For the past ten years, Houinsi Justine has been selling food products, plastic tubs, and vegetable oil in a district of Benin to help provide for her family. As a secondary activity, she also sells clothes and cosmetics. She buys her merchandise in Benin and in Lomé. The income earned allows Houinsi 
Justine to provide for the needs of her family. 

In order to bolster her activity and better meet the needs of a growing customer base, Houinsi Justine is seeking a fifth loan from ALIDé. The four previous loans were correctly repaid.

loans.use: to buy food products, plastic tubs, and jugs of vegetable oil for resale.

loans.name: Ceferina

texts.es:
Ceferina nació en provincia de Chumbivilcas del departamento del Cusco, Perú. Ceferina tiene 40 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos. 

Ceferina tiene tres actividades económicas principales como por ejemplo venta de comida, venta de pasto, venta de bebidas alcohólicas como por ejemplo chicha de jora, cerveza y gaseosa. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. Ceferina requiere el préstamo para comprar cerveza.   

Ceferina es integrante del banco comunal “Pillao”. Este  grupo está conformado con 13 socios que viven  en la provincia de Cusco en el distrito de San Jerónimo.
texts.en:
Ceferina was born in Chumbivilcas Province in the Department of Cusco, Peru. She is 40 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has four children.

Ceferina has three main business activities: selling food, selling fodder, and selling alcoholic beverages, such as “chicha de jora” (a beverage made from corn) and beer, and sodas. She has been in business for several years and has done very well. Ceferina is requesting a loan to buy beer.

She is a member of the Communal Bank “Pillao”. This group consists of 11 members who live in the District of San Jerónimo in Cusco Province.

loans.use: to buy beer.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar nació en la ciudad de Sicuani pero actualmente vive en la ciudad del Cusco, Perú. Edgar tiene 41 años edad, es casado y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos. 

Edgar es carpintero y tiene un pequeño taller en su domicilio donde fabrica diferentes tipos de muebles de madera. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. Edgar requiere el préstamo para comprar madera. 

Edgar es integrante del banco comunal “Pillao”. Este  grupo está conformado con 13 socios que viven  en la provincia de Cusco del distrito de San Jerónimo.
texts.en:
Edgar was born in the city of Sicuani but currently lives in the city of Cusco, Peru. He is 41 years old, married, and has three children.

Edgar is a carpenter and has a small workshop in his home where he makes different types of wooden furniture. He has been in this business for several years and has done very well. Edgar is requesting a loan to buy wood.

He is a member of the Communal Bank “Pillao”. This group consists of 13 members who live in the District of San Jerónimo in Cusco Province.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es: Aurelia, de 42 años de edad, es una mujer carismática, luchadora con ganas de progresar, es conviviente con Elmer quien es agricultor. Vive con su pareja y sus tres hijos, por los cuales se esfuerza en salir adelante, y juntos habitan en su casa propia. El trabajo de Aurelia consiste en la venta de jugos, por la mañanas prepara desayunos y jugos  en su local propia ubicado en el mercado del Campo Verde, negocio que abrió 05 años, tiempo en el cual le valió para hacerse conocida en el mercado. Asimismo cuenta con el apoyo de su hija, que le ayuda en la elaboración de jugos  y atención al público. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite socializarse y tener un ingreso económico que le da la tranquilidad de poder brindarle lo mejor a sus hijos, lo que no le gusta es que los precios de los productos para la elaboración de sus jugos como las frutas no es estable y están en alza, pero esto no es impedimento para seguir creciendo. Tiene planes de abrir una tienda de repuesto de motor. Este sería su préstamo número 03 con la institución MFP, con el grupo que trabaja se siente muy cómoda pues los conoce muy bien por el tiempo que viene trabajando, lo que le anima a seguir en el grupo. Además de estar agradecida por la oportunidad brindada de tener un crédito. Con el préstamo solicitado de 2000 nuevos  soles comprará repuesto de motor para su nueva tienda la cual piensa abrir.
texts.en:
Aurelia, age 42, is a charismatic and determined woman who wants to make progress. She is in a common-law relationship with Elmer, who is a farmer. Aurelia and her partner live with their three children, which is why she strives to move forward. They live together in their own home. Aurelia’s work consists of selling juices. In the mornings, she prepares breakfast and juices from her own shop at the market in Campo Verde. She opened her business five years ago and has become well-known in the market over time. In addition, she has the support of her daughter who helps with making juices and attending to customers. What Aurelia enjoys most about her work is being able to socialize and earn an income in a peaceful manner so that she can provide the best for her children. The part she does not like is dealing with the unstable prices of the products she uses for making juices, such as fruits, because they are rising. However, this has not stopped her from continuing her growth. Aurelia has plans to open a motor parts store.

This will be her third loan with the MFP organization. She feels very comfortable with her group because she is very familiar with the other members when it comes time to work. Aurelia is excited about continuing with her group. In addition, she is grateful for the opportunity to receive a loan. The loan that she requested in the amount of 2000 PEN will be used to buy motor parts for the new shop that she plans to open.

loans.use: to buy motor parts for her new business.

loans.name: Léa

texts.fr: Léa est âgée de 42 ans et vit au Bénin. Léa a arrêté l'école au niveau primaire. Léa est mariée a un certain Roger. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Les enfants vivent ensemble avec leurs parents. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour contribuer aux divers besoins de la famille, Léa vend depuis une dizaine d'année, des produits de mercerie à son domicile. Léa achète ses produits au Bénin et au Nigeria. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Léa contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille. Pour mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Léa sollicite pour une cinquième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits reçus antérieurement par Léa ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Léa is 42 years old and lives in Benin. Léa stopped going to school in elementary school. Léa is married to a man named Roger. The couple has three children, all of whom attend school and are under their care. The children live with their parents. The couple takes care of the household expenses together. To contribute to the diverse needs of the family, Léa has been selling dry goods from her home for about ten years. Léa buys these products in Benin and in Nigeria. Thanks to the revenue this business brings, Léa contributes to the different family expenses. In order to better meet the needs of her growing clientele, Léa is seeking her fifth loan from ALIDé. Her previous loans were properly repaid.

loans.use: to buy dry goods

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy an electric grinder and a fully-equipped hot dog cart.

loans.name: Seny

texts.fr: Madame Seny et mariée et mère de 4 enfants dont l’âge  varie entre 18 et 23 ans. Elle vit au Sénégal et évolue dans le secteur du commerce depuis plus de 5 ans. Elle s’adonne a la vente d’habits pour enfants et de produits cosmétiques  (lait de toilette pour le corps). Elle a choisi son activité par passion mais aussi dans le but de s’occuper. Elle est surtout intéressée  par la recherche de profits. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de  l’U-IMCEC depuis juin 2007 et a déjà remboursé 3 crédits antérieurs. Elle sollicite un prêt de 100 000 frs prévu pour l’achat d’habits et de produits cosmétiques pour les besoins de son commerce. Son  intention est d’améliorer ses revenus ainsi que la situation de vie sociale de sa famille.
texts.en: Mrs. Seny is a married mother of 4 children between the ages of 18 and 23. She lives in Senegal and has been selling things for more than 5 years. She has taken up selling children’s clothing and cosmetic products (body lotion). She chose her business out of passion but also with the goal of staying busy. She is especially interested in the quest for profits. She has been a member of a U-IMCEC branch since June 2007 and has already repaid 3 previous loans. She is seeking a loan of 100,000 frs to buy clothing and cosmetic products for her business. Her intention is to improve her revenue, as well as the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing and cosmetic products to sell

loans.name: Angie Lorena

texts.es: La joven Angie Lorena a sus 20 años de edad es madre de una hija de 4 años, se dedica a prestar servicios de Internet en tres computadores que tiene adecuados en la sala de su casa. Con el ánimo de prestar un mejor servicio, ofrecer nuevos productos y mejorar sus ingresos, la joven Angie Lorena necesita de la compra de insumos de papelería para ofrecer un mejor surtido. El sueño de la joven Angie Lorena es que su negocio crezca y ofrecer a su hija una buena educación y calidad de vida.
texts.en: Angie Lorena, 20, is a young mother of a 4-year-old daughter.  She has an Internet Cafe with three computers that she runs out of the living room of her home.  In order to provide the best possible service, offer new products and improve her income, Angie Lorena must buy a variety of stationery supplies.  Her dream is to grow the business and giver her daughter a good education and quality of life.

loans.use: To buy stationery supplies.

loans.name: Djromahuton Group

texts.fr: DJROMAHUTON est un groupe de quatre personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier au Bénin et sont issus de la même famille. La représentante du groupe, Yèyinou Jacqueline (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 48 ans. Yèyinou Jacqueline est mariée à un revendeur du nom de Emmanuel. Le couple a deux enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Yèyinou Jacqueline vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Yèyinou Jacqueline n’a pas fréquenté. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Yèyinou Jacqueline vend depuis trois ans des bouteilles vides dans un marché du Bénin. Yèyinou Jacqueline s’approvisionne au Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et en vue d'élargir son activité, Yèyinou Jacqueline sollicite un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe DJROMAHUTON. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits. Le premier prêt a été bien remboursé.
texts.en: DJROMAHUTON is a group of four people whose members live in the same neighborhood in Benin and who are from the same family. The group representative, Yèyinou Jacqueline (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 48 years old. Yèyinou Jacqueline is married to a salesman named Emmanuel. The couple has two children, both of whom attend school and who are under their care. Yèyinou Jacqueline lives with her husband and children. The couple shares the household expenses. Yèyinou Jacqueline did not attend school. To meet her different responsibilities, Yèyinou Jacqueline has been selling empty bottles at a market in Benin for three years. Yèyinou Jacqueline stocks up in Benin. In the goals of satisfying her clientele and increase her business, Yèyinou Jacqueline is seeking a second loan with ALIDé with the other members of the DJROMAHUTON group. This loan will help them better meet the needs of their clientele and earn more money. The first loan was properly repaid.

loans.use: to buy empty bottles
