loans.name: Milagros

texts.es:
Milagros nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Milagros tiene 26 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo. 

Milagros se dedica a la crianza animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, ella tiene una pequeña granja en su domicilio. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien.  Milagros requiere el préstamo para comprar gallinas y cuyes. 

Milagros es integrante del banco comunal “Pillao”. Este  grupo está conformado con 13 socios que viven  en la provincia de Cusco del distrito de San Jerónimo.
texts.en:
Milagros was born in the city of  Cuzco and she still ives in the city where she was born. Milagros is 26 years old and is in a common law marriage and has one son.   

Milagros raises small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. She has a small farm at her house. She has been in this business for several years and it is going very well for her. Milagros needs the loan to buy chickens and guinea pigs. 

Milagros is a member of the “Pillao” communal bank. This group is made up of 13 members who live in the province of Cuzco in the San Jerónimo district.

loans.use: to buy chickens and guinea pigs.

loans.name: Marlith

texts.es: Marelith ,de 32 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora, carismática, es casada con Hipólito quien es agricultor, vive  en compañía de su esposo y sus dos menores hijos de 16 y 6 años de edad , vive en su casa propia la cual construyó  con el apoyo de su esposo. El trabajo de Marelith, consiste en le venta de plátanos y frutas al por mayor y menor. Puesto que posee un terreno de 14 hectáreas donde siembra plátanos. Una vez cosechados son llevados a su puesto de venta en mercado de su ciudad. Tiene 04 años haciendo lo mismo, pero le valió para ser conocida en el rubro y ahora es una de las más grandes comercializadoras. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite tener un ingreso económico que le da la tranquilidad de poder brindarles lo mejor a  sus hijos. Se siente cómoda con su actividad ya que lo conoce muy bien, pues viene dedicándose desde muy joven pues aprendió de su madre el oficio, nos comenta que tiene muchas ganas de seguir ampliando su negocio. Este será el préstamo numero 04 con la institución MFP, se siente contenta por el apoyo financiero que recibe de la MFP. Por lo tanto se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal pues conoce a sus miembros y los considera ser personas responsables y solidarias. Con el préstamo solicitado de 3000 nuevos soles, los invertirá en el mantenimiento de su terreno y la producción de plátanos que es su negocio, para ello contratará peones.
texts.en:
Marlith, 32, is an enterprising, charismatic woman who is married to Hipólito.  She is a farmer and lives with her husband and two children, ages 16 and 6, in their own house which they built together.  Marlith's work consists of selling plantain and fruit, both wholesale and retail.  She has 14 hectares of land where she grows the plantain.  She sells the produce at the market in the city.  She has been in this activity for four years and now with her experience is one of the largest merchants.  

What she enjoys about her work is that she is able to obtain an income that gives her the tranquility of knowing that she can provide her children with a better lifestyle.  She is comfortable in this business because she knows it well.  She learned the trade from her mother when she was very young.  She is determined to continue expanding.  

This is her fourth loan through MFP and she is grateful for the financial support and committed to paying back the loan on time.  She also likes her communal bank because she knows all the members and considers them to be responsible and supportive.  The 3,000 PEN loan will be used for land maintenance and plantain production, for which she must hire workers.

loans.use: To hire workers.

loans.name: Ndatté

texts.fr: Madame Ndatté est âgée  de 36 ans. C’est une femme  mère de 2 enfants qui ont 8 et 11 ans.  Elle s’active depuis plus de 5 ans dans le secteur  du commerce. Elle vend des bracelets et des perles. C’est une activité qu’elle a choisi par passion. Elle est plutôt intéressée  par les bénéfices que lui procure  son n activité. Elle est membre du guichet de l’U-IMCEC de sa zone d’habitation  depuis aout 2011. Elle sollicite un crédit d 100 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de perles  pour en faire des bracelets  pour les  besoins  de son commerce. Son objectif est d’accroitre ses bénéfices et  améliorer la situation de vie sociale de sa famille.
texts.en: Mrs. Ndatté is 36 years old. She is a mother of two children, aged 8 and 11. She has been selling things for more than 5 years. She sells bracelets and pearls. She chose this business from passion. She enjoys the profits her business brings. She has been a member of a local U-IMCEC branch since August 2011. She is seeking a loan of 100,000 frs to buy pearls with which to make bracelets to meet her business needs. Her goal is to increase her earnings and improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy pearls

loans.name: Mahuclo Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MAHUCLO est composé de quatre personnes qui sont des amies. C'est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Honorine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Honorine est âgée de 41 ans et vit au Bénin. Honorine n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Honorine est mariée à un maçon du nom de Marcel. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés dont deux restent à leur charge. Honorine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Afin d'assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Honorine vend depuis trois ans, de l’huile végétale à son domicile. Honorine s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Honorine sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MAHUCLO, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The MAHUCLO group is made up of four friends. This is the third time this group is seeking financial aid from ALIDé in order to increase the level of its business. The group representative, Honorine, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. Honorine is 41 years old and lives in Benin. Honorine did not attend school. Honorine is married to a mason named Marcel. The couple has three children, all of whom attend school and of which two are still in their care. Honorine lives with her husband and children. The couple shares the household expenses. In order to meet the needs of her family, Honorine has been selling vegetable oil from her home for three years. Honorine stocks up at a market in Benin. In the goal to satisfy her clientele and to increase her revenues, Honorine is seeking a third loan with ALIDé with the other members of the MAHUCLO group. The first two loans were properly repaid.

loans.use: to buy drums of vegetable oil

loans.name: Mahugnon Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MAHUGNON est composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies. C'est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Jeanne est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Jeanne est âgée de 29 ans et vit au Bénin. Jeanne a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Jeanne est mariée à un certain Bertrand. Le couple a deux enfants tous scolarisés dont un est à leur charge. Jeanne vit ensemble avec son mari et son enfant. Afin d'assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Jeanne vend depuis cinq ans, des tissus par le système de distribution. Jeanne s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Jeanne sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MAHUGNON, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The MAHUGNON group is made up of three friends. This is the third time this group is seeking financial aid from ALIDé in order to increase the level of its business. The group representative, Jeanne, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. Jeanne is 29 years old and lives in Benin. Jeanne stopped attending school in elementary school. Jeanne is married to a man named Bertrand. The couple has two children, both of whom attend school and are in their care. Jeanne lives with her husband and children. In order to meet the needs of her family, Jeanne has been selling fabrics through the distribution system for five years. Jeanne stocks up at a market in Benin. In the goal of satisfying her clientele and increasing her revenues, Jeanne is seeking a third loan with ALIDé with the other members of the MAHUGNON group. The first two loans were properly repaid.

loans.use: to buy fabrics.

loans.name: Ramón

texts.es:
El señor Ramón tiene mucha necesidad de un vehículo para trasportar su mercancía que es ropa, zapatos y juguetes, ya que el que tenia se descompuso y le sele muy cara la reparación, y decidió mejor comprar un carro ya que le está haciendo mucha falta, para trasportar su mercancía en diferentes partes de la ciudad de Nuevo Laredo. 
Don Ramón tiene experiencia en su negocio, su esposa también le ayuda en el negocio, y dos de sus hijos le mandan la mercancía para que la venda. 
Desea mejorar la calidad de vida y tener mas ingreso para su esposa y para el ya que viven solos.
texts.en:
Mr. Ramón is in dire need of a vehicle to transport his merchandise, ie. clothing, shoes and toys, since the goods he has have deteriorated and repair is too expensive.  He decided to buy a vehicle for transportation of merchandise to different parts of the city of Nuevo Laredo.

Ramón has experience in his business and his wife also helps him.  Two of their children send him the goods he sells.  He is striving for a better quality of lfie and more income for his wife and himself since they live alone.

loans.use: To buy a vehicle for his clothing business.

loans.name: Djromahuton 2 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe DJROMAHUTON 2 est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans la même zone. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Mondukpè Reine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Mondukpè Reine est mariée à un certain Justin. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Mondukpè Reine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Mondukpè Reine n’a pas fréquenté l’école mais a appris la coiffure, activité qu’elle exerce depuis quatre ans dans un quartier du Bénin et qui lui procure des revenus non négligeables. De façon secondaire, Mondukpè Reine vend des mèches, des produits de beauté, des tissus et des bijoux. Cette activité lui permet de contribuer sans grande difficulté aux besoins de sa famille. Mondukpè Reine s’approvisionne au Bénin et au Nigeria. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Mondukpè Reine sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe DJROMAHUTON 2, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier prêt a été bien remboursé.
texts.en: The DJROMAHUTON 2 group is made up of three people who live in the same area. This is the second time this group is seeking financial aid from ALIDé in order to increase the level of its business. The group representative, Mondukpè Reine, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. Mondukpè Reine is married to a man named Justin. The couple has three children, all of whom attend school and are in their care. Mondukpè Reine lives with her husband and children. Mondukpè Reine did not attend school, but instead learned hairstyling, which she has been doing for four years in a neighborhood in Benin, and from which she has been making significant earnings. Secondarily, Mondukpè Reine sells hair extensions, beauty products, fabrics, and jewelry. This business helps her contribute without difficulty to the needs of her family. Mondukpè Reine stocks up in Benin and in Nigeria. In the goal of satisfying her clientele and increasing her revenues, Mondukpè Reine is seeking a second loan with ALIDé with the other members of the DJROMAHUTON 2 group. The first loan was properly repaid.

loans.use: to buy boxes of hair extensions.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
Vilma nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Vilma tiene 28 años edad y es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene dos hijos. 

Vilma se dedica a la crianza animales menores como cuyes y pollos, ella tiene una pequeña granja en su domicilio, ella también se dedica a la venta de jora. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien.  Vilma requiere el préstamo para comprar pollos. 

Vilma es integrante del banco comunal “Pillao”. Este  grupo está conformado con 13 socios que viven  en la provincia de Cusco del distrito de San Jerónimo.
texts.en:
Vilma was born in the city of Cusco and lives in the same city where she was born. Vilma is 28 years old and married, and from this relationship she has two children. 

Vilma works raising small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. She has a small farmyard at her home. She also works selling jora [a traditional corn-based drink]. She has operated this business for several years, and it is going very well for her. Vilma needs the loan to buy chickens.

Vilma is a member of the "Pillao” communal bank. This group is made up of 13 members who live in the province of Cusco, in the San Jerónimo district.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Claudia Milena

texts.es: La señora Claudia a sus 24 años de edad se dedica al engorde y venta de pollos desde un pequeño galpón (lugar de vivienda de pollos) adecuado en el solar de su casa. Esta actividad la aprendió de sus padres con quienes vivió su infancia y adolescencia en una finca. Con el ánimo de mejorar sus ingresos y así la calidad de vida de sus dos hijos de 3 y un año de edad, la señora Claudia necesita de la compra de pollos para engorde y concentrado para su alimentación. El sueño de la señora Claudia es tener su propia finca y brindarles lo mejor a sus hijos quienes no cuentan con el apoyo de sus padre quien se separo de ellos apenas nacieron.
texts.en: Claudia is 24 years old and she engages in breeding and selling chickens in a small chicken shed (a place where the chickens live) located in the top story of her house. She has been trained in this activity from her parents, with whom she lived in a farm during her childhood and adolescence. Aiming at increasing her income and consequently her own standard of living as well as that of her two children aged 3 and one, Claudia needs to buy chickens to breed and concentrated feed to nourish them. Claudia dreams of having her own farm and to offer the best to her children, as they cannot count on their father’s support because he left her and them right after they were born.

loans.use: To buy chickens to breed and concentrated feed to nourish them.

loans.name: Jhoyse

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Jhoyse; tiene 31 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia anteriormente se dedicaba al negocio de venta de ropa para niños pero no le fue muy bien eb este negocio y dedicio abrir una panaderia y venta de panetones,ella tiene una panaderia donde vende panes y pasteles en esta epoca del año vende panetones y lo vende al por mayor a las diferentes tiendas que venden panetones,la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio,el sueño de la socia es tener un local mas grande para su negocio de panaderia . La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para preparar los panetones como harina,mantequilla,azucar y pasas al por mayor.

 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Jhoyse is 31 years old, she is married and she has 3 children. Before, she worked selling children's clothes but the business did not do very well and she decided to open a bakery where she sells panetones. She is currently engaged in selling panetone bread: she runs a bakery where she sells bread and pastries, and in this time of the year she sells panetone bread. She works from 7 am to 6 pm, and she hopes that thanks to her activity she will be able to own a bigger place for her bakery. She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients to prepare panetone bread such as flour, butter, sugar and raisins at wholesale price.

She is thankful for the loan provided and she commits to comply with repaying her dues according to the planned schedule.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to prepare panetone bread such as flour, butter, sugar and raisins at wholesale price.

loans.name: Samba

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune, célibataire qui tient une boutique alimentaire dans son quartier. Il vit avec ses frères et sœurs, ses deux parents étant tous décédés. Il n'a jamais connu sa maman, décédée alors qu'il n'avait que trois ans.Il exerce cette activité depuis quatre ans et parvient à générer des revenus qui lui permettent de subvenir à ses besoins et de prendre en charge les dépenses d'entretien de la famille.Pour augmenter son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 150000f afin d'acheter 20 litres d'huile, 50kg de sucre, 5 caisses de boisson et d'autres marchandises diverses.Son ambition est d'élargir son commerce.
texts.en:
This borrower is a young unmarried man who has a grocery store in his area. His parents having died, he lives with his brothers and sisters. He never knew his mom, who died when he was only three years old. 

For four years, he has operated his business and manages to generate the revenues enabling him to support himself and to cover the cost of caring for the family. 

To increase his business capital, he is requesting a loan of 150,000 francs to buy 20 liters of oil, 50 kg of sugar, 5 cases of beverages, and various other merchandise. His ambition is to expand his commerce.

loans.use: to buy 20 liters of oil, 50 kg of sugar, 5 cases of beverages, and various other merchandise

loans.name: Mame Khary

texts.fr: Madame Mame est âgée  de 51 ans et vit au Sénégal. Elle est célibataire et s’active depuis plus de 30 ans dans la vente de bonbons et autres produits divers. Elle a choisi son activité par passion mais aussi sur recommandation de ses parents. Ce qui l’intéresse  surtout ce sont  les bénéfices qui lui sont générés par l’activité. Elle est sociétaire dans  l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis novembre 2003. Elle y a déjà remboursé un crédit antérieur. Elle sollicite un crédit de 50 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de bonbons à revendre. Son objectif est  de renforcer son commerce, augmenter ses bénéfices pour mieux  se prendre en charge.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mame is 51 years old and lives in Senegal. She is single, and she has been selling candy and various other products for over 30 years. She chose this activity out of passion, but also based on her parents’ advice. She is highly motivated by the profits that her business generates. 

She joined a U-IMCEC branch in November 2003 and has already obtained and repaid one loan. She is now seeking a loan of 50,000 to purchase candy for resale. Her goals are to strengthen her business and increase her profits in order to better support herself.

loans.use: to buy candy for resale.

loans.name: Erick

texts.en:
Erick is a resident of Changamwe in Kenya. He owns a retail store that has been in operation for the last year. He started the business from his personal savings.

Erick was introduced to Milango by his friends. He is applying for a loan of 40,000 KES to buy a retail stock of plates, spoons, and bowls, amongst other items. The main challenge Erick faces is the high cost of products. He will use any extra income to build a residential house and also to acquire further education.

loans.use: to buy a retail stock of plates, spoons, and bowls, amongst other items.

loans.name: Durley Amparo

texts.es: La señora Durley Amparo a sus 39 años de edad trabaja como independiente vendiendo productos tales como bolsos, películas, juguetes y música desde hace un año cuando se quedo sin empleo y no contaba con ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hijo. Gracias a su negocio, ha sacado su hogar adelante, le ha podido dar estudio a su hijo y ha crecido como persona. La señora Durley Amparo necesita de la compra de surtido con la esperanza de mejorar sus ventas y así la calidad de vida de su hijo a quien sueña ver como profesional para que no pase por las dificultades que ella y su familia de bajos recursos han pasado.
texts.en: Durley Amparo is 39 years old, she is an independent retailer and she has been selling products such as bags, films, toys and music CDs for one year, after having found herself jobless and with no income to provide for her son. Thanks to her activity she has provided for her family, she has been able to pay for the education of her son and she has grown as a person. Durley Amparo need to buy various products in hopes of improving her sales and therefore her son’s standard of living: she dreams of seeing him become a professional, so that he will not have to face the difficulties that she and her low income family have been through.

loans.use: To buy toys, music and films.

loans.name: Juma

texts.en:
Juma lives in Mombasa, Kenya. He owns a hardware store that he has run for two years. He opened the business using his personal savings.

Juma is applying for a loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings to purchase more nails, paint, wood, etc. His main challenge is in finding customers. He will use the extra income to improve his business i.e. purchase more stock.

loans.use: to purchase more nails, paint, wood, etc.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel, de 59 años de edad, es una mujer muy alegre, dinámica y emprendedora. Esta casada con Asunción quien es jubilado. Juntos habitan en su casa propia. El trabajo que realiza Isabel es la  venta de ropa para damas, caballeros  y niños, de diversas marcas y modelos que están a la moda. Mercadería que trae a pedido de otras ciudades. Esta actividad lo realiza de modo ambulante y reparto a domicilio, ya lleva como 4 años en éste negocio, la cual lo realiza sola pero de manera muy alegre. Paralelo también realiza la otra actividad que es el transporte, esta actividad viene realizando hace ocho meses. Lo que le gusta de ésta actividad es que le genera un ingreso económico con el cual puede tener un sustento para la economía de su hogar. Se siente contenta  ya que le ha traído muchas satisfacciones. Tiene las ganas de seguir trabajando y buscar un negocio rentable, por eso tiene planes de comprar un vehiculo de transporte de pasajeros de mayor capacidad como una combi. Este sería el 03 préstamo con la institución MFP, se siente muy contenta con la oportunidad que le brindarán, de contar con un capital. Por tanto se compromete en ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, comprará más ropa de niños y damas.
texts.en: Isabel is 59 years old, she is a very cheerful, dynamic and resourceful woman. She is married with Asunción who is on retirement, and they live together in their own house. Isabel’s activity is selling women, men and children’s clothes of different brands and fashions. She buys her clothes in other towns. She is a street vendor and she also delivers to her customers’ houses, she has been engaged in this activity for 4 years and she works alone buy in a very cheerful way. She also engages in another activity: she has been offering transportation services for eight months. What she likes the most about this activity is that it gives her an income she can use to provide for the economy of her family, and she feels happy because she has been very satisfied with her activities. She wants to keep on working and running a profitable activity, and for this reason she plans on buying a bigger passengers vehicle such as a combi (a 12-passenger vehicle). This will be her third loan with MFP: she is very thankful for the opportunity to count on working capital that she has been offered. For this reason she commits to being punctual in her repayments. The 2000 PEN requested will be used to buy more women and children’s clothes.

loans.use: To buy women and children's clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a drier and cosmetics.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.es:
Delfina nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Delfina tiene 54 años edad y es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene seis hijos. 

Delfina se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, tarros de leche, conservas, pan y otras cosas más. Ella tiene una pequeña tienda en su domicilio donde expende sus productos. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien.  Delfina requiere el préstamo para comprar sacos de arroz y sacos de azúcar. 

Delfina es integrante del banco comunal “Pillao”. Este  grupo está conformado con 13 socios que viven  en la provincia de Cusco del distrito de San Jerónimo.
texts.en:
Delfina was born in the city of Cusco and lives in the same city where she was born. Delfina is 54 years old and married, and from this relationship she has six children.  

Delfina works selling staple products such as rice, sugar, canned milk, packaged foods, bread and other items. She has a small store in her home where she sells her products. She has operated this business for several years, and it is going very well for her. Delfina needs the loan to buy sacks of rice and sugar. 

Delfina is a member of the “Pillao” communal bank. This group is made up of 13 members who live in the province of Cusco, in the San Jerónimo district.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice and sacks of sugar.

loans.name: Maguette

texts.fr: Madame Maguette  est une vendeuse de poissons âgée de 45 ans qui vit sur le territoire  sénégalais, dans l’une de ses communautés villageoises. Elle est mariée et mère de 7 enfants dont l’âge  varie entre5 et 25 ans.  Elle a une expérience de plus de 10 ans dans son activité. Mais  parallèlement  elle commercialise du  couscous. Elle a choisi l’activité de commerce par passion dans le but de gagner des bénéfices et de satisfaire ses besoins. Elle est membre de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis aout 2011. Elle sollicite un crédit de 50 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de poissons qu’elle va revendre. Son  souci est de renforcer son fond de roulement  et augmenter ses bénéfices pour mieux soutenir ses enfants.
texts.en: Mrs. Maguette is a 45-year-old fish vendor who lives in a village community of Senegal. She is married with seven children ranging in age from 5 to 25 years old. She has over 10 years of experience in her activity. As a sideline, she also sells couscous. She chose to work in trade out of passion, and to earn profits allowing her to support herself. She joined a U-IMCEC branch in August 2011. She is seeking a loan of 50,000 francs to buy fish for sale. Her goal is to bolster her working capital and increase her profits to better support her children.

loans.use: to buy fish for resale.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Eunice lives in Mombasa, Kenya. She owns second-hand clothes shop. Eunice also has two children. She learned about Milango from her friends. 

Eunice is applying for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to purchase more clothing and pay for rent. She looks forward to owning a clothing shop in future. She will reinvest the extra income received from the loan.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing and pay for rent.

loans.name: Juana Nabora

texts.es: La señora Juana es casada y tiene tres hijos, necesita ampliar su casa pues inicio un pequeño negocio de abarrotes y le falta espacio, pues actualmente ocupa el espacio de la cocina para establecer el negocio. Doña Juana trabaja en una maquiladora y su esposo en una empresa. Desean que sus hijos vivan mejor al aumentar los ingresos familiares les podrán dar un mejor futuro.
texts.en: Juana is married and she has three children. She need to expand her house because she has opened a small general store there, and she needs more space as she currently uses the kitchen as a shop. Juana works for a "maquiladora" (a bonded assembly plant set up by a foreign firm near the US border) and her husband works for a company. They want their children to live a better life and by increasing the family earnings they will offer them a better future.

loans.use: To add a room in front of her house.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine owns a food stall in Changamwe, Kenya. She began the business with her savings and the proceeds from the sale of old family assets. She is single and has four children.

Catherine was introduced to Milango by her friends and is now applying for a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to buy utensils, hotel chairs, sugar, flour and cooking oil. Catherine will use the extra income to cater to better health care and to invest for future needs. She aspires to grow her business to a large hotel rather than a food stall.

loans.use: to buy utensils, hotel chairs, sugar, flour and cooking oil.

loans.name: Salim

texts.en:
Salim is a water vendor in Mombasa. He is single and started the business with help from the family's savings. 

After being introduced to Milango by his friends, he is applying for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to purchase a tank. Salim will use the extra income to invest in his future.

loans.use: To purchase a tank.

loans.name: San Expedito Group

texts.es:
San Expedito se denomina el buen grupo de mujeres conformado en la ciudad de Itá  gracias a que una de las miembros contactó con la asesora en una reunión semanal que la misma tenía en la zona, para informarse de la forma de trabajo que tiene el Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras, una vez asesorada acerca del Programa logró juntar a 19 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el tercer ciclo.
Una de las miembros es la señora Felicita, quien se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de joyas, como ser cadenas, pulseras, anillos y demás. Gracias a este trabajo ella puede ayudar a su familia a salir adelante y poder, de esa forma, estar cada vez más cerca de su meta, la cual es poder tener su local propio.
Ella solicita el crédito para poder comprar joyas, y de esa forma poder surtirse, ya que tiene pedidos con los cuales le gustaría poder cumplir.
texts.en:
San Expedito is the name of a distinguished group of women which was formed in the city of Ita, thanks to the fact that one of the members contacted the consultant at a weekly meeting she was conducting in the area, to find out the kind of work the Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras undertakes.  Once advised about the Program she was able to gather together 19 women who are currently working very comfortably together and are in their 3rd loan cycle.
 
One of the members is Señora Felicita who sells all kinds of jewelry such as chains, bracelets, rings and more. Through this work, she helps her family to get ahead and in this way can be ever closer to her goal of having her own premises.

She is asking for the loan to buy jewelry and in this way stock up as she has orders pending she would like to be able to complete.

loans.use: to buy jewelry for subsequent resale.

loans.name: Jorge Ramiro

texts.es:
Jorge Ramiro tiene 48 años de edad es casado tiene tres hijos, vive con la esposa y  los hijos de 17, 13 y 4 años de edad en Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC TENDAL está conformada  por 11 integrantes entre hombres y mujeres se encuentra ubicada  a 45 minutos de la cooperativa.

Jorge se dedica a la Agricultura, tiene sembríos de naranja, café, cacao y plátano. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Chillanes o en el Recinto el Tendal.

Solicita el crédito para mantenimiento de huertas comprar semillas, abonos agrícolas.  Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar la producción.

El sueño es tener un buen negocio propio que le permita vivir bien con la familia.Los desafíos a los que se ha enfrentado son los precios, vías mal estado, daños en la producción como las plagas. 

En el tiempo libre le gusta escuchar radio, ver televisión, es respetuoso, responsable y le gusta disfrutar de las festividades del carnaval.
texts.en:
Jorge Ramiro is 48 years old. He is married and has three children. He lives with his wife and his children, aged 17, 13 and 4 in Chillanes, in Bolívar province.

The TENDAL communal bank is made up of 11 members, including both men and women. It is located 45 minutes from the cooperative. 

Jorge works in agriculture, growing oranges, coffee, cacao and plantains. He makes his purchases and his sales in Chillanes or in the district of Tendal.

He is requesting the loan to carry out maintenance on his fields, buying seeds and fertilizers. With the help of the loan, he will be able to increase his production.

His dream is to have a successful business of his own which will allow him to live well with his family. The challenges he has faced are high prices, poor road conditions, and damages to his crops such as those caused by pests. 

In his free time, he likes to listen to the radio or watch television. He is respectful and responsible, and he enjoys the festivities of Carnaval.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for his fields.

loans.name: Olga Bertelia

texts.es:
Olga Bertilia tiene 65 años de edad es casada tiene dos hijos, vive con el esposo y los hijos de 37 y 28 años de edad en Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC TENDAL está conformada  por 11 integrantes entre hombres y mujeres se encuentra ubicada a  45 minutos de la cooperativa.

Olga se dedica a la Agricultura y además a realizar quehaceres domésticos.
Las compras y las ventas de los productos agrícolas las hace en Chillanes o en el Recinto Tendal cada semana.

Solicita el crédito para comprar animales como pollos y unos cerdos para criar y luego venderlos.

 Con la ayuda del crédito le podrá comprar  tener ingresos con la venta de los animales.
El sueño es poder  incrementar el negocio de la venta y compra de animales para tener un mejor estilo de vida.
Los desafíos a los que se ha enfrentado son los bajos precios en los animales.
En el tiempo libre le gusta arreglar la casa, cuidar los animales, es respetuosa, responsable y le gusta disfrutar de las festividades del carnaval.
texts.en:
Olga Bertilia is 65 years old. She is married and has two children. She lives with her husband and her children, who are 37 and 28 years old, in Chillanes in the province of Bolívar.

The TENDAL communal bank is made up of 11 members, both men and women. It is located 45 minutes from the cooperative.

Olga works in agriculture as well as the tasks of her household. She buys supplies and sells her products each week in Chillanes or in the district of Tendal.

She is requesting the loan to buy animals such as chickens and some pigs to raise and later to sell. 

With the help of the loan, she will be able to buy animals and later sell them and receive income. Her dream is to expand her business buying and selling animals so she can have a better standard of living. 

The challenges she has faced include low prices for selling animals. 

In her free time she likes to fix up her home and care for the animals. She is respectful and responsible, and she enjoys the festivities of Carnaval.

loans.use: to buy animals such as chickens and some pigs to raise and sell.

loans.name: Proyectandonos Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Proyectándonos” está conformado por 17 emprendedores, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran confección de ropa, preparación de comida rápida, preparación de comida típica, entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Puerto Montt.
Juan Carlos presidente del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra al final del grupo, ocupando el tercer lugar de derecha a izquierda, viste una chaqueta color rojo y usa su cabello corto.
Se dedica a la venta de ropa usada desde hace 3 años y desde hace un año, trabaja de manera estable en un local, ahí cuenta con permiso y patente. 
Además se dedica al rubro de la gastronomía, ya que Juan Carlos es Chef de profesión. Cuenta con un local, donde presta servicios de banquetería, a través del cual fomenta la comida típica de la zona.
Su mercadería la compra en importadoras en la ciudad de Santiago.
Con el crédito comprará ropa para surtir su negocio. El resto del dinero lo ahorrará para cumplir una de sus metas. La cual es habilitar una cadena de locales de gastronomía.
Juan Carlos contraerá matrimonio durante el mes de febrero del año 2012, comenta que se siente muy contento.
El está muy agradecido de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio.
El grupo del Banco comunal es muy comprometido y responsable con cada uno de sus negocios.
Puerto Montt es una ciudad del sur de Chile, ubicada en la región de Los Lagos. Una de las atracciones de Puerto Montt son sus bellos paisajes verdes; sus playas poco frecuentadas; su gastronomía y especialmente la reputación de sus pescados y mariscos y sus artesanías. Es también la puerta de entrada a la Isla Grande de Chiloé, rica en tradiciones y leyendas.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Proyectándonos” and is made up of 17 entrepreneurs who run different businesses among which are: clothes making, fast food preparation, and others. They all belong to the city of Puerto Montt.

Juan Carlos is the president of the bank and appears in the photo at the end of the group, the third person from right to left, wearing a red jacket and short hair. He has sold used clothes for the last 3 years and for the last year has been in a fixed locale for which he has the requisite permits and licenses. He is also involved in gastronomy as by profession Juan Carlos is a chef. He has premises where he offers banqueting services through which he promotes the local food of the area. He buys his merchandise at importers in the city of Santiago. 

With the loan he will buy clothes to stock his business. The rest of the money he will save so as to attain one of his goals, which is to start a local food chain.

Juan Carlos will get married in February 2012 and he says that he is very happy. 

He is very grateful for the opportunity given him by Fondo Esperanza as it will allow him to invest in his business. His communal bank group is committed and responsive to each of the businesses.

Puerto Montt is a city in southern Chile, located in the region of Los Lagos. One of the attractions of Puerto Montt is its beautiful green landscapes, its unfrequented beaches, cuisine and especially its reputation for seafood and handicrafts. It is also the gateway to the Isla Grande de Chiloe, rich in traditions and legends.

loans.use: to buy clothes to stock her business.

loans.name: Ma Victoria

texts.es:
La señora Ma. Victoria tiene ya ocho años dedicándose a su negocio de venta de productos de belleza y perfumes. Solicita el préstamo para poder comprar más mercancía ya que sus clientes le están solicitando varios productos para regalar en esta temporada. 
Doña Ma. Victoria es casada y su esposo es chofer de un camión de carga de carretera  y tiene tres hijos que están estudiando y desean lo mejor para ellos, desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos económicos.
texts.en:
Señora Ma. Victoria has spent the last 8 years selling beauty products and perfumes. She is asking for the loan to buy more merchandise as her customers are asking her for various products to give as gifts during this season.

Doña Ma. Victoria is married and her husband is a haulage truck driver. She has 3 children who are studying and for whom she wants the best. She wants to improve her family's quality of life and help her husband with the financial expenses.
.

loans.use: to buy merchnadise for the sale of beauty products.

loans.name: Napoleon Mesias

texts.es:
Napoleón Mesías tiene 34 años de edad es soltero tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos de 12 y 5 años de edad en Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC TENDAL está conformada  por 11 integrantes entre hombres y mujeres se encuentra ubicada a 45 minutos de la cooperativa.

Napoleón se dedica a la Agricultura a la siembra de caco, café y naranja. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Chillanes o en San José del Tambo en forma quincenal.

Solicita el crédito para comprar plantas de cacao y comprar fertilizantes, abonos, líquido para la maleza.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar la producción y por ello los ingresos. El sueño es poder incrementar la producción para tener dinero para la educación de los hijos.

Los desafíos con los que ha sabido lidiar son los bajos precios, vías en pésimas condiciones que impiden la salida del producto en buenas condiciones.

En el tiempo libre le gusta el boly es responsable, respetuoso y le gusta disfrutar de las fiestas del carnaval.
texts.en:
Napoleón Mesías is 34 years old. He is single and has two children. He lives with his children, aged 12 and 5, in Chillanes, in the Province of Bolívar.

The TENDAL communal bank is made up of 11 members, both men and women. It is located 45 minutes from the cooperative.

Napoleón works in agriculture, planting cacao, coffee and oranges. He makes his purchases and sales in Chillanes or in San José del Tambo every two weeks. 

He is requesting the loan to buy cacao plants, fertilizers, compost and liquid weedkiller.

With the help of the loan, he will be able to increase his production and thus his income. His dream is to expand his production so that he has enough money for his children's education. 

The challenges he has been able to overcome are low prices as well as roads in terrible shape which make it hard for him to transport his products in good condition. 

In his free time, he likes to play volleyball. He is responsible and respectful, and he enjoys the festivities of Carnaval.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants, fertilizers, compost and liquid weedkiller.

loans.name: Oswaldo Clemente

texts.es:
Oswaldo Clemente tiene 46 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 19 y 17 años de edad en  Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC TENDAL está conformada  por 11 integrantes entre hombres y mujeres se encuentra ubicada a 45 minutos de la cooperativa.

Oswaldo se dedica a la Agricultura a los sembríos de cacao, guineo, plátano y naranja.

Las compras y las ventas lo hace en  San José del Tambo cada quince días. Solicita el crédito para comprar plantas de cacao, fertilizantes, abonos, líquidos.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar la producción y mejorar el estilo de vida de la familia.

El sueño es tener un carro propio para transportar los productos.
Los desafíos a los que se ha enfrentado son los bajos precios del producto.

En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte en especial el futbol, es respetuosa y responsable, no le gustan las fiestas.
texts.en:
Oswaldo Clemente is forty-six, married, and has two children.  He lives in Chillanes in Bolivar Province with his wife and children, aged nineteen and seventeen.

The Tendal communal bank has eleven members, both men and women, and is located forty-five minutes from the cooperative.

Oswaldo Clemente earns his living in agriculture, growing cacao, bananas, plantains, and oranges.  He buys supplies in San José del Tambo every fifteen days.  He's seeking a loan to buy cacao plants, fertilizer, compost, and weed-killer.  The loan will allow him to improve both production and his family's lifestyle. 

His dream is to have his own car to transport his products.  His challenge is the low price his product demands. 

In his spare time, Oswaldo Clemente likes to play sports, especially soccer.  He's respectful, responsible, and doesn't like party-going.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants, fertilizer, compost, and weed-killer.

loans.name: Fabio

texts.es: En la búsqueda de alternativas para generar ingresos que le permitieran continuar aportando de manera efectiva a los ingresos familiares, el señor Fabio recurrió a su experiencia como comerciante y opto por emprender hace ocho años una venta de frutas y verduras que poco a poco se ha conformado en una tienda. Dado una dificultad que se presentó, el señor Fabio se vio en la obligación de realizar un préstamo a un amigo quien accedió a este pero a tasas de interés muy altas, por lo que ha estado perdiendo mucho capital y por lo que requiere de un nuevo préstamo que le permita cancelar dicho saldo y así poder sacar adelante su negocio y familia.
texts.en:
In search of alternative ways to earn money which would permit him to continue contributing in a worthwhile way to the family income, Fabio used his experience as a merchant and decided to launch, after eight years of selling fruits and vegetables, little by little, a store. 

Because of a problem that presented itself, Fabio saw the necessity of getting a loan from a friend who agreed to do it but at a very high rate of interest. This is why he has been losing so much income and why he needs a new loan that permits him to pay off the balance so his family and his business can move forward.

loans.use: to pay off the balance of a loan and to buy an assortment of products for domestic use

loans.name: Jose Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente tiene 65 años de edad es casado tiene 4 hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 18, 16, 14 y 10 años de edad en Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC TENDAL está conformada  por 11 integrantes entre hombres y mujeres se encuentra ubicada a 45 minutos de la cooperativa.

Vicente  se dedica a la Agricultura a los sembríos de café, cacao, guineo, plátano verde y naranja.

Las compras y las ventas lo hace en  San José del Tambo cada mes. Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, plantas de cacao, fertilizantes, abonos, líquidos.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar la producción y tener mejores ingresos para la  familia.

El sueño es  aumentar los sembríos y la producción para tener un mejor estilo de vida.Los desafíos a los que se ha enfrentado son las vías en mal estado.

En el tiempo libre le gusta dormir, es respetuoso, responsable y le gustan las fiestas del carnaval.
texts.en:
Vicente is sixty-five, married, and has four children.  He lives in Chillanes, Bolívar Province with his wife and children, aged eighteen, sixteen, fourteen, and ten.

The Tendal communal bank has eleven members, both men and women, and is located forty-five minutes from the cooperative.

Vicente is in agriculture: he grows coffee, cacao, bananas, green plantains, and oranges.  He buys and sells in San José del Tambo every month.  He's seeking a loan to buy supplies, cacao plants, fertilizers, compost, and liquid weed-killer.  The loan will allow him to increase production and make more income for the family.

Vicente's dream is to grow more crops and increase production so he can have a better lifestyle.  The challenge he faces is the poor condition of the roads.  

In his free time Vicente likes to sleep.  He is respectful, responsible, and likes the Carnival festivities.

loans.use: to buy supplies, cacao plants, fertilizer, compost, and liquid weed-killer.

loans.name: Tomás

texts.es:
El Sr. Tomas es casado, y tiene un hijo. Él Señor nos cuenta que tiene una despensa en su barrio de Ciudad del Este.
Con la ayuda de su esposa  están  saliendo adelante con mucho sacrificio, dedicación  y esfuerzo, ya que cuentan con una tapicería que le está generando más ingresos para su familia, además de la despensa que tienen.
El Señor ya es un microempresario exitoso con una clientela formada, debido a su amabilidad. Ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y honesta en sus compromisos, esta vez solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, enlatados, panificados y demás insumos, con los cuales podrá abastecerse y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Tomas is married and has a son. He tells us that he has a general store in his neighborhood of Ciudad del Este.

With the help of his wife they are getting ahead with great sacrifice, putting in a lot of effort, as they have a tapestry making shop that is generating more income for the family, besides the general store that they have.

He is already a successful micro entrepreneur with an established customer base, due to his kindness. He has shown himself to be a trustworthy and honest person in his commitments. This time he wants to use the money from the loan to buy food products, drinks, canned food, baked goods and other supplies, in order to stock up and fulfill the requests from his customers.

loans.use: to buy food products, drinks, canned food, baked goods and other supplies

loans.name: Yeise

texts.es:
Yeise integrante y delegada del grupo del Banco comunal “Caminando Hacia el Futuro”, perteneciente a la ciudad de Talca.
Se dedica a la realización de tejidos a crochet (es una técnica para tejer trabajos con hilo o lana que utiliza una aguja corta). Confecciona tejidos para los muebles y adornos del hogar, entre cortinas, cubrecamas, paños para muebles, entre otros.
Se dedica a éste oficio desde hace 10 años, comenta que aprendió de manera autodidacta y que con el tiempo continúa aprendiendo e incorporando nuevas técnicas a sus tejidos.
Compra los conos de hilo al por mayor, en las ciudades de Talca y/o Santiago, siempre y cuando los precios sean convenientes económicamente, por lo que cotiza en cada ocasión que va de compras. 
Con el crédito comprará conos de hilo al por mayor.
Una de sus metas es tener un local establecido o integrarse con un puesto en alguna feria artesanal.
Yeise vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 25 y 19 años de edad. Su hijo mayor se tituló de la carrera de pedagogía en filosofía y su hijo menor rindió la prueba de selección universitaria. Por lo que uno de los sueños de Yeise es que su hijo haya quedado seleccionado en alguna universidad, de ésta manera podrá estudiar la carrera de pedagogía en Educación Física.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, para invertir en su negocio. Por otro lado que las capacitaciones han sido de gran ayuda también, ya que ha ido incorporando nuevas técnicas de contabilidad a su negocio. 
Respecto al grupo del Banco comunal del cual forma parte, comenta que son muy unidas, responsables y comprometidas. Y que esta instancia le ha permitido aprender de otras experiencias.
Talca pertenece a la región del Maule, ubicada en la zona centro del país. Constituye el centro administrativo, económico y cultural de la región, siendo la ciudad más importante del Valle Central chileno. Sobre Talca existe una curiosa referencia en Chile, la frase "Talca, París, y Londres". Entre los mitos al respecto, algunos dicen que es una derivación de la originalmente dicha por un inglés "Talca parece Londres", por la abundante neblina que cubre frecuentemente la ciudad en la temporada invernal, a semejanza de la capital del Reino Unido.
texts.en:
Yeise is a member and delegate of the communal bank Caminando Hacia el Futuro (Walking towards the Future), in the city of Talca.

She crochets (this is a technique for working with yarn or wool using a short needle). She makes fabrics for furniture and decorations for the house, including curtains, bedspreads, decorative furniture coverings, among other items.

She has been doing this work for ten years. She tells us that she learned by herself and as time goes by she is still learning and incorporating new techniques to her weavings.

She buys her spools of yarn wholesale in the cities of Talca and/or Santiago, always when the prices are lowest, depending on the particular time she is shopping.

She is asking for a loan to buy spools of yarn at wholesale.

One of her goals is to have her own facility or a stand in a crafts fair.

Yeise lives with her husband and her two children who are 25 and 19 years old. Her oldest son has a philosophy degree and her younger son has passed the university selection test. One of the dreams that Yeise has is that her son is accepted by some university so that he could study for a degree in Physical Education.

She is very happy and thankful for the opportunity given by Fondo Esperanza to invest in her business. In addition, the training sessions have been a big help too and already she is using new bookkeeping techniques in her business.

Regarding the communal bank which she is a member of, she comments that they are very united, trustworthy and committed, and in fact she has benefited by learning from the experiences of the others.

Talca belongs to the region of Maule, located in the center of the country. It is the administrative center, being the most important city both economically and culturally in the Chilean Central Valley. There is this curious reference in Chile, the phrase “Talca, Paris and London.” Among the myths regarding it some say that it is a derivation of something a person from England originally said, “Talca is like London,” meaning by this the abundant fog that frequently covers the city in winter, which resembles the capital of the United Kingdom.

loans.use: to buy spools of yarn at wholesale prices

loans.name: Pedro Jose

texts.es:
Pedro José tiene 41 años de edad es divorciado tiene un hijo, vive con el hijo de 9 años de edad en Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC TENDAL está conformada  por 11 integrantes entre hombres y mujeres se encuentra ubicada a 45 minutos de la cooperativa.

Pedro   se dedica a la venta ambulante de choclos asados y cocinados y además a la agricultura.

Las compras y las ventas lo hace en  Chillanes todos los días. Solicita el crédito para comprar abonos,fertilizantes para los cultivos de maíz y poder cosechar un producto de calidad.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar la venta y tener mejores ingresos para la  familia. El sueño es  ser integrante de una cooperativa de camionetas en San Pedro de Guayabal.

Los desafíos a los que se ha enfrentado es el mal tiempo y la suba de precios de los abonos.

En el tiempo libre le gusta dormir, es respetuoso, responsable y le gustan las fiestas del carnaval.
texts.en:
Pedro José, 41, is divorced and has a nine-year-old son that he lives with in Chillanes, Bolívar Province.

The “Tendal” communal bank has 11 members, both men and women, and is located 45 minutes from the Cooperativa.

Pedro is a street vendor of roasted and cooked corn on the cob; he’s also a farmer.

His purchases and his sales take place in Chillanes every day.  He’s asking for the loan to buy manure and fertilizer for his corn crops to be able to harvest a quality product.

With help from the loan he will increase sales and have better family income.  His dream is to join a trucking cooperative in San Pedro de Guayabal.

The challenges he’s faced are bad weather and the rising price of manure.

In his free time he likes to sleep.  He’s respectful, responsible and enjoys the Carnival festivities.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
El  Sr. Pedro es de ciudad del este, está casado  con la señora  Carmen, juntos tienen 2 hijos aun pequeños que van a la escuela.
Nos cuenta Pedro que tiene una pequeña despensa, la cual está bien surtida, además de eso también se dedica a la venta de ropas de todo tipo, cuya venta cada vez más está en ascenso. Ambos negocios lo están ayudando a él y a su familia, generándole un buen ingreso.
Con la ayuda de su esposa y toda la familia están  saliendo adelante con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo. Hoy día él es un microempresario exitoso con una clientela fiel y numerosa, debido a su amabilidad. Se caracteriza por ser una persona responsable y honesta.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, verduras, hortalizas, lácteos y demás insumos para poder surtir su negocio y de esa forma hacer frente a la demanda de sus clientes. Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la ayuda que estas le brindan.
texts.en:
Pedro is from the Ciudad del Este.  He is married to Carmen, and they have two young children who go to school.

Pedro tells us that he has a small grocery store, which is well stocked.  In addition to that he sells all types of clothes.  His sales are increasing more and more.  Both businesses are helping his family by generating a good income for him.

With the help from his wife and his whole family he is getting ahead with great sacrifice and effort.  He is now a successful small businessman with numerous and fixed customers.  This is due to his kindness.  He is known for being a responsible and honest person.

He is requesting the loan to buy food like vegetables, dairy products, and other supplies to be able to stock his business.  This is the way that he will get ahead of his customers’ demand.  

He is grateful to the Fundación and to Kiva for the help they are giving him.

loans.use: to buy food like vegetables, dairy products, and other supplies.

loans.name: Mwinga

texts.en:
Mwinga lives in Mombasa, Kenya. He is a mason; a trade he has plied for 7 years. Mwinga is married and is a father of two.

He was introduced to Milango by an employee and is applying for a loan of 10,000 KES to purchase retail stock for his retail shop, e.g. salt, sugar, fat, etc.. Mwinga’s main challenges are finding customers and some customers not paying on time.

loans.use: to purchase stock for his retail shop e.g. salt, sugar, fat, etc.

loans.name: Angel David

texts.es:
Angel David tiene 55 años de edad es casado tiene 1 hijo, vive con la esposa y con el hijo de 24 años de edad en Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC TENDAL está conformada  por 11 integrantes entre hombres y mujeres se encuentra ubicada a 45 minutos de la cooperativa.

Angel se dedica a la Agricultura a los sembríos de naranja, cacao además trabaja jornal diario y es partidario.
Las compras y las ventas lo hace en  San José del Tambo cada mes. Solicita el crédito para poder terminar con los arreglos de la casa donde el vive.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá culminar con los arreglos y poder vivir tranquilo con el hijo y la esposa.
El sueño es  comprar un terreno para tener sembríos propios.

Los desafíos a los que se ha enfrentado son las vías en mal estado.

En el tiempo libre le gusta dedicarse más al trabajo, es respetuoso, responsable y le gustan las fiestas del carnaval.
texts.en:
Angel David, age 55, is married and has one child.  He lives with his wife and his 24 year old son in Chillanes in the Bolívar province.

The Tendal communal bank is comprised of 11 members, men and women who are located 45 minutes from the Cooperativa.

Angel is a farmer.  He devotes himself to growing oranges and cacao.  He also works as a day laborer on other people’s land.
He makes his purchases and his sales every month in San José del Tambo.

He is requesting the loan to be able to complete the repairs on the house where he lives.  With the help of the loan he will be able to finish the repairs, and he will be able to live peacefully with his son and his wife.

His dream is to buy some land in order to have his own crops.  The challenges he has faced are the roads, which are in a bad state.

In his free time he likes to spend more time on his work.  He is respectful, responsible, and he likes the Carnaval festivities.

loans.use: to complete the repairs on the house where he lives.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
La Sra. Angela es de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso,  tiene 38 años de edad,  es soltera y es madre de 2 hijos, a los cuales ella cría sola, con la ayuda de su familia.
La Sra. Angela tiene una despensa bien surtida, el que está instalado en su local propio,  en su casa. Nos comenta que su despensa es fruto de todo el sacrificio que ella ha hechos, ya que se inicio con un Copetín, y después cambio de rubro, que hasta hoy le va muy bien, con clientela ya formada. Ella cuenta que todo el sacrificio que ella hace es por sus hijos, para darles lo mejor.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de azúcar, yerba, carne, panificados, artículos de limpieza y otros, con los cuales podrá abastecerse y seguir surtiendo a sus clientes. Está muy agradecida por la oportunidad que les da la fundación y kiva
texts.en:
Angela is from the city of Mariano Roque Alonso. She is 38 years old, single and the mother of 2 children. She is raising them alone, with the help of her family.  

Angela has a well stocked store in her own locale at her home. She tell us that her store is the result of all the sacrifices she has made. She started out selling snacks, and then changed her area of work. Now it is going well for her with regular customers. She says that all of the sacrifices she has made are for her children, in order to give them the best.

She is asking for the loan to buy sugar, herbs, meat, baked goods, cleaning supplies and more in order to stock her store and keep supplying her customers. She is very grateful for the opportunity that the foundation and Kiva are giving her.

loans.use: to buy sugar, herbs, meat, baked goods, cleaning supplies and more.

loans.name: Lidia Angela

texts.es: Lidia de 44 años vive en Pradomar, municipio turístico a la orilla del mar caribe y a 20 minutos de la ciudad de Barranquilla. Allí se dedica a la confección de ropa femenina, oficio adquirido por tradición familiar, pues su padre es sastre también y su madre aun se desempeña en este oficio y trabaja en compañía de Lidia. Las principales líneas en las que trabaja el taller de Lidia es la femenina e infantil y en ellas tiene un mercado muy concentrado, conformado principalmente por madres de familia. Para Lidia la temporada de fin de este año y de principios del siguiente, le representan muchos ingresos pero también se incrementa su trabajo y sus necesidades de capital de trabajo. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a mala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará materias primas e insumos y también invertirá en una nueva maquina de coser, que le facilite la efectividad en su proceso productivo. Su meta es lograr mayor ensanche de su negocio con una mayor infraestructura de equipos herramientas y maquinarias que le permitan generar ingresos y empleos a muchas familias que lo requieran y un mayor bienestar para sus hijos que aun dependen de ella y se encuentran en las edades de 12 a 23 años. Su sueño principal es lograr generar oportunidades de éxito a sus hijos, para que en un futuro realicen sus propios sueños y esto es justamente  lo que en su su condición de mujer cabeza de familia quiere lograr, mediante su trabajo persistente.
texts.en: Lidia is 44 years old and lives in Pradomar, a neighborhood which is a tourist destination on the shores of the Caribbean Sea. Pradomar is 20 minutes away from the city of Barranquilla. Here she makes her living by making women’s clothing, a skill she learned as a family tradition since her father is also a tailor. Her mother also is in this line of work and works along with Lidia. Lidia’s studio primarily makes women’s and children’s clothing. They have a very concentrated market, made up primarily of mothers with children. For Lidia, the end of this year and the beginning of the next represent a time of great income, but her work also increases as does her need for working capital. This is the reason she has requested a Kiva loan, the first financing she has done through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use the loan to purchase raw materials and supplies and also invest in a new sewing machine, which will facilitate effectiveness in her production. Her goal is to expand her business with greater infrastructure of tools, equipment and machinery that will permit her to generate income and jobs for many families who need them, as well as provide well-being for her children who still depend on her. They range in age from 12 to 23 years old. Her main dream is to be able to generate opportunities for success for her children, so that in the future they can realize their own dreams. In her position as a female head of the house, this is exactly what she wants to accomplish, through her persistent work.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials and supplies, and also to invest in a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Angel Vicente

texts.es:
Angel Vicente tiene 48 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene 6 hijos, vive con el conyugue y los hijos de 21, 20, 17, 15, 11 y 7 años de edad en  Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC TENDAL está conformada  por 11 integrantes entre hombres y mujeres se encuentra ubicada a 45 minutos de la cooperativa.

Angel  se dedica a la Agricultura a los sembríos de cacao, plátano verde y naranja.
Las compras y las ventas lo hace en  San José del Tambo cada semana. Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, plantas de cacao, fertilizantes, abonos, líquidos.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar el negocio, mejorar ingresos para la  familia.

El sueño es  aumentar la producción para tener un mejor ingreso para que los hijos culminen los estudios.

Los desafíos a los que se ha enfrentado son las vías en mal estado.
En el tiempo libre le gusta dedicarse a los sembríos, es respetuoso, responsable y le gustan las fiestas del carnaval.
texts.en: Angel Vicente is 48 years old.  He lives in a common-law relationship and has six children, ages 21, 20, 17, 15, 11, and 7.  They live in Chillanes, Bolívar province.  The TENDAL VRC [Ventanillas Rurales Crédito, or Window to the Countryside Loan] consists of 11 male and female members and is located 45 minutes from the cooperative.  Angel works in farming and raises cocoa, green bananas, and oranges.  He makes his purchases and sells his produce in San José del Tambo each week.  He is requesting the loan to buy supplies, cocoa plants, fertilizer, manure, and liquid fertilizer.  The loan will help him expand his business and provide better income for his family.  He dreams of increasing production and having better income so that his children can complete their studies.  The poor condition of the roads present a challenge for him.  In his free time, he enjoys tending to his sown fields.  He is respectful and responsible and enjoys the festivities during carnival.

loans.use: to purchase, supplies, cocoa plants, fertilizer, manure, and liquid fertilizer.

loans.name: Khadija

texts.en:
Khadija is a clothes dealer. She is married and has two children; one of whom is in school. The business has been running for 6 years. She learned of Milango from her friends. 

Khadija is applying for a loan of 80,000 KES to purchase more clothes for sale. Khadija’s main challenge is price fluctuations. She looks forward to owning a big store. She will use the extra income to educate her child.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for sale

loans.name: Orlando  Rafael

texts.es: Orlando de 39 años es padre de dos niños en las edades de 8 y 10 años y vive en el municipio de San Juan Nepomuceno, lugar donde se dedica a ala venta de frutas y verduras, desde ha ce 12 años,  aprovechado que trabajó en la ciudad de Barranquilla durante tres años en esta misma actividad y logró una importante experiencia en el manejo de productos perecederos. Con su negocio ha logrado salir adelante,  tener su propia casa y obtener  ingresos para vivir con un poco de comodidad. Su meta es hacer crecer mucho más su negocio, con el fin de lograr que sus hijos obtengan una educación de calidad y tengan potencial de éxito en lo que emprendan. En la actualidad está planeando acceder a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  con el cual comprará frutas como la patilla o sandia, que es una de las que mas vende en su negocio, le genera buenas ganancias al comprar al por mayor, como es a lo que ahora se propone.
texts.en: Orlando is a 39 year-old father of two children, ages 8 and 10 years old. He lives in the municipality of San Juan Nepomuceno and has also sold fruits and vegetables there for the last 12 years. He has taken advantage of the fact that he worked in the business in Barranquilla for three years, where he gained important experience in handling perishable products. Orlando's business has allowed him to get ahead, to have his own house, and to earn enough income to have some comforts. His goal is to expand his business more so that his children can obtain a good quality education and be successful in whatever they endeavor. Orlando is currently planning to take out his first credikiva, which will also be his first funding through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use it to buy fruits like watermelons, which are one of the fruits he sells the most of. He generates good profits when he buys in bulk, which is what he plans to do in this instance.

loans.use: to buy fruits like watermelons

loans.name: Francisca Lastenia

texts.es:
Francisca Lastenia tiene 72 años de edad es soltera tiene 1 hijo, vive con el hijo de 46 años de edad en Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC TENDAL está conformada  por 11 integrantes entre hombres y mujeres se encuentra ubicada a 45 minutos de la cooperativa.

Francisca se dedica a la crianza y venta  de animales como los pollos. Las compras y las ventas los hace en  San José del Tambo en forma quincenal . Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos para la crianza y posterior venderlos.
Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar el negocio propio de la venta y compra de pollos.

El sueño es incrementar el negocio para tener un buen ingreso y trabajar en conjunto con el hijo.

Los desafíos a los que se ha enfrentado son las vías en mal estado, a veces los animales se han muerto por el maltrato de las carreteras.

En el tiempo libre le gusta cocinar, arreglar la casa y  le gustan las fiestas del carnaval.
texts.en:
Francisca Lastenia is 72 years old, single and has one son.  She lives with her son, who is 46 years old, in Chillanes, in the province of Bolívar.

Communal bank TENDAL is made up of 11 members, both men and women.  It is found located 45 minutes from the cooperative.

Francisca works breeding and selling animals such as chickens.  She makes the purchases and sales biweekly in San José del Tambo.  She requests the loan in order to purchase chickens to breed and then sell.  With the aid of the loan, she will be able to increase her own business of breeding and selling chickens.

Her dream is to increase her business in order to have a good income and work together with her son.

A challenge that she has faced is the poor condition of the roads.  Sometimes, the animals have died due to the abuse of the roads.

In her free time, she enjoys cooking, fixing up the house and the fiestas of carnaval.

loans.use: to purchase chickens to breed and then sell.

loans.name: Sylvanus

texts.en: Sylvanus is a mechanic. His business has been in operation for 20 years. He is a resident of Mombasa, Kenya. He learnt of Milango from an employee. Sylvanus is applying for a loan of 30,000 Kenyan shillings to purchase a welding machine. The main challenges facing Sylvanus are finding customers, price fluctuations and some customers not paying on time.

loans.use: to purchase a welding machine

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora Maria es de la ciudad de Santaní, es soltera y tiene dos hijos, los cuales son aun peuqeños y van a la escuela. María vive en casa de sus padres y nos comenta que se dedica a la venta de articulos de merceria en forma ambulante.
Cuenta que hace un tiempo ya que se dedica a esto, por lo que ya tiene una clientela bien formada ya que vende sus mercaderias por toda la ciudad y así es como se hace conocida. Ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora, la cual día a día se esfuerza para poder darle a sus hijos un mejor futuro y que no tengan que pasar por privaciones.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de sabanas, frazadas, fundas, y demás artículos para la venta, ya que tiene muchos pedidos de sus clientes y le gustaría poder cumplir con ellos. Esta muy agradecida por esta oportunidad que se le da de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
María is from the city of Santaní. She is single and has two small children who both attend school. María lives in her parents' house and tells us that she sells notions in an ambulatory manner.

She explains that she has been doing this for some time. She has a well-developed client base because she sells her merchandise all over the city and, in this manner, has become well-known. She describes herself as a very hard-working and spirited woman who struggles day in and day out to be able to provide her children with a better future and to ensure that they do not lack any necessities.

María is requesting this loan to buy sheets, blankets, bedspreads, and other items to sell, as she has many orders from her customers and would like to be able to fill them. She is very grateful for this opportunity to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy sheets, blankets, bedspreads, and other items to sell

loans.name: Farrelly

texts.en:
Farrelly lives in Mombasa, Kenya. He is married and owns a laundry and dry-cleaning business. The enterprise has been in operation for 37 years.

Farrelly was introduced to Milango by an employee and is applying for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to purchase a laundry-spinning machine. Farrelly’s main challenge is some clients not paying on time.

loans.use: to buy a laundry-spinning machine.

loans.name: Gilberto Remigio

texts.es:
Gilberto Remigio tiene tiene 32 años de edad es soltero, vive con el papá y la mamá en Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC TENDAL está conformada  por 11 integrantes entre hombres y mujeres se encuentra ubicada a 45 minutos de la cooperativa.

Gilberto  se dedica a trabajar en la empresa San Francisco a la entrega de mueblería.Las compras y las ventas lo hace la dueña del local.
Solicita el crédito para comprar un solar de terreno. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar el estilo de vida.El sueño es  aumentar construir una casa para vivir con la familia y tener un negocio.

Los desafíos a los que se ha enfrentado son las vías en mal estado.

En el tiempo libre le gusta pasear, dormir ser respetuoso, responsable y le gustan las fiestas del carnaval.
texts.en:
Gilberto Remigio is 32 years old,single, and he lives with his mom and dad in Chillanes in Bolívar province.

The Tendal communal bank is made up of 11 members, men and women, and is located 45 minutes from the cooperative.

Gilberto works at the San Francisco company delivering furniture. The owner of the store does the buying and selling. He is asking for the loan to buy a plot of land. With the help of the loan he will be able to improve his lifestyle. His dream is to build a house to live with his family and to have a business.

The challenges he has faced are roads in poor condition.

In his free time, he likes to go for a walk, sleep, and be respectful and responsible. He likes the carnival festivals.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land

loans.name: Amigas Compartiendo Exito Group

texts.es: Rosario de 46 años, es conviviente y tiene 7 hijos de los cuales 3 aún dependen de ella. Tiene 2 años formándose como cliente de Edaprospo y se dedica a la venta de dulces como son los caramelos, chupetes, galletas, etc.; lleva 1 año en este negocio el cual comenzó con la idea de dar una buena educación a sus hijos. Con su esfuerzo y trabajo a podido dar estudio a 4 de sus hijos los cuales ya no dependen de ella y también ha podido construir su casa. Actualmente sus ingresos los destina a cubrir los gastos de agua y luz, mientras que su pareja cubre los gastos de alimentación. Su plan para el futuro es abrir un local comercial para la venta de ropa en general. Piensa usar el reciente préstamo en la compra  de mercadería para su negocio. Lleva 2 años con el grupo “Amigas Compartiendo Éxito”, el cual esta conformado por 6 personas y que se formo por medio de la motivación de una de las madres de las socias perteneciente a este grupo. Rosario lleva 4 meses como presidenta del grupo.
texts.en: Rosario is 46 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has seven children, three of whom are still dependent on her. She has been a client of Edaprospo for two years and sells sweets like candies, lollipops, cookies, etc. She has had this business for one year and she started it with the idea of providing her children with a good education. Through her efforts and work she has been able to provide four of her children (those who are no longer dependent on her) with schooling and was also able to build her house. Currently, her income covers the water and electricity bills, while her partner's income covers food expenses. Rosario's plan for the future is to open a commercial location where she can sell clothing. She plans to use this loan to buy merchandise for her business. She has been in the "Amigas Compartiendo Éxito" ["Friends Sharing Success"] communal bank for two years. The group was formed by six people who were encouraged one of their mothers. Rosario has been president of the communal bank for four months.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a resident of Mombasa, Kenya. He owns a new clothes shop which has been running for five years. He learnt of Milango from an employee.

Hussein is applying for a loan of 40,000 Kenyan shillings to purchase kids and adults’ clothing for sale. The main challenge, especially during low season, is competition, which makes it difficult to find customers.

loans.use: to purchase kids and adults’ clothing.

loans.name: Kuña Pora Group

texts.es:
Kuña Pora surge gracias a la intervención de una de las miembros, la cual contactó con sus vecinas y amigas para formar el comité en la zona. Actualmente están en el Octavo Ciclo, con 11 integrantes. Es un grupo que se destaca en el barrio por ser muy unido, solidario y responsable. Ellas desean que por medio del trabajo en conjunto puedan salir adelante y apoyarse las unas a las otras.
Myriam es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora, quien se esfuerza día a día por su familia. Ella comenta que hace un tiempo se dedica a la venta de bebidas y gracias a sus buenos precios y a la variedad que tiene ya ha podido formarse una buena clientela. Ella dice que todo el esfuerzo que hace es por ayudar a su familia y darles lo mejor.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de cervezas, vinos, gaseosas, sidras y demás tipos de bebidas, con las cuales podrá surtirse para sus clientes, ya que esta en tiempos de mucha venta, como ser navidad y año nuevo.
texts.en:
Kuña Pora Group came together thanks to one of its members, who contacted her neighbors and friends to form a communal bank in their area. They are now in their eighth cycle and have 11 members. They are a group known in their neighborhood for their unity, solidarity, and responsibility. They all hope that they can get ahead and support one another through their work together.

Myriam is a very hard-working and spirited woman who struggles day in and day out for her family. She says that for some time now she has been selling beverages, and that thanks to her good prices and variety she has been able to develop a good client base. She says that all of her efforts are to help her family and to make their lives better.
